review:
До того как я, наконец, поиграл в Watch Dogs: Legion, моё представление о ней было довольно противоречивым. Вообще считается, что серия посвящена хакерам и взлому данных в сети, вот только взлом этот — нажатие одной кнопки, а собственно сети или какого-то «виртуального пространства» нет вообще. Кто-то называл Legion «симулятором Антифы», что вроде бы подтверждалось один из трейлеров. А регулярно пролетающие над улицами дроны в геймплейных видео лично у меня вызывали ассоциации с Cyberpunk 2077.

Да, я понимаю, что улочки старого Лондона довольно сильно отличаются от небоскрёбов Найт-Сити, и киборгов с «клинками богомола» вы там не встретите. Однако продвинутые технологии, включая ИИ и нейроимпланты тут тоже есть. И даже занимают важное место в сюжете — их использует пришедшая к власти организация Альбион чтобы держать всех лондонцев под колпаком. Вот вам и тема тоталитарного контроля со стороны правительства и корпораций.

Киберпанк 1984
Правда слухи про «прогрессивную» политическую повестку Legion оказались несколько преувеличены. Среди оперативников упомянутого Альбиона служат не только белые мужики. И выход Британского Королевства из Евросоюза (Брексит) в основном сюжете практически не упоминается. Разве что тема депортации иммигрантов в определённый момент всплывает, но и она быстро уступает место рассуждениям о праве на неприкосновенность в личной жизни и свободную информацию.

Так что вместо Брексита, отправной точкой нашей истории становится теракт, ответственность за который повесили на хакерскую группу DedSec. Но мы-то уже с обучающей миссии знаем, что DedSec как раз пыталась предотвратить взрыв бомбы, послав в Вестминстерское аббатство своего лучшего агента.

Вот только наш агент там попадает в засаду, вместо обезвреженной в Вестминстере бомбы взрывается ещё несколько по всему Лондону, а в довершении штаб DedSec штурмует спецназ.

Лишь главе лондонской ячейки удаётся уйти от облавы. И теперь её последняя надежда — оставшийся на свободе «спящий» агент, с которого вы и начинаете основную часть игры. Впрочем, после того как персонаж реактивирует штаб, вы сразу уже можете заняться вербовкой новичков.

И тут как раз игра слегка уходит в фантазии антифовцев. Потому что буквально КАЖДЫЙ прохожий оказывается жертвой угнетения либо со стороны Альбиона, либо Клана Келли — банды подмявшей под себя всю противозаконную деятельность, в том числе контрабанду и фальшивые документы для тех, кто оказался в немилости у нового режима.

Вот оказавшиеся меж двух огней обыватели и ждут, когда же им бедным придёт на помощь DedSec. А нам остаётся только оправдать доверие, достав нужное кому-то лекарство, вызволив друга из каталажки, обнародовав (или уничтожив) компромат, и так далее.

Единственное, что делает ситуацию хоть немного правдоподобнее — не все граждане проникаются к нам доверием с одной миссии… Некоторые только с двух. И нам ещё нужно получить способность «Глубокий анализ» чтобы залезть человеку в «ежедневник» и узнать, чего же ему не хватает. Так можно вербовать союзников даже из рядов Альбиона и бандитов!

А самые элитные рекруты становятся доступны после выполнения особых заданий и «освобождения» районов. Стёрли очередную базу данных по осведомителям, обнародовали махинации какого-то чиновника, намалевали где-то граффити — и вот уже народ бунтует, на карте района раскрываются все бонусы, а в ряды DedSec идут записываться профессиональные киллеры и шпионы с гаджетами из Бондианы.

Имя нам — Легион!
Надо заметить, что особые способности и снаряжение — единственное, чем отличаются присоединяющиеся к DedSec граждане. Никаких различий по физическим характеристикам у них нет. Поэтому плечистый грузчик или пожилая домохозяйка могут одинаково успешно валить бугаёв в подпольных боях без правил и набивать морды Альбионовским спецназовцам. Зато у шпиона есть личное авто с ракетами и маскировочным полем. Грузчик не только умело орудует разводным ключом, но и может вызвать грузовой дрон, чтобы забраться на крышу. Профессиональный киллер убивает одним выстрелом и почти мгновенно перезаряжает обоймы. У граффити-художника всегда припасена дизориентирующая врагов дымовая шашка. Хакер быстрее скачивает информацию, а в бою при взломе имплантов вирус перекидывается на соседних врагов (где-то я это видел…).

У менее выдающихся горожан и способности менее выдающиеся. Например, просто увеличенный урон, или невосприимчивость к электрошоку, или получение небольшой суммы денег при взломе техники. У бандитов и Альбионцев как правило есть доступ к мощному летальному оружию.

Впрочем, не стоит торопиться затевать потасовку или перестрелку. Чем больше шума вы подымете, тем скорее на сигнал тревоги примчится полиция и Альбион с настоящими пушками и боевыми дронами. Мало того, что испортят вам операцию, так ещё и выбравшись из здания придётся несколько кварталов прятаться от патрулей. Попадётесь — могут и пристрелить. Минус один агент. Хотя если повезёт можете отделаться арестом, тогда персонажа выведут из игры лишь на время (и если в рядах DedSec есть кто-то с перком «адвокат», могут вообще сразу выпустить).

Кстати, иногда попадаются индивиды с «негативными чертами». У кого-то проблемы с властями и потому отсидка дольше. Другой получает больше урона из-за плохого здоровья. А есть люди, которые могут испортить тщательно спланированное скрытое проникновение одним дурацким пердежом. (Если узнали из какого фильма цитата — мои поздравления!)

Крадущийся хакер, затаившийся бот
Стелс-подход всегда самый предпочтительный. Вам даже не обязательно ныкаться по углам если вы завербовали человека, которому по профессии разрешён вход в нужную зону. Спокойно ходите туда-сюда, главное не приближайтесь к охранникам. На всякий случай можно ещё экипировать маскирующий гаджет, делающий вас на время невидимым, или электрошок, позволяющий вырубить сразу нескольких (после улучшения) врагов вокруг одним ударом.

Но лучший гаджет — это бот-паук. С ним можно вообще не заходить в запретную зону, а просто закинуть куда надо и управлять спрятавшись в углу. Тем более что у бота есть и возможность запрыгивать в вентиляцию, и вырубать врагов «фэйсхагом». А после апгрейда даже временная невидимость. Для бота ещё встречаются специальные головоломки, когда до цели вам самим не пролезть в принципе. Но при этом в вентиляции придётся избегать электрических барьеров, что-то переключать для открытия двери, двигать ящики… Сложного обычно ничего нет, но зато вносит разнообразие.

Бывает что паучок, наоборот, не в силах справиться сам. Некоторые терминалы можно активировать только вручную. В особенности это касается систем, блокирующих двери и отключающих тревогу. И освобождать пленников можно только лично подойдя к ним и сказав, что они свободны (а иногда надо прямо сопроводить до выхода). За руль дрона тоже не посадишь, если надо угнать машину.

Хакерская фантазия
Несмотря на технические и дизайнерские проблемы, лично для меня положительные моменты перевешивают. Возможно дело просто в том, что я не играл в предыдущие Watch Dogs, но каждый раз, когда удавалось обезвредить цель взломанной ловушкой или скачать данные через захваченный дрон, доставлял мне огромное удовольствие.

Даже проникновение в униформе несколько раз удавалось. Хотя особые способности различных персонажей мне помогали гораздо реже, чем хотелось бы. Но по крайней мере интересно было заглядывать в «досье» потенциальных рекрутов, периодически обнаруживая связи между знакомыми персонажами. Даже моральные дилеммы возникали — кто важнее, продажный чиновник с полезными для DedSec связями или шантажирующий его бандит, навыки которого тоже могут пригодиться. Кому помочь, а на кого напасть, отправив в больницу с сотрясением? (я вообще старался не пользоваться летальными методами) Про погружение в атмосферу Лондона я уже сказал. И от компании, знаменитой воссозданием исторических локаций в Assassin’s Creed и экзотическими просторами в Far Cry, я не ожидал меньшего.

Поэтому плечистый грузчик или пожилая домохозяйка могут одинаково успешно валить бугаёв в подпольных боях без правил и набивать морды Альбионовским спецназовцам. Зато у шпиона есть личное авто с ракетами и маскировочным полем. Грузчик не только умело орудует разводным ключом, но и может вызвать грузовой дрон, чтобы забраться на крышу. Профессиональный киллер убивает одним выстрелом и почти мгновенно перезаряжает обоймы. У граффити-художника всегда припасена дизориентирующая врагов дымовая шашка. Хакер быстрее скачивает информацию, а в бою при взломе имплантов вирус перекидывается на соседних врагов (где-то я это видел…).

У менее выдающихся горожан и способности менее выдающиеся. Например, просто увеличенный урон, или невосприимчивость к электрошоку, или получение небольшой суммы денег при взломе техники. У бандитов и Альбионцев как правило есть доступ к мощному летальному оружию.

Впрочем, не стоит торопиться затевать потасовку или перестрелку. Чем больше шума вы подымете, тем скорее на сигнал тревоги примчится полиция и Альбион с настоящими пушками и боевыми дронами. Мало того, что испортят вам операцию, так ещё и выбравшись из здания придётся несколько кварталов прятаться от патрулей. Попадётесь — могут и пристрелить. Минус один агент. Хотя если повезёт можете отделаться арестом, тогда персонажа выведут из игры лишь на время (и если в рядах DedSec есть кто-то с перком «адвокат», могут вообще сразу выпустить).

Кстати, иногда попадаются индивиды с «негативными чертами». У кого-то проблемы с властями и потому отсидка дольше. Другой получает больше урона из-за плохого здоровья. А есть люди, которые могут испортить тщательно спланированное скрытое проникновение одним дурацким пердежом. (Если узнали из какого фильма цитата — мои поздравления!)

Крадущийся хакер, затаившийся бот
Стелс-подход всегда самый предпочтительный. Вам даже не обязательно ныкаться по углам если вы завербовали человека, которому по профессии разрешён вход в нужную зону. Спокойно ходите туда-сюда, главное не приближайтесь к охранникам. На всякий случай можно ещё экипировать маскирующий гаджет, делающий вас на время невидимым, или электрошок, позволяющий вырубить сразу нескольких (после улучшения) врагов вокруг одним ударом.

Но лучший гаджет — это бот-паук. С ним можно вообще не заходить в запретную зону, а просто закинуть куда надо и управлять спрятавшись в углу. Тем более что у бота есть и возможность запрыгивать в вентиляцию, и вырубать врагов «фэйсхагом». А после апгрейда даже временная невидимость. Для бота ещё встречаются специальные головоломки, когда до цели вам самим не пролезть в принципе. Но при этом в вентиляции придётся избегать электрических барьеров, что-то переключать для открытия двери, двигать ящики… Сложного обычно ничего нет, но зато вносит разнообразие.

Бывает что паучок, наоборот, не в силах справиться сам. Некоторые терминалы можно активировать только вручную. В особенности это касается систем, блокирующих двери и отключающих тревогу. И освобождать пленников можно только лично подойдя к ним и сказав, что они свободны (а иногда надо прямо сопроводить до выхода). За руль дрона тоже не посадишь, если надо угнать машину.

Хакерская фантазия
Несмотря на технические и дизайнерские проблемы, лично для меня положительные моменты перевешивают. Возможно дело просто в том, что я не играл в предыдущие Watch Dogs, но каждый раз, когда удавалось обезвредить цель взломанной ловушкой или скачать данные через захваченный дрон, доставлял мне огромное удовольствие.

Даже проникновение в униформе несколько раз удавалось. Хотя особые способности различных персонажей мне помогали гораздо реже, чем хотелось бы. Но по крайней мере интересно было заглядывать в «досье» потенциальных рекрутов, периодически обнаруживая связи между знакомыми персонажами. Даже моральные дилеммы возникали — кто важнее, продажный чиновник с полезными для DedSec связями или шантажирующий его бандит, навыки которого тоже могут пригодиться. Кому помочь, а на кого напасть, отправив в больницу с сотрясением? (я вообще старался не пользоваться летальными методами) Про погружение в атмосферу Лондона я уже сказал. И от компании, знаменитой воссозданием исторических локаций в Assassin’s Creed и экзотическими просторами в Far Cry, я не ожидал меньшего.

review:
Если вы хотите сэкономить место на диске, то обязательно удалите ненужные файлы озвучки из папки игры. Я оставил только русскую и английскую, и игра стала занимать всего 60 ГБ вместо 110. Стим не предоставляет возможность выбирать озвучку при загрузке игры, а юплей - предоставляет. Но если вы купили игру в Стим и активировали ее ключом в юплей, то придется качать все файлы. Это очень неудобно и нелогично.

Watch Dogs: Legion - это хорошая геймплейная песочница с интересной механикой вербовки персонажей. Я больше люблю вторую часть серии, которая была ярче и веселее, но Легион тоже доставляет удовольствие от игры. Сюжет не очень захватывает, русская озвучка не всегда подходит к ситуации, физика иногда подводит, прогрессия персонажей не сильно заметна. Но если вы фанат открытых миров и хакерской тематики, то игра вам понравится.

review:
就目前自己遇到的问题谈谈攻略
1.无法验证所有者身份
答：换回自己购买游戏的小号打开游戏
2.明明配置挺高，但还是画面抽搐，掉帧等
答：把设置里directx12换成11
3.卡在“以……身份登录“界面
答：开加速器或者断网运行

目前就这么多，之后遇见问题再更新

review:
Multiple Issues right now:
- Game is not Launching on my Samsung 970 EVO PLUS M.2. SSD (Game is Launching for 10-15 Seconds, the whole PC is freezing and Windows is crashing). I have to put ALL Ubisoft Games on another Storage Drive!
- It needs multiple Launches to get it work. Most of the times the Game is just a Black Screen and nothing happens.
- I have played the Uplay Version on Release and already had a Savegame on Ubisoft Servers. On Steam now, it seems this Savegame is gone from Ubisoft Servers ??? (Im logged into the same Ubisoft Account).
- I have big Problems with ALL Ubisoft Games on Steam! Games are unstable, crashing or wont even start! The Uplay Versions were never a Problem, but since I got them on Steam everything is broken.

FIX THIS ISSUES UBISOFT and give us Achievements for your Games on Steam here! The last (newer) Games I bought on Steam from Ubisoft all dont have any Achievements but they have all Achievements on Uplay ??? So why not here on Steam as well ???

review:
认真的写一个评价把
        1.首先是无主角的设定，任何人都能用，虽然是一个大胆的尝试，但是造成了主线没有代入感，不同成员直接的碰面啊，切换啊以及是关系网的打磨也不行，抓人带来的大量的重复任务更加显得这个系统无趣，而且没有一个任务操控不同角色不同视角的互动，说是一个军团，实际上还是个人在打，总体来说这个系统给玩家带来的感觉是割裂的，
        2.因为这一作强制给不同人物不同职业做出差异化把技能拆得零零碎碎的，实际的游玩体验相当的麻烦，你会发现你有时候那点技能就不够你用，或者，没那么方便，得先抓个无人机之类的，加上育碧喜欢给任务来个强制对战，导致潜入角色尤其是黑客这一类，明显是力不从心，加上枪械无法随意更换，以至于辅助或者半辅助的职业无论是线上线下，都有一种吟游诗人的感觉。职业之间有区分但是玩法最终都走向强突
        3.线上点数的获取相对来说困难且缓慢，这点对于喜欢快快速打通线上的人来说，相当的致命，前期完全没有好人物或者是好的技能来支持你做线上的协作任务，如果不算每日和每周任务额外给的点数来说，大概两小时16点数，但是一个四技能有用的人平均20+点数，何况线上抓到合适的职业也是相当苦难的，稀有职业有刷新点，但是刷新的几率和好技能基本一个人物刷两小时以上把，尤其是什么职业杀手之类的，我是刷了一通宵才出还没好脸蛋。
       4.这一作的驾驶手感有提升，我是手柄玩家，基本上顶着五星满小道漂移是没有问题的，但是无法自己购车，得刷技能。虽然满街都可以抢，但是实际在紧要关头的时候很容易出现难抓车的情况。
       5.线上协力任务没有一个详细的引导，新手游玩不看攻略很多机制关哪怕有人物有技能但基本也是团灭发动机。而且大部分人都有些缺乏耐心，翻车了就容易跑，但是因为游戏人少，结果等半天还是他进来。
       6.ui在倒退，狗2的ui比军团华丽非常多，ui梦回2000年的感觉。
总之我觉得相当差强人意，dlc内容还不错，其他的打一遍体验下就完了，别浪费时间在这游戏上刷人了，要是让我选，狗二会比这个游戏好玩得多，无论是线上还是线下，就算各种细节有提升，但是本身的素质就相当难受，删减部分多到难以接受，导致无时无刻都在感觉繁琐和重复，打折体验一下dlc还是可以的。

review:
『マーカスを返せ』
個人的にはこの一言に尽きる感じがあります。
前作WD2と打って変わって未来になったり市民を仲間にできたり、ついに舞台がアメリカじゃなくなったりと変化が大きい今作ですが、なんというか、いまひとつ面白みにかけてる感じがあります。　
特に前作にあった道端でハックして市民から金を巻き上げたり、無害な住民のプロファイルを改ざんして不当逮捕させたり、ギャングに殺させたりするタイプの、あまり本編で主要な攻撃方法になりにくいハッキングが今作では存在していないことも少し残念なポイントです。
あとは個人的な不満点をあげると、流石にキーコンフィグが大きく変わりすぎていて少しとっつきにくい感じがありましたね。
割引価格だから楽しかったですが、正規料金だと……うーん……って感じです。

review:
・グラフィックや戦闘や世界観描写、操作性はWD2からの流れで普通に良い。しかし仲間の武器や装備のカスタマイズが不可だったりといった点でオープンワールドの面白さは前2作に劣る。車や特殊車両はキャラ固有の物以外は自由に呼び出せないし、武器もキャラで固定。ここに成長要素やカスタム要素を盛り込まなかったのが謎すぎる

・肝心の仲間雇用システムは面白い発想だしコンセプトは理解出来るけど、当然の帰結としてストーリーが薄味。「誰でも主人公になれるストーリー」というのは魅力的な売りではあるが、同時に「誰が主人公でも同じな、どうでもいいストーリー」になってしまっている。DLCを導入していればエイデンやレンチを主人公として使用出来るが、結局根本のストーリーがどうでもいいのでやっぱり微妙。服やアクセサリーの種類が豊富なので仲間キャラに自分なりの個性付けが出来るのは良かった。

・上記の雇用システムにリソースを割きすぎた弊害か、オープンワールドとしての規模や遊びの幅はWD1、WD2から大幅に削減or劣化。仲間に拘ってリクルートミッションを繰り返しプレイすると同じ拠点を何度も制圧することになるのもザラ。アクティビティの数も少ない。

気合を入れてやらないとメインストーリーの制覇までに飽きる可能性が非常に高い。近未来要素のあるロンドンの街並みなどはよく出来ているしそこそこ種類がある乗り物、手軽なドンパチとステルスアクションなどオープンワールドとして最低限の要素は揃っているので、1000円代のセール価格で買うなら悪くないかも。シリーズ初見であれば絶対に1か2からやった方がいいです。
（特にWD1はダークヒーローやアンチヒーローが好きな人にはおすすめ）

review:
Me dói escrever essa análise, mas é necessário...
Bom, lembro que ganhei o Watch Dogs 1, e apesar da jogabilidade mediana, a história excelente me cativou e me encorajou a platinar e a explorar cada centímetro daquele mundo. Quando consegui a última conquista, tive uma mistura de sentimentos de dever cumprido com uma certa tristeza pela despedida. Mas ok, o Watch Dogs 2 estava a caminho e eu estava ansioso para ver o que vinha a seguir.

Então, ainda encantado pelo primeiro game, comprei o WD2, que me trouxe um enredo completamente desleixado lembrando filmes da Sessão da Tarde (5 adolescentes, altas confusões!), e simplesmente não tivemos nem um plot nesse enredo extremamente óbvio, mas ainda assim, a jogabilidade era MUITO superior a do primeiro jogo. E foi aí que vi que precisava platinar ele também. Novamente, explorei cada centímetro desse jogo, peguei TUDO o que eu podia, deixei muita gente triste no PVP, platinei.
Então, quando soube do lançamento do Legion, eu fui dar uma olhada em streams e tudo mais. E a opinião pública foi bem nítida: Decepcionante.

Eu, como fã da série, não quis acreditar. E fui lá e na primeira oportunidade peguei o game pra testar. E cá estou.

Minha opinião sobre o game é: 
Ele pegou a jogabilidade do primeiro jogo e o enredo do segundo, tornou ainda pior no que já era e colocou nessa aberração aqui.
E a Ubi foi além! Não contente em destruir a jogabilidade e o enredo, eles foram lá e meteram microtransações num game que custa R$ 249,00 em sua versão base. Ou seja, se não tiver desconto nenhum, você vai pagar quase 250 reais pra ter um jogo onde pra ter TUDO mesmo, você precisa botar mais grana ainda. E O JOGO NEM É BOM PRA JUSTIFICAR ESSE VALOR COMPLETAMENTE ABSURDO!!  
A Ubi está mantendo seu comportamento clássico de entregar games com qualidade extremamente duvidosas, e está aprendendo com a EA sobre microtransações.
Parabéns Ubi, você evoluiu em como ser ruim.

Enfim, peguei o game por R$ 50,00 nessa promoção que acho que ainda está tendo, mas sinceramente, paguei caro demais.
Eu pretendo ainda terminar o game por respeito a série, mas não pretendo platinar este. 

Devo dizer que é muito triste ver a Ubi jogando fora todo o potencial desse mundo que eles mesmos criaram. No WD1, o potencial foi muito bem explorado. No WD2, poderia ser melhor, mas ainda tava muito bom. No WDL... Bom... Penso que era melhor ter parado no WD2...
E vendo o que a Ubi vem se tornando, arrisco à dizer que este é o último jogo deles que comprarei.

EDIT: Eu disse que pretendia terminar o jogo, mas depois de alguns LONGOS dias jogando esta... Coisa... Não consegui. Jogo terrível em vários sentidos diferentes, repleto de bugs obviamente vindos do lançamento e ignorados até então, e uma história tão cativante quanto assistir a cada momento de um broto de feijão crescendo. Enfim... Não consegui.

review:
Okay, okay, I get it. I just own a RTX 3080 16 GB Notebook GPU and I have 32 GB RAM and a last-year state of the art Intel-CPU in my 2022 Alienware R17 Rig. I totally get it - my Notebook isn't powerful enough to run Legion. And uplay. And Battleeye. And a fuckton of other stuff UBIsoft wants me to run just to play a game that's older than my Rig. 

And then, what's up with UBI-Soft using Steam just as a launcher for their crappy uplay launcher? A launcher for a launcher? Really? No thanks. Just no.

review:
Story ist Psychisch gestört weil die einfach Menschen zu Robotern machen und alle englisch reden mit englischem akzent :( 
WatchDogs 2 ist eine 10/10 
dieses Spiel gehört auf den Scheiterhaufen...
Ich habe noch nie 12€ so hart gewastet
Ich würde meine Niere verkaufen und es wäre nicht so ein waste wie dieses Spiel
ich empfehle es nicht es ist schlecht
Das Hacken (main part vom Game) ist viel schlechter gemacht als zuvor und macht keinen Spaß mehr 
Alle Main-Charaktäre sind Hässlich, Fett, oder Beides
Die Masken sehen noch schlimmer aus als 6ix9ine Tatoos und Das Inventar ist qualvoller als ein Museumsbesuch
NICHT KAUFEN SCAM! 
Scam an Lebenszeit und Freude
Nachdem du dir dieses Spiel kaufst und denkst es wird cool stürzt du dich in einen tiefen Depressiven Abgrund wegen den ganzen Geezern
Das Futuristische London ist schlimmer als jeder UK Drill und bringt einem die Pest
Wenn WatchDogs Legion eine Leiche wäre würde ich sie definitiv schänden
Es kann nicht sein, dass die Entwickler so ein Schmutzprodukt auf den Markt bringen und am Abend noch gut schlafen können

review:
I'm having fun with the game. Bought it on sale and not regretting it.

Have to say that I'm getting tired of review-bombing because they Used Epic/Don't have achievements/Isn't exactly like previous game in franchise/I don't know what settings are/My mum is making me do my homework...

The game runs perfect on my 1080-OC/9900K, solid 74 fps on ultra/very high settings. No Ray tracing/DLSS enabled, so that might help half of people whining in the reviews...

Besides: a quick check would learn the other half of people complaining that.... Watch_Dogs and Watch_Dogs 2 don't have any steam achievements as well!
You need to ask yourself: do I buy the game for achievements or the game itself... Of course achievements give an extra level of game-play, but I personally play a game for the game... Novel idea, I know. I think I might be some sort of divergent or somet... 

The game itself is stunning, love the game-play, not so sure about all the operatives but I'll see. Taking over neighborhoods gives me Saints Row vibes, although I haven't reached that bit of the game yet.
Playing with keyboard/mouse and game-pad for driving, makes it fun to switch. Hacking ATM's has given me quite a few bullet holes in my operative, but it's worth it to see DedSec propaganda on the screens ;)

My only gripe: micro transactions... Yups... Needing to spend money to buy other characters that you'll probably never use for a game that is on steam for 119+ euro is ridiculous... But, again, that has nothing to do with game-play. The game runs just fine and is fun to roam around in ^_^ I don't have the money, so I won't spend it on them, that'll teach em more than review bombing ;)

And for those that have issues with the game starting? Maybe try having Ubi_Connect (see what I did there ;)) running before you start the game... That was an issue with Watch_Dogs 1 as well, so nothing new ;)

review:
Minor bugs and the online service seems to be 50/50 if its online (?). 
Story seems to be weird-ish since there is no really main characters due to having a team system.
Really early on the missions seems really repetive and even boring since you are essentially just driving across the map to do some hacking thing and then driving back. Game is also missing alot of features that you would expect from a 3rd person game like shoulder switching. Mostly bothering my enjoyment was things related to moving from point A to B. Alot of audio issues, possibly floating radio players above streets, cars honking for no reason, npc's dodging the vehicle when not even close to them. Also you have the generic ubisoft driving physics that dont really feel all that great. Sadly ubisoft has already ended the "support" for further updates january 2022.

review:
The concept? Interesting in theory. 

The game? Bland, buggy, and uninspired. I was hoping for a game like Shadow of Mordor with fun randomized customization.

Instead I got a mess where the 'resistance mode' means the game will start 3 star police chases that spawn units that will immediately kill you, almost directly on top of you, if you pick up tech points, drive through the city, or stand in eyesight of any police officer. And the classic mode?

Deleted my entire save file without warning 5 hours in.

I wish I had stuck with the refund.

review:
The AI NPC idea is really cool but looks so bad and lends the game a very cheap feeling due to the poor voice acting and bad looking character models

Game runs very well on my 5800x3D and 3080, get around 90-100 FPS 1440p DLSS Balanced with RT on and all settings mostly maxed except shadows turned down once notch and headlight shadows set to your car only. Indoors it's up to 140 FPS at times. When driving fast, the FPS can go as low as the mid 70s however. Never to 60

review:
Impossible de démarrer le jeu pour la première fois car les services ubisoft sont down et imposent une activation en ligne au préalable.
Encore un exemple de jeu auquel il est plus simple de jouer à une version crackée qu'à sa version légale.

EDIT: Il aura fallu l'utilisation d'un VPN pour activer le jeu et enfin pouvoir le lancer après 2 jours de tentatives.
Tout ça pour un jeu moyen et cringe au possible dans son voice acting

review:
Considered you're able to get this 80% off, it surely is a decent or even good game. It runs just fine on my machine, stable FPS, no crashes, no weird shit with the Ubisoft app. But it does indeed suffer from, well, "Ubisoft degradation", an issue lots of their new(er) games got infected with.
Gameplay is mostly fine, the new recruitment model is quite fun and the story introduction is quite interesting. Sadly, many things are worse than the previous parts, the controls are much more clunky and due to the lack of any "real" protagonist it feels.. unpersonal. You can switch between every recruit, which is actually cool, but unless you consider one of them "your character" there is no "You" in this game.
That's said, back to my initial point: If you can get this 80% off, it's a fair deal for some decent fun.

review:
Edit1: Finalmente resolvi o problema depois de passar umas 3 horas pesquisando, descobri esse [url=https://www.gog.com/forum/general_beta_gog_galaxy_2.0/constant_application_crashes_galaxyclientserviceexe/page2] fórum [/url] parece que a querida Gog estava cagando meu jogo 💀 depois de remover o app, consegui jogar por cerca de 1h até o próximo crash 😭 
Dessa vez o erro foi diferente, depois de pesquisar um pouco achei esse outro [url=https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/answers/questions/537944/tpm-event-logger-error-after-cpu-swap-event-id-86?page=1&pagesize=10&sort=oldest] Fórum [/url] agora da Microsoft, parece que tem algum b.o com a equipe vermelha (vulgo AMD) e o TPM, testei algumas soluções e não deu certo, por fim alguns disseram que depois de atualizar para o Win11 o problema foi resolvido e cá estou com o Win11 e sem crashs (pelo menos por enquanto 🙏) consegui jogar uma 2h sem crashs e rodando ok. 

E por fim to curtindo bastante o game, não sei pq tanto hate, achei legal a pegada de recrutar qualquer um e a aranha é a melhor, quando terminar volto pra editar o comentário  😊

Edit Final: Terminei o game e achei bom demais, algumas missões chatas mas achei a variedade bem legal, o fim foi algo que eu esperava mas me enganou por alguns minutos kkkk mas acho que vale pegar o game em promo e se divertir um pouco. Minha nota final é 8.5

review:
I'm really surprised about this game, it's much worse than Watch dogs 2. Fundamentally, the concept of playing as different random people is an awful idea. I respect that they tried something different here, but it doesn't add to the playing experience. You don't have any connection to the characters you play. If the gaming industry has learned anything from RPGs. it's that gamers like creating a character that they identify with, either as a reflection of themselves, or something completely different that is interesting to them. In this case, we are forced to play as random characters, most of which look like edgy teenagers. 

Another thing that I think was better in other games was the world itself. This weird paramilitary police state version of London is awful. Its not remotely relatable or realistic, and it's incredibly depressing. It doesn't feel like the world has any real life to it, its just a series of cartoon characters. All the characters are doing a weird post apocalyptic dress up. You don't have cars, you can only steal them from the street, while claiming to be "making london a better place". Any character customization is done through a vending machine, there doesn't seem to be shops anymore that you can go in to interact with people. Everything just feels very fake ... 

I really liked the first two games, I played them a lot. So I hope that they make a new one, and I hope it's something that feels more real and less of a depressing cartoon.

This is the first game I ever refunded on steam. It was a mess. For the most part, you choose the members of DedSec from a list of very unremarkable people that come with a weapon and a trait. They feel so lifeless and boring to be around, EVEN the special ones you get from the Ultimate Edition. 

You're supposed to care about the cause and bond with those people, right?
Wrong. Even on Easy mode + no permadeath, if you get caught somewhere, they get arrested and are now off your team. How are you supposed to care about these people? The environment feels like a re-skin of Watch Dogs 2, it's not enough to carry this game. 

I wouldn't get this even on a 99%off sale. What a waste of time.

review:
[b]O jogo é maneiro, mas não entendo essa má otimização, com um 16GB, I7-8700K e uma RTX 3060 ainda tenho quedas de FPS jogando no low, então na faz sentido sendo que o recomendado é bem inferior a isso.

Deixando essa indignação de lado, se for pela historia é bem genérica, rápida e sem graça, de todos os Watch Dogs o primeiro é o melhor. Ao meu ver a unica coisa que salva nesse jogo é ambientação de Londres futurística que foi muito bem feita, e a liberdade de exploração e customização dos personagens.[/b]

review:
Go Play Watch Dogs 2. This game is not worth it. The setting of the game is depressing as it's always dreary.

The Story. DedSec is framed, and you have to recruit people to join, who you can then use on missions. There's no attachment to the characters you play as since they're all generic.

The 'multiplayer'. You have two gamemodes, Playlist and Paper Trail, as well as two pvp modes. They're both dull and get repetitive very, very quickly. There's no co-op campaign, which is why I'm currently asking for a refund.

review:
No tempo desta analise eu pedi um reembolso, sem resposta ate agora mas vim dar minha opinião;

Jogo muito mal otimizado, eu coloco em qualquer qualidade grafica e roda no mesmo fps, no baixo, 49-55 fps, no alto, 49-55, mesma coisa, muitos crashs também, tive que reiniciar meu pc por causa de um bug que havia dado em que a metade superior da tela ficou preta, não recomendo esse jogo nem para os fanaticos por watch dogs, se ao menos fosse mais bem otimizado, dai seria decente, mas não, não vale o preço nem em sale.

review:
I like the London created by the game and the amount of chaos the player can create there. The game eventually becomes a little boring mainly because you don't play as a single character, but rather as a series of randos with different abilities that you select on the street. This means dialogue is generic because it has to fit any number of character types. This gives you a feeling of disconnect from the game world.
I haven't had any technical problems with the game or launcher as much as I hate the launcher, which is extremely slow to open to the point where you wonder whether it's working or not. The game is very demanding on hardware, so don't expect to max out settings unless you've got at least an 11th gen intel i7 or i9 matched with an RTX 3080 or better. Don't bother with ray tracing. It's only for reflections, makes little difference except to tank the fps. Enough fun to be had to justify buying on sale.

review:
Enjoying this title quite a bit. It's not a masterpiece but at 80% off it is definitely worth the price. I haven't played too far through the storyline at the moment as I'm having a lot of fun completing recruit missions. Which is just as well as I have permadeath enabled and keep losing agents.

Ubisoft did a good job of creating London. The visuals look really good though it's no doubt a lot dimmer and darker than the game from memory. Performance wise, it works very well. No stutters or frame drops. Only had a couple of issues 12hrs in which were one offs. Issue with connecting to Ubisoft which eventually resolved itself and the game bugged out when it should have initiated a cut scene with a potential recruit. The cutscene didn't eventuate and my character was stuck on the spot with no way to re initiate the quest or go elsewhere. Had to cntr/alt/delete to get out and fire up the game again. 

As mentioned, I'm enjoying the game. Wouldn't pay full price but did purchase the "Ultimate Edition" for $35AUD. Don't be put off by the trolls feeding off of each other in the review section.

The idea is good. I mean enemy drones, every character can be the main character but the problem is how they look. Somehow the characters look lifeless. Also the end was stupid. Now you might say how so. There was dlc that unlocks aiden right. I played the game with him and the dumbest psrt is where he drops his gun. I MEAN CMON DUDE HE GOT ONE OF THE MOST POWERFUL GADJETS HE COULD HAVE JUST TURNED OFF THOSE DRONES AND SHOT HER. Also after the main character activates the thing where the woman fall off WHERE THE DRONES GO LIKE THEY JUST DESPAWNED. I like the idea I like the gameplay but because the end thats 3/10 for me its not logical like u got 2 drones activate the thing to fall and those drones just sit there and after that despawn please put lil more effort in making the ending.
(You could do special end for aiden no?)

review:
The game itself is really damn good. It comes with a bunch of annoying Ubishit things like collecting stuff on the map to force you to explore, and mini missions as a robot (or bird in AC series). But the gameplay  is solid. 100% worth buying if on sale. 

Some major cons - 
Its an ubi game so it has a million repeat mechanics no player has ever enjoyed
Ubi has yet to date learned to how to develop driving mechanics in games
Ubushit connect - Almost as bad as EAs

Pros
the story is solid full of turns
the gameplay is damn good. Although this game is pretty easy... it can have some challenges. 
Graphically its really good to look at but they did not recreate London to spec. They did nail some major sites but I would have liked to see some smaller details.

review:
Probably the most boring and soulless game I have ever played
Between the most the most banal political takes known to man and snarky lines you'll find repetitive quests, horrific combat, and an absolutely mind numbing, uninspired "story" if you can even call it that. It would be an insult to mid games to call this one mid.

None of the characters are interesting at all, not that there's many other than your eternally shifting roster of pawns with five different VAs. The ones who are present however seemingly just loiter around while having less personality than a WoW quest giver.

The story isn't even worth mentioning, it's bland, boring, uninspired. The only good thing about it being how funny seeing the similarities of COVID era policies in this dystopian "future London" matched with just regular UK things such as being arrested for saying something on twitter or being beat to death by a cop on a power trip.

Oh, and this game has been out for what? Three years now? And there's still bugs out the ass. Good luck keeping a low profile when a barrel spontaneously explodes for no reason alerting the entire area that you're there. Some of them are actually somewhat funny, like cars deciding to ram each other or pedestrians getting bulldozed by a truck that decides to take the side walk.

Combat is horrible, either you're popping your head out of cover to shoot enemies a few times or you're dodging a melee attack then hitting them back until they fall down. Better enjoy those recycled melee animations because you will see the same counter and take-down for the entirety of the game.

And it wouldn't be a Watchdogs game if there was a smidge of customization. Granted there is a decent array of the most atrocious clothes known to man with a few exceptions. However you still cannot own a car let alone customize one. Cars of course being the same ten bland looking cubes which can take you anywhere on a map the size of my fingernail. The only good customization was the masks,

There are "collectibles" but they're insanely easy to get as you can just hack a construction drone, fly it to wherever the collectible is and pick it up making it a game of running the same errand until all it complete. Whatever "puzzles" they tried to implement with spider-bots were really just holding down W until you're there then clicking E.

Lastly the missions themselves are about as engaging as watching paint dry. Pretty much you just sneak around some generic compound, stealth killing, then hack into whatever it is that needs to be hacked into then you're done! Now rinse and repeat until the game is done utilizing the same tried and true methods with no new gadgets or enemies.

Overall I guess it's worth the whole $12 I spent on it, though the fact they charged more for this dumpster fire of a game at one point is an insult to every single human being on the planet.

review:
This games is Gorgeous with all the Graphic settings maxed out and Raytracing at Ultra setting which makes London come alive. played about 11 hours before this review never had any bug or crashes.
If we talk about gameplay this is unique, we don't have one protagonist but whole city AI can be made as a operative who come with their own skills which make difference where each mission can be done in so many different ways.
Only think that can be elevated for user experience if they have also provided steam achievements and steam cards for this game but for me this is not a deal breaker at the price point.
Running this game on:
window 11 Pro 10.0.22621 Build 22621, 12700k, 3080ti, 32Gb Ram at 1440p. I have locked my fps at 65 because don't want extra fps and power consumption for a Single player game. Didn't test Dlss for this game yet but if i do will update the review with performance.
Conclusion: It's a must buy if your are fan of Franchise and holding on to buy it because of it's unavailability on the platform.
Also for some Ubisoft launcher is a issue but for me never had once after intiail attaching game to my preferred ubisoft account i never had once open ubisoft for login it happens automatically once i click play button on steam it open ubisoft on its own mind i also have Rainbow6siege which is attached to different ubisoft account so no issue with launcher too where i have to juggle with login different ubisoft account.

review: One simple thing ruined this game for me, the Assassin's Creed mission. If you buy this game, i urge you to create a save file before you start this mission, as once you are in it there is no going back. They decided it would be an absolute genius idea to add a jumping puzzle to a game that doesn't already have a jump button, so instead it uses the vaulting mechanics, very, very, VERY, poorly. I have been doing a 3 jump puzzle that should have taken 5 minutes, for 2 hours. All because of the brain dead, vegetable-state employee who decided that THIS is how people wanted to spend their time in this game. Each jump is inconsistent to the last, and any fall past the first jump, takes about 30 seconds to get back to the puzzle. I have never seen such a absolute fucking trash pile of a mission, i'd rather play the entirety of the Dark Souls Series, than this singular puzzle, because somehow it would be easier, and more fair, than this absolute shitmess of a level. It must have been designed by a slug, or something of a equal brain function. Because no good game dev would playtest this shit, and think it runs well. Great job Ubisoft for turning a pretty good 8/10 into a literal 1/10 due to unplayability. As usual with Ubisoft, maybe next year, though probably not, cause it's Ubisoft. EDIT: After doing a reddit search, (imagine having to rely on reddit rather than the game), it turns out that you have to hold both shift and spacebar the whole time, (a mechanic that has never been explained in the game, no tutorial or anything) So in other words, UBISOFT, please for the love of sweet baby jesus himself, 100% EFFORT PLEASE. You had such a cool design and idea for a level, and it's all been ruined by a simple lack of a image with some damn text telling you how to use the auto parkour. Genius idea gents. EDIT 2: After giving the game another shot, I can officially say that this game is going in my steam playlist titled, "Absolute Shit. Do Not Play." The reason being, I had just done a pretty challenging puzzle, and needed to get off the game as most adults do. So i select to save my game, at no point at all is there any sort of warning or anything that tells me it will restart me AT THE LAST CHECKPOINT! It's a basic common function of video games! Even past Ubisoft games have had this feature!!! I genuinely think at some point the dev team took a break and had their toddler children take over the development process after a certain point because it is the only explanation for why such simple caveman painting mechanics weren't added to the game!!! Now I would have to had to redo the entire puzzle and also the fight before the puzzle as well. that is about 15 minutes of progress it reset me back too. ON A MANUAL SAVE!!. Safe to say I will not be buying another ubisoft game until the dev team comes back and the literal toddlers are gone from the development. It is absolutely stunning to me that they can charge 60-70 dollars for this garbage. I've seen more care and quality from single man studios and indie developers. Get a grip Ubisoft for once, please. From ACIII and Black Flag to this? How to you fall so low? Shame on you for charging full price for this crap. I'd reccomend only grabbing a ubi game when they're on sale. Don't grab their games at full price, at this rate it's honestly a scam. One of the worst gaming experiences I have ever had, and I played LOTR: Gollum. Disgraceful.

review:
I'm not a a great fan of Ubisoft, their CEO or Chris Early's remarks.  However IMO this game is pretty good and doesn't deserve the hate its been getting on steam.  

So far I'm around 25 hours into the game and I appreciate the following aspects.
* Price ($20NZD (Around 12USD) for the base model at the time of purchase.  
* Graphics are great with nice character animations.
* Characters have some depth and are well voice acted.
* Controls are greatly improved on previous watchdogs (I'm a keyboard and mouse player, a game pad would 
   make it better).
* Decent sized open world with plenty of side quests to do.
* Story line great so far.  
* A easy difficulty for useless players like me to get though the game and enjoy the story :)
*  Different ways to attach each mission from Rambo to steal to the use of technology (Drones, cameras etc).
*  Has some nicer Easter eggs referencing other games.    

Dislikes.  (I think most people will agree with me here).
*  Requirement for a 3rd party app and ELU agreement to play etc.
*  No steam achievements (any achievements give you points in the Ubisoft app).
*  The option to buy (with real money) in game money to buy outfits and skins etc.
*  Save function seems a little sketchy with a common message saying "cannot connect to cloud".  My review will be come seething if my save gets stuffed up after 25 hours lol.

In summary a really good game for the price.

However IMO this game is pretty good and doesn't deserve the hate its been getting on steam.  

So far I'm around 25 hours into the game and I appreciate the following aspects.
* Price ($20NZD (Around 12USD) for the base model at the time of purchase.  
* Graphics are great with nice character animations.
* Characters have some depth and are well voice acted.
* Controls are greatly improved on previous watchdogs (I'm a keyboard and mouse player, a game pad would 
   make it better).
* Decent sized open world with plenty of side quests to do.
* Story line great so far.  
* A easy difficulty for useless players like me to get though the game and enjoy the story :)
*  Different ways to attach each mission from Rambo to steal to the use of technology (Drones, cameras etc).
*  Has some nicer Easter eggs referencing other games.    

Dislikes.  (I think most people will agree with me here).
*  Requirement for a 3rd party app and ELU agreement to play etc.
*  No steam achievements (any achievements give you points in the Ubisoft app).
*  The option to buy (with real money) in game money to buy outfits and skins etc.
*  Save function seems a little sketchy with a common message saying "cannot connect to cloud".  My review will be come seething if my save gets stuffed up after 25 hours lol.

In summary a really good game for the price.

review: 为了评测特地在steam上又买了一次，游戏本体＋dlc我早年就已经通关了。总的来说就是：这是我买过最烂的游戏，把这坨答辩和2077对比还是太抬举它了。一二代美术设计都很优秀可圈可点，军团整的像个氪金手游似的，真的很想高价回收没看过狗3美术的眼睛（作为预购黄金版的玩家我还得说一句，真的失望，本来很期待狗3结果育碧给我呈上这样依托半成品，更别提发售不到一个月就打折背刺，吃相真难看啊

review:
My rating: 6.5/10. The game is worth getting 80% off. It'll keep you entertained for a couple of days. 
However, it is not better than Watch Dogs 1 or 2 IMO. The game is little mechanical depth and having multiple specialized operatives does not help the game much. Instead of one main character, you play generic characters with multiple specializations that you can swap at anytime. The problem is, that the sum of all these specialized characters equal one protagonist from the previous games. Aiden or Marcus could do all the things your army of operatives can do, but in one character. 

The game would perhaps be interesting if you could have teams on missions, but you essentially cannot. I think this game would honestly be better if there was like between 6-12 operatives that are highly specialized with unique personalities you can swap. Instead, you can "Recruit anyone" (most people are useless, some have negative traits, unless you play the permadeath mode and just need bodies to throw at missions).

The story is okay but not memorable. The motives of the villains are flawed and don't make sense, especially the main villain. I'm not going to explain too much, it's a typical low effort video game story that overuses tropes from fiction. In fact, the story is just one trope after the other.

On performance, no crashes, stable FPS. Some other people had problems, but I did not. I installed it, had to login on to Ubiconnect or whatever and played the game. No problems. Who knows why other people have problems with the game, bad computers, didn't update drivers, or perhaps they're just bad at installing things. Not to say some people don't have problems, just saying in my experience the problems described seem user related.

review:
First Review i have ever given on Steam. I was excited to try this new games having like the first two, excitement lasted seconds, for cringe set in..

I just had to stop anyone spending money on this. Characters voice over sound like they're from people who've never been to London, over acted, like it was done by parody comedy cast without the humour. London looks decent but you'll be running around it a lot, first mission sent be half way across the map to "walk in, press a button, Mission Complete". 80% of just isn't worth it

review:
Despite hearing only negatives about this game, I decided to try it out.

Don't make my mistake.

I played through the lil opening sequence at the House of Commons. Chose my first 3 agents. Immediately got in a car. Oof. idk how to explain it but the vehicles feel so wrong. They're floaty and 'sticky' big no.

But truly my main complaint after driving around the map? It's so damn small and an, honestly, insulting representation of London. It visually looks nothing like London. The buildings do not have scale to them. The streets are empty (with NPCs that duck any time you're 30 feet within them in a vehicle btw). It's missing key landmarks and stations. I get London is a complicated city to replicate and it would be super taxing on performance to add a semi-realistic number of NPCs / scale the city properly, but the graphics look AWFUL on ultra settings with raytracing. 

This game is a joke. Avoid it like the plague.

I get London is a complicated city to replicate and it would be super taxing on performance to add a semi-realistic number of NPCs / scale the city properly, but the graphics look AWFUL on ultra settings with raytracing. 

This game is a joke. Avoid it like the plague.", "timestamp_created": 1675078581, "timestamp_updated": 1675078581, "voted_up": false, "votes_up": 5, "votes_funny": 1, "weighted_vote_score": "0.522652685642242432", "comment_count": 0, "steam_purchase": true, "received_for_free": false, "written_during_early_access": false, "primarily_steam_deck": false}

review: En rasgos generales no es un mal juego. El problema es que en un punto se vuelve bastante repetitivo y más allá de que tenes una variedad de cosas para hacer, los formatos de misiones no son muy variados como uno esperaría. El online está bastante abandonado, imposible encontrar personas para jugar.  Con respecto a problemas, no experimenté una enorme cantidad de bugs en comparación a la tradición que Ubisoft suele tener en sus juegos, pero quizás es mi suerte.Recomiendo encarecidamente comprarlo de oferta. Yo lo agarré en 80% de salida, no puedo quejarme mucho, pero no se puede dejar atrás la cantidad de falencias que tiene este juego comparado a los anteriores

review:
Why does this game get so much unnecessary hate? (I finished it on PS and now i'm planning on PC)

The gameplay is still better than in WD2! and i personally enjoy it a lot. The graphic page of London is incredible for the year 2023 (Especially if you have Ray tracing in evening) The recruitment is interesting, you can play as an old lady, which I think is quite funny. I recommend this game and i certainly don't deserve the unnecessary hate. The story is interesting and finally the game is more mature and not as if it was created for teenagers.

But then again, the game has a pretty significant flaw

Driving model is terrible and i would have expected it to be repaired after so many years, but alas, nothing AGAIN so maybe in Watch Dogs 4.

Unfortunately we don't have it on Steam (As in Valhalla, Breakpoint..)

1. No Steam cards.
2. No Achievements
3. Still i need Ubisoft Connect - EA and Microsoft also have this, but it's annoying.

#NO-EGS - It may be good for developers, but certainly not for us players. Exclusive games are not good for both console and PC players :)

BTW.. Check my other reviews too.

review:
Fun game with a lot going for it. I bought the game via Ubisoft a while back and had about 130+ hours on my save. When I saw it was 80% off on steam, and Platinum rated on www.protondb.com, it was a no brainer. Been loving the game on my Steam Deck. It runs buttery smooth and actually seems to load faster on my deck than my desktop computer with an i9 and RTX 2080.

Cons:
The voice acting for the various citizens can be cringe-worthy at times.
Game-play loop can feel repetitive at times.

Pros:
Runs and looks great, even on my Steam Deck.
Combat and mechanics are still Watch Dogs which I love.
Massive customization thanks to having 20 active operatives and about as many potential recruits.
The special and elite operatives feel special and not just a re-skinned citizen.
I was able to use my cloud save from Ubisoft Connect so no lost progress.

All in all I’d recommend as at 80% off it’s easy to get your moneys worth with this title.

review:
For all its flaws (story and politics aside) its a pretty neat game. It is genetically very much a standard ubisoft sandbox but with some very interesting mechanics and systems that make it worth a second look. 

To understand why the game is brilliant in its own way DO NOT PLAY ON EASY MODE. The real enjoyment of the game comes from the challenge of running a resistance network of npcs who can actually die if you mess up (and do almost always on hard mode). 

It makes every police chase an actual life or death struggle that could end very badly for you if you hit too many pedestrians or hit too many police checkpoints. It makes every infiltration mission an intense game of cat and mouse between the superior forces of the enemy and their security vs your cunning use of the stealth/destraction/environmental mechanics. On hard mode you can still cheese some parts of the game by flying around on a larger drone but it is very easy to get caught with your pants down doing that (especially in the early game) as the enemy have access to deadly drone swarms just like you do. I have lost more than 3 operatives this way. 

The city of London is also very stunning with an amazing amount of detail and plenty of stunning cyberpunk vistas (especially at night and in the rain if you have the hardware for some decent settings)

Id really think about giving this game a shot if its on sale or youre looking for an itch that cyberpunk 2077 didnt quite scratch mechanically.

review: Lo jugué alrededor de 30 horas antes de que saliera en steam, y me parece que para el precio en oferta es mas que recomendable, me gusta mucho la saga. pero para disfrutar mas este juego recomiendo jugarlo con muerte permanente de personajes, ya que le das mas importancia a cada personaje y te concentras menos en cometer fallos por ir rápido.

review: Já que sei que muitas pessoas não tem tempo para ler análises longas,vou ser breve,eu comprei o jogo á 70 reais na promoção,é um jogo bem divertido,london futuristica é bem bonita,e a parte de recrutamento do dedsec é um passo á frente nesse quesito,já que no primeiro Watch Dogs,você quase que não tem interação e no 2 o conceito não é muito explorado,mas no Legion você de fato vê que são pessoas das mais variadas possíveis em quesito de aparência e empregos;agora em aspectos técnicos,eu nunca tive problema algum com bugs no jogo (sim,impressionante né? parecia que o jogo nem era da Ubi) mas enfim,apenas compre se é fã da franquia ou se tiver em promoção,fora disso,não vale 250 reais nem a pau

review:
When I start the game it hangs at "Logging in". The issue does not happen if I run it with uplay directly. But... Who wants to use that?
When I play there are multiple bugs. Like the Sound disappears for a second or the game lags when I drive cars. My setup is good enough to run Cyberpunk in a decent quality so I assume there are some performance issues that need to be fixed before I reconsider to play this game.
The story was shallow as far as I played it until I requested a refund. 
A sad result since I was a big fan of the series until now.

review:
Oyunun cidden bir optimizasyon problemi olduğunu düşünüyorum. Oyunda bulunan animasyonlar pek kaliteli olmamış , grafikler fena değil ancak yer yer yavan kaldığı oluyor. Görevlere gelirsek görevler ne iyi ne kötü idare eder ancak pek tatmin edici değil. Oyunu 16 Saat oynayıp bitirmeden bırakmak zorunda kaldım. 16 saat sürenin 1-2 saati grafik ayarlarını denemekle - 4-6 saati yan görevlere ve oyunun dünyasını inceleyerek geri kalan süreyi ise ana hikayeyi oynayarak deneyimledim. Sonuç olarak oyunun GOLD sürümünü 89-90 TL civarında aldım ve oyunun yanında Watch Dogs Complate yani 1 oyun ve tüm dlcleri içeresinde olan paketi de verdi. Kısacası Gold Sürüm indirimdeyken alınabilir. Karar sizindir.


GÜNCELLEME : Oyunu an itibariyle bitirmiş bulunmaktayım ancak dialogların %90 dan fazlasını geçmişimdir. Yani sırf para verdiğim için zorla bitirdiM !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

review:
This game often goes on sale for about 15-20€! Definitely worth the wait for that :)

I bought this because it was cheaper to get a gold edition copy on here than upgrade my Ubi version to add the season pass. I have got quite a few hours on the Ubi version. It's genuinely a super fun game to play, decent story and fun game mechanics and puzzles. I do hope Ubi will come back to their recent titles like thisone and add steam achievements and some more integration. Would be a very nice addition. I haven't tried the Expansion nor Online Co-Op yet, so I am excited to  try that, I'll update this review accordingly once I have done that. On sale, this game is definitely worth the pick up!

Looking to transfer your savefile from the Ubi version like I did?

review:
I played this on Ubisoft Connect during a free trial of their subscription service. I refunded the game on Steam, but have about 10 hours of playtime.

The game is your bog-standard Ubi shit open world game with a boring story and filler content. I do appreciate they tried something new with the rogue-lite character system instead of a standard protagonist, but you will end up using only a handful of overpowered characters anyway. The voice acting is horrendous on your characters, but the rest of the main cast is serviceable. The problem with Legion is like every other Ubishit game - a bland, checklist-ticking open world devoid of life or real challenge. After the first 2 hours of the game, you've seen everything the game has to offer.

review:
2025 review update: treat this game like a pokemon gatcha game, and its the best we ever had.

I played 7 hours the day after my purchase. And it crazy how I STILL want to play more hours.

edit: 8.6/10 good idea, bad execution. however I still recommend to play this game. this is the only game that is brave enough to did such innovation, and it is not that bad. its good actually. maybe the next watchdogs game will fix all the issue.

Played "okay" for the first day. Benchmark is a lie, runs at 60fps then in the actual game it's 20fps. But now on the second day and the game won't even boot, just stuck at a black screen... Seems to be a common issue that Ubisoft refuses to fix, so this is likely my last Ubisoft purchase :/

EDIT: Found a workaround to get passed the black screen so far. Had to add -dx11 in Steam launch options, also running dx11 improved frame rates massively. Still sticking to "not recommended" because Ubisoft isn't helpful in the least about these things and doesn't at all seam to care about the consumers of their products a after they've already acquired their non-refundable payments.

review:
Kann ich Watch Dogs Legion empfehlen? Ja.
Kann ich es für den vollen Preis empfehlen? Nur wenn man ein absoluter Fan ist.

Ein Extremer Unterschied zu Teil 1 und 2. Plötzlich kann man sich seine eigene Crew aufbauen, das Grundgerüst wird hierbei nicht angefasst. Ich finde es ganz cool seine eigene Rasselbande zusammenzuschrauben, wobei man auf die komischsten Gestalten trifft. 

Neue Crew-Mitglieder bringen (je nach dem welche man Rekrutiert) neue Sachen mit, wobei Ubisoft natürlich den Geldgierigen Daumen in die Wunde legt und dir versucht krasse Charakter schmackhaft zu machen. Doch wenn man durch London spaziert findet man von Attentäter bis Obdachlose alle arten von Rekruten, die Bock haben etwas zu verändern.

Ich hab zu meinen erstaunen auch kaum etwas Auszusetzen. Anfangs dachte ich "Naja, ist halt Watch Dogs". Aber jetzt hab ich mittlerweile richtig Bock mir eine Gruppe aus Clowns, Obdachlosen und Politikern zusammenzustellen.

Leider lässt das spiel mit Waffen etc zu wünschen übrig. Wenn man hier mit normalen Geld etwas kaufen möchte, wird man erschrecken das nur Kosmetische Objekte zum verkauf stehen. Wenn man aber darüber hinweg schaut, ist es echt gelungen.

review:
没有差评说的那么垃圾，自己塑造主角的游戏多了去了，怎么不骂老滚是垃圾啊，老滚的主角连话都不会说（别喷，看我游戏库，我是杯赛的忠实舔狗）。
当然玩法相比前两作大砍也是真的，限定职业才有载具的设定太痛苦了，这是开放世界游戏，一些区域搞不到空车逼得我打开风灵月影超级速度。宝可梦收集的玩法真的好有意思，目前沉迷于圆环刷黑客，就是刷不到一个不带Debuff的，= =。而且人物关系网的这个饼真的画大了，除了招人时的难易度以外毫无用处，有关系的角色之间也没有特殊对话。

review:
Ez a játék konkrétan semmi. Nincs fő karaktere, nincs jó története, az összes side character unalmas, az open world unalmas és nem lehet benne semmit se csinálni. Grafika szép meg minden de közbe olyan szarul van optimizálva hogy szétbassza a gépem. Az egész történet olyan feelinget ad mintha egy 5 éves írta volna (kivéve 1 db olyan rész ami egész jó volt de az is csak kb 15 perc volt). Az egész "játsz bárkivel" cucc annyira szarul van megcsinálva, hogy direkt próbálom elkerülni, és az hogy nincs fő karakter ahhoz vezet, hogy nem érdekel, hogy mi történik a történetbe (ami amúgy egy 300 kg os darab szar) ezért egyáltalán nem érdekel, hogy mi történik a karakterekkel mer senkinek sincs semmilyen igazi kapcsolata. 
Ez az egyetlen játék amit megbántam hogy megvettem. Ultra nagy kár mert mindkét előző játékot halálra imádtam és többször is újrajátszottam őket, még ezt a szart alig bírtam egyszer végigjátszani. 41 óra elment az életemből erre a szar unalmas lélektelen "játékra". 
Egyáltalán nem ajánlom senkinek, még akkor se, ha 0.01 euró.
Rip 5000 ft, örökké velem leszel és bocsánatot szeretnék kérni azért hogy erre kidobtalak.

依托答辩
这看门狗军团育碧吃相未免太难看
狗2DLC到军团直接开始内购，一个角色1100币折港币80
玩法与2相比大大减少，继承了反派NPC一贯的瞎子作风
合作模式还是待开发，联机模式最多四人跟2相比毫无可比之处
虽然能支持光追了但是光追效果极其一般

芝加哥很美，旧金山很美，伦敦很美
但你育碧就是依托答辩
顺带嘴一句重装系统存档全丢是个什么玩意儿

review: 9 Saatlik deneyimimi anlatıyorum... Yakın dövüş güzel fakat anlamadığım bir şekilde kendi kendine silah çekiyor karakter onun nedeni nedir cidden bilmiyorum acayip sinir edici bir durum, bu durum yüzünden bir çok karakterimi kaybettim. DLSS çalışmıyor arkadaş, ekran kartını kullanımını sadece düşürüyor ve aynı performansı veriyor. Mesela dlss kapalıyken 45 fps alıyorsam dlss açıkken 42-45 fps alıyorum. DLSS in seçenekleri var biliyorsunuz fakat dlss seçenekleri hiçbirşeyi ekilemiyor. Ek olarak ulan adamlar ışınlanmayı bulmuşlar ama kademe kademe ışınlanıyo ibineler önüme çıkıyolar bir anda... Ama 9 saat nasıl geçti anlamadım :D

review:
Skip to the bottom if you want a quick summary.

Single player is good. Decent story and some cool activities to pair with both Iconic characters and fresh, new faces. Most gameplay aspects come from previous titles, however it seems a bit easier to hack everything as the progression is very linear this time around and requires only a handful of the Tech upgrades to max something out. Gunplay is mid in my opinion and very... floaty? The bullets have weird velocity that I can't quite understand and the aiming is jarring. I'm not sure how to describe it but it's not like any other TPS Ubisoft has made (in a bad way). This however is made up for by having some really cool CQC mechanics with variable animations, weapons, strengths and weaknesses depending on your choice of operator. The stealth mechanics are exactly what you would expect of an Ubisoft game. You can either sneak in, kill everyone quietly or be seen, or you can sit outside whatever area you're breaking into and get around with cameras, spiders or drones and do nearly everything you could do in-person without any risk or real effort. 
The open world is interesting to me, especially the random interactions that NPCs have, most of which replace the Crime-In-Progress style alerts you would get in the first game, or allow you to complete recruitment tasks depending on if the NPC you are helping is somehow related to / is a potential recruit. Police interactions are weak as the vehicle chases are laughably bad. I don't know if it was intentional that Ubi make all of the cops completely useless at completing menial tasks let alone their jobs, but something tells me it's just bad AI that's been made for babies, even on the higher difficulties. This being paired with the design of the map makes a lot of otherwise tense situations feel really weak and uninspired. If anything happens, no matter who's aggressive towards you, if you get into any vehicle and drive in nearly any direction you will escape them. I've gotten away on a forklift before by just driving in a straight line down a main road.
The overall design of the game is nice, the graphics are good although with some small issues from TAA with hair, skin, reflections and foliage, but those can be fixed by swapping to SMAA given you don't mind the slight downgrade in visual clarity and edge-smoothness. The audio is alright. Not much to say about it, it's not bad, but it's definitely not amazing. Some things are really quiet and other things are too loud and usually they aren't what you'd expect them to be. Performance was a worry for me as I only have a Radeon RX 6600, so it's comparable to a 1080ti with the added option of Ray-Tracing, but I was pleasantly surprised to see the game run well on mostly high settings with RT off. Some areas that are littered with peds, cars, particles and fogs can be difficult, but those areas aren't super common. I do regularly notice a fair amount of pop-in textures, props and models though, sometimes the models of peds and cars can be seen flying around at insane speeds and clipping through walls, so it's not super impressive or anything but it's good looking most of the time.
Finally, we can finish this review off with some thoughts on the online experience. I will firstly say that I really wished that they would stick with the seamless co-op from WD2 because it worked very well and it was immersive to see players going around and doing crazy shit while you're travelling the map to your next destination and then have the option to team up with them and do events or missions together. It was a unique experience that still hasn't left my heart, but it seems it left Ubisoft's because they ditched it for a laggy, unoptimized, glitch-filled P2P experience that crashes consistently for seemingly no reason at all. I can't even say anything good about it yet because I can't really play it for more than 20 minutes without it crashing. This really disappoints me, and I'm sure that it disappoints all of the other WD fans that have stuck with the series since the reveal of Watch Dogs back in 2012. I hope Ubisoft manages to fix this, even though they've stated that they won't be updating the game anymore, because if they don't then I won't be buying another WD game again.

Overall, game is worth ~$20. Don't buy it for any more than that, and don't play the Online until Ubisoft patches it. If they patch it, that is.

This really disappoints me, and I'm sure that it disappoints all of the other WD fans that have stuck with the series since the reveal of Watch Dogs back in 2012. I hope Ubisoft manages to fix this, even though they've stated that they won't be updating the game anymore, because if they don't then I won't be buying another WD game again.

Overall, game is worth ~$20. Don't buy it for any more than that, and don't play the Online until Ubisoft patches it. If they patch it, that is.", "timestamp_created": 1675119298, "timestamp_updated": 1675119298, "voted_up": true, "votes_up": 0, "votes_funny": 1, "weighted_vote_score": 0.5, "comment_count": 0, "steam_purchase": true, "received_for_free": false, "written_during_early_access": false, "primarily_steam_deck": false}

review: An open world cyberpunk action game where you play the agents of a hacktivist group taking on the fascist government. I like the story, the fact that you can recruit pretty much any character in the game to your cause, but I ragequit when I hit the missions that were jumping puzzles. The traversal gameplay is not great, and missions where your characters have to leap ledge to ledge often results in them just falling instead. I ran into one, gave it a solid try, and then had to just uninstall rather than continue to deal with the frustration.

review: I love this game! It is goofy and funny and the sarcastic AI puts in a ton of work! It some ways it better than the second game. In some ways it is worse. The skill tree is less complex and one cannot pull off some of the more wild shenanigans from the second one, BUT this game has its own unique methods of fun. I love being able to recruit anyone I can see. The fact that anybody I pick up is a fully voiced character to play the campaign is crazy to me! The unique character with unique skills offers a lot of flexibility on how to complete missions. I can grab a fighter who takes less damage and heals on kills and go punch the world, I can also have a member from each faction and just walk through any area I want. I can just keep hypnotizing people to kill there friends for me. There are a ton of options! I get to dress all these people up and change their hair and all that as well. It is a fun time and the game does not take itself too serious in a way that always makes me laugh. I bought it when if first came out and seeing it on steam for $12 I got it again and I am enjoying playing through it again!

review: I got the game back when it was 12$ bucks. I would recommend it at that price but now that it's full absolutely not and even half is pushing it. I did enjoy my 20 hours with the game though didn't get far in the story but did alot of side content. It's a ubisoft game you can assume how good the writing and story is. Collecting operatives with special roles and abilities is pretty fun and using them in the proper missions is also fun. Now where they fuck this up is having the option to go "covert" get thrown out the window during some missions where the second you hack something every enemy within a 500m radius knows your exact location and is coming to push your shit in. On the permadeath difficulty this is double annoying as all the time you put into getting that op is flushed down the toilet as you're deep in enemy territory with nothing but a silenced pistol a dream and three cloaked enemies with shotguns coming to bend you over.

review:
[h1]どの要素もそれなりに高いレベルにまとまったオープンワールドゲーム[/h1]
※難易度ノーマル相当でメインミッションクリア

[個人的ゲーム概要]
WatchDogs:Legionの最も特徴的な要素は、Legionを称する通り決まった主人公が存在しないことだ。プレイヤーはミッションをこなすことで、道端を歩く人間を多数自由にプレイヤーキャラクターとして採用できる。彼ら一人一人に特徴や職業、経歴などが設定されていて、それに目を通すだけで時間を潰してしまう人もいるだろう。また、オープンワールドゲームとしてもそれなりに高い水準にまとまっているため、自分だけのキャラクターでミッションをクリアしていく楽しみが感じられる。ただ、この誰でも主人公であるLegion最大の要素には、個人的には幾つか問題がある様にも感じられた。

[個人的良点]

・採用ミッションをこなせば本当に誰でもプレイヤーキャラにすることが出来る。スパイや通訳やモデル、果ては殺し屋や浮浪者に至るまでそれなりの数の職業のNPCがオープンワールドに存在し、また彼ら一人一人に特徴が設定されている。有利になるものや不利になるものもあり、歩きながらNPCに設定されているそれらを眺めるだけでも楽しい。
・一方でゲーム中で使用できるガジェットは各キャラクター共通であり、どれもかなり便利。クモ形の小型機械で潜入するも良し、透明になりながら肉体一つで突っ込んでいくのも良し、ドローンをハッキングして手足の如く使うのも良し。ある程度好きに暴れながらミッションをこなせる。
・最初の最初から飛行できる乗り物が使え、中々再現度の高いロンドンの街並みを空から見下ろすことが出来る。ミッションでも非常に有用で、飛びながら侵入口を探していくだけでも面白く感じられた。
・バグやクラッシュにはほとんど遭遇しなかった。

[個人的微妙点]

・キャラクター一人一人に確かに特徴はあるのだが、ごく一部の能力を持つキャラクターやDLCキャラクターを除いてガジェットのパワーには遥かに及ばないように感じた。ガジェットさえ強化してしまえばどんな特徴を持ったキャラクターでもある程度楽にミッションをクリアできるため、わざわざキャラクターを適材適所で使う必要性が薄い。誰でも使えるようにするための配慮かもしれないが、結局"ガジェットさえ持っていれば誰でもいい"になってしまっていた。
・ミッション内容がそれなりに単調。敵対的な組織の施設に侵入して証拠集めや工作を行うものが多く、その単調さも適材適所の必要性のなさに拍車をかけている。
・ストーリーは良くも悪くも普通。大筋は変わらないがプレイキャラによって声や語句が若干変化するためその点は楽しめた。とは言え誰でも主人公に出来る都合上、プレイキャラよりも相棒的存在のAIの方に焦点が当たりがちなようにも思えた。もっとも皮肉的だがユーモアに富んでいるため、個人的には気にならなかったが。

[個人的総評]

どの要素も楽しめはするが、突き抜けた何かはないように思えたオープンワールドゲーム。最大の特徴であるNPCをプレイヤーキャラクターとして採用できるシステムもはじめは斬新だったが、ゲーム体験に画期的な新鮮さをもたらしたようには思えなかった。ただ有用なNPCを探すためにふと通りを散策したくなったり、最初に登用したキャラクターで最終ミッションに挑んだ際には感じられたものがあったり、決して面白さに寄与しないわけではない。ちょっと変わった切り口のオープンワールドゲームを遊びたい時には、お勧めの一本だ。

※難易度ノーマル相当でメインミッションクリア

[個人的ゲーム概要]
WatchDogs:Legionの最も特徴的な要素は、Legionを称する通り決まった主人公が存在しないことだ。プレイヤーはミッションをこなすことで、道端を歩く人間を多数自由にプレイヤーキャラクターとして採用できる。彼ら一人一人に特徴や職業、経歴などが設定されていて、それに目を通すだけで時間を潰してしまう人もいるだろう。また、オープンワールドゲームとしてもそれなりに高い水準にまとまっているため、自分だけのキャラクターでミッションをクリアしていく楽しみが感じられる。ただ、この誰でも主人公であるLegion最大の要素には、個人的には幾つか問題がある様にも感じられた。

[個人的良点]

・採用ミッションをこなせば本当に誰でもプレイヤーキャラにすることが出来る。スパイや通訳やモデル、果ては殺し屋や浮浪者に至るまでそれなりの数の職業のNPCがオープンワールドに存在し、また彼ら一人一人に特徴が設定されている。有利になるものや不利になるものもあり、歩きながらNPCに設定されているそれらを眺めるだけでも楽しい。
・一方でゲーム中で使用できるガジェットは各キャラクター共通であり、どれもかなり便利。クモ形の小型機械で潜入するも良し、透明になりながら肉体一つで突っ込んでいくのも良し、ドローンをハッキングして手足の如く使うのも良し。ある程度好きに暴れながらミッションをこなせる。
・最初の最初から飛行できる乗り物が使え、中々再現度の高いロンドンの街並みを空から見下ろすことが出来る。ミッションでも非常に有用で、飛びながら侵入口を探していくだけでも面白く感じられた。
・バグやクラッシュにはほとんど遭遇しなかった。

[個人的微妙点]

・キャラクター一人一人に確かに特徴はあるのだが、ごく一部の能力を持つキャラクターやDLCキャラクターを除いてガジェットのパワーには遥かに及ばないように感じた。ガジェットさえ強化してしまえばどんな特徴を持ったキャラクターでもある程度楽にミッションをクリアできるため、わざわざキャラクターを適材適所で使う必要性が薄い。誰でも使えるようにするための配慮かもしれないが、結局"ガジェットさえ持っていれば誰でもいい"になってしまっていた。
・ミッション内容がそれなりに単調。敵対的な組織の施設に侵入して証拠集めや工作を行うものが多く、その単調さも適材適所の必要性のなさに拍車をかけている。
・ストーリーは良くも悪くも普通。大筋は変わらないがプレイキャラによって声や語句が若干変化するためその点は楽しめた。とは言え誰でも主人公に出来る都合上、プレイキャラよりも相棒的存在のAIの方に焦点が当たりがちなようにも思えた。もっとも皮肉的だがユーモアに富んでいるため、個人的には気にならなかったが。

[個人的総評]

どの要素も楽しめはするが、突き抜けた何かはないように思えたオープンワールドゲーム。最大の特徴であるNPCをプレイヤーキャラクターとして採用できるシステムもはじめは斬新だったが、ゲーム体験に画期的な新鮮さをもたらしたようには思えなかった。ただ有用なNPCを探すためにふと通りを散策したくなったり、最初に登用したキャラクターで最終ミッションに挑んだ際には感じられたものがあったり、決して面白さに寄与しないわけではない。ちょっと変わった切り口のオープンワールドゲームを遊びたい時には、お勧めの一本だ。", "timestamp_created": 1675137847, "timestamp_updated": 1675180910, "voted_up": true, "votes_up": 7, "votes_funny": 0, "weighted_vote_score": "0.620404362678527832", "comment_count": 0, "steam_purchase": true, "received_for_free": false, "written_during_early_access": false, "primarily_steam_deck": false}

review:
Ok so... I like THE GAME and THE WATCH DOGS SERIES, but in it's current state I just cannot recommend this game.
Though I haven't even played past the 2 hour mark, I still believe that I Won't be able to play this game if the bugs that I've been experiencing persist thoughout my playthrough.
A lot of the concepts feel cool, for example it's a nice non-personal departure, having no main protagonist and instead being able to recruit people to play as, but what fun is that if when i open the map I'm unable to close it and everything starts melting on my screen?
IF you decide to buy this, Do so on a big sale, maybe 60% or lower, I got the ultimate edition on 80% and i won't refund it, because i truly believe we have another Cyberpunk situation on our hands, bad now, but Ok eventually.
I believe that the problems are a bit personal, I read another review where the author said that they didn't experience any problems, so do with this what you will, and I hope my review helped you in making the choice of buying or not buying Watch_Dogs: Legion.

review: 伦敦的风景可以，如果想买来看风景可以买，但你说好玩吗？不如2代玩法丰富，探员机制，出发点是好的，玩法集中在探员的技能点上，那探员的技能，好的全要氪金，而且没做全那，终极版好点，妈的，不能购买车辆，硬加在探员上，我nm难受死了，3代车辆好看不能买，随你点车被强制删了，武器？别想3D打印机，也被加在技能里了！意思是这个开放世界，就你技能有什么，你可以用什么，其他，哦不，你怎么可以想其他的呢？角色不能跟着故事的推进，解锁新的技能卡，加在技能格里面，就tm的操蛋。

review:
It is a very good game. Though it does not compare with its predecessors, #Legion offers a completely different perspective to the #Watch_Dogs saga - combat, hacking, driving, all have a different touch.
APC (all playable characters) feature of the game must not be forgotten - multiple ways to go about playing the game.
TLDR; it is a very good game; (personally) don't think it to be a waste of time and money.

review:
[b]Если вы захотели купить эту игру чтобы пройти её, и думаете что она похожая на все  остальные части, то вы явно будете не правы, и будете потом не довольны тем, что здесь все совсем не так как вы хотели. [/b]
[u]Из минусов могу отметить:[/u]
[list]
[*]Здесь нету главного героя, что можно сказать фишка этой игры, но реализовано немного херово. Есть уникальный для каждого персонажа блок диалогов, что могут быть похожие между собой но фактически они уникальные.
[*]Очень херовая оптимизация, но это не удивительно.
 [/list]
 [b]Те кто сравнивает з другими частями этой игры будут писать что эта игра полная хрень, но все таки эта игра просто еще сырая... [/b]

满血3060 130w 1080p，关闭光追画质极低帧率49~65平均51，高画质，帧率也是45~55，不管配置有多高，帧率还是40到65左右，因为育碧的游戏是世界公认的，超级宇宙无敌答辩，这坨大辩应该早已停更了，千万别买，我已经帮你踩雷了，我脚下全是黄金。赛博朋克2077，波兰蠢驴都知道，知错能改一直都在优化，育碧这坨答辩纹丝不动。

review:
Nevetséges első rész után mindenki odavolt a második részért, így amikor leárazás volt, megvettem. Akkor egyből szerelem lett, végig is toltam, rengeteget időztem benne. Aztán alig vártam hogy megjelenjen a Legion és újra átéljem azt az önfeledt, de valjuk be, elég irreális hackerkedésbe öltött akciójátékot amiért már korábban annyira odavoltam. 
De a megjelenéskor iszonyat optimalizálatlan volt, tele volt buggal (most sincs belőle hiány a profilomra ki is raktam egy remek lebegő kocsis képet is), szóval ott is hagytam az Origin fiókomon. 

Aztán most hogy vásároltam egy Steam deck-et és megjelent steam-re is, valamint 10euro körülre le volt árazva, nem tudtam ellenálni. Mivel a negatív értékelések nagyrésze inkább a Ubisoft üzleti straégiája és az achivmentek hiánya miatt érkezett, így úgy tűnt érdemes lesz neki adni egy esélyt. 
Bár utálom az angol környezetet, mégis kényszerítettem magamat, hogy pár óránál többet játszak vele és óóóó barátom, megérte minden centjét. 
Elsőre a pro - con, aztán még kifejetem.

[b] Amit szerettem:[/b] 
- Új eszközök, fegyverek, harcidrónok
- Tovább gondolt pókrobot
- Tech cuccok, fejleszthető képességek
- Nagyon jó humor végig a játékban
- Történet nem marad el a második résztől (fordulatokban gazdagabb is), ötletes és futurisztikus
- Részletgazdag helyszínek
- Gunplay marha jó
- Az egyenruha ötlete, ami karakterenként eltérő, nagy ötlet. 
- Fast travel a metroval
- Meta események a városban (letartóztatások, balesetek, lövöldözések)
- KÉMAUTÓ/Karakter <3

[b] Amit nem szerettem:[/b] 
- Sokszor nagyon debil szinkron (Oi mate ...mint egy malac baszki)
- Túl könnyű (pl tovább gondolt pókrobot túl op lett szerintem)
- Előfordult nem is egyszer, hogy az enemy csak oda glitchelt az orrom elé, de így a semmiből...
- Egy halom autóban nem is ül senki, csak furikáznak üresen
- Jobbkormányos utak. Állandóan a rossz oldalon száltam be :D 
- Kicsit rövidnek érzem, nekem kb 27 óra a főszál (bár azt hiszem csak egy mellékküldetést vittem ki, meg pár embert szerveztem csak be)
- Kb három karakterrel játszottam végig, kényszeríthetett volna a játék hogy változatosabban kelljen gondolkodni

És akkor még egy kis adalék akit érdekelne, de ez már tényleg csak ami eszembe jut. 
Steam deck-en manuális cpu órajellel a maximumon pörgetve minimum 30 fps szépen megvolt mindenhol, kb mid/high grafika mellett. Nagyon elégedett voltam. 
A játék nagy változtatása a második részhez képest, hogy nekünk kell beszervezni a Deadsec csapatába az embereket. Ez számomra élvezetes volt, egészen addig ameddig rá nem találtam a kémre, mert azután az építőmunkás és egy Albionos exnyomozótól eltekintve mindig vele játszottam. Ez nem vett el egyébként az élményből, bár ahogy írtam is marha könnyőnek találtam a játékot. El sem tudom képzelni mi lett volna, ha egy smg-s vagy Ak-s karaktert is behúzok (voltak jelöltjeim), de a Deadsec világába nekem illett bele hogy Rambot játszak, szóval maradtam inkább a lopakodós játékmenetnél (már amikor tudtam). Összesen egy helyen izzasztott meg a játék, nagyon a végén az egyik bossnál, de kicsit úgy voltam vele, hogy VÉGRE valami kihívás. 
Talán a legjobban a kihívás hiánya nem tetszett. Persze be lehet állítani, hogy ha az ügynöködet elkapják akkor egyből búcsút mondj neki, de a játék elején ez túl drasztikusnak tűnt, ma már szerintem így kezdeném el. Elvégre elég nonszensz hogy rommá gyilkolod az Albion bázist, majd a végén ha lelőttek akkor le vagy tartóztatva és idővel kiengednek. :D 

Én azt mondom ez a rész van olyan jó mint a kettő, de másmilyen. Nekem Anglia sosem volt a szívem csücske ([i] "Igen, Londonban. Nem ismerős? Sült hal, Tom Jones, délutáni tea, rossz kaja, még rosszabb idő, kibaszott Mary Poppins... LONDON!"[/i] ), de így is meg tudtam kedvelni a helyszíneket. Az biztos, hogy 60 euro-t nem adnék érte, de ha leárazás van és szeretted a második részt, akkor ezzel sem lesz problémád. 

Örülök ha elolvastad és valamelyest tudtam segíteni! 
Sikeres forradalmat!
