review:
Feels and looks like a modern day version of Assassin's Creed(even has a few missions). Controls are easy to master, flying on top of Drones, Multiplayer truly is a team builder. The build is on a map that should be familiar to those that follow the AC games.

I am enjoying the story line and ability to play any direction I want, but exploring and the small side missions are very entertaining...heck picking up a 007 Spy and the cool car had been fun.

Check out the game. If the AI in the game doesn't make you laugh with its heavy sarcasm...

I actually kind of like this. It's a deeply flawed game, but everyone else in the reviews has already talked in-depth about the negatives, so I'll focus on the positive aspects:

1) The city of London might be the best videogame city I've ever seen. It feels incredibly alive and looks downright stunning, especially at night. Immersive as heck, and just exploring is rather enjoyable!

2) I like the "play as anyone" system. Yeah, it means you as the player are more like a digital ghost jumping between disposable bodies, but that actually really works for me. Just don't get too attached if you have permadeath on!

3) The story is pretty good! There is, in particular, one part of it that has DOWNRIGHT AMAZING writing. The person who wrote the story about how the AIs are made deserves a raise, or several.

Yeah, I know it's deeply flawed. Crashes sometimes, and it has all the usual open world tropes like teleporting psychic cops. But if you can get it at like 80% off, you should give it a go.

review: Bought this game back for my ps4 a couple of years ago and I didn't really enjoy it because the game runs like below 30fps on last gen console. Now since it's available on steam I bought it again so that I can enjoy the game with better graphics and way better fps. Watchdogs legion is for me the best watchdog game in the series. It took stuffs that was fun in w1/w2 and improve on it and you get to play in futuristic london which really looks amazing. The game doesn't have a main protagonist so you're task to recruit people to be the heroes of your game which is actually quite refreshing for a triple a title. The people you recruit does have his or her own perks and can be very useful in different situations or missions, so it's always a good idea to diversify your team of deadsec. Keep in mind storytelling kind of suffers in legion since there's no main character to revolve the story or plot around and it's is pretty much generalized to fit everyone to be included in the story. All in all I bought the game on a huge sale so this is an easy thumbs up and I also suggest getting the gold edition so that you can get aiden as a recruit since the game does feel better when it has a main protagonist you can use and have in your team.

review:
[h1] 粗制滥造，未经打磨的游戏体验 [/h1]

看门狗三作里制作最为粗糙的一部，[u] 简陋的ui，任务流程中的卡壳之处，时而怪异的人物动作，错误的角色和敌人生成，敌人和行人AI的奇怪表现 [/u]，多方面的问题和缺陷会严重影响到你游戏沉浸感。
最令人难以接受的是，游戏的核心机制“渗透骇入”，在某些方面甚至做了减法，缺少了前作一些有趣的玩法与机制。

《看门狗：军团》就是一款缺乏打磨，没有诚意的水作！有那么多可以明显改进之处，有那么多显然的缺陷和漏洞，育碧你为什么不把它做好呢？

游戏唯一的亮点就只能是自定义的人物和黑客暖暖换装了，从游戏里满地的服装店也可以看出制作方把这方面作为了主要着力点，不同的人物有不同的动作和语音，可以让你以自由选择的形象来在动荡的伦敦市中来回穿梭骇入。

[strike] 这部游戏明明可以变得很好 [/strike]

游戏唯一的亮点就只能是自定义的人物和黑客暖暖换装了，从游戏里满地的服装店也可以看出制作方把这方面作为了主要着力点，不同的人物有不同的动作和语音，可以让你以自由选择的形象来在动荡的伦敦市中来回穿梭骇入。

[strike] 这部游戏明明可以变得很好 [/strike]", "timestamp_created": 1675491967, "timestamp_updated": 1675492010, "voted_up": false, "votes_up": 2, "votes_funny": 0, "weighted_vote_score": "0.461827933788299561", "comment_count": 1, "steam_purchase": true, "received_for_free": false, "written_during_early_access": false, "primarily_steam_deck": false}

review:
不吐不快，我建议想买的人看完我的评论，酌情购买，如果你是为了艾登和扳手买的价格你也能接受想买就买，但是如果你是因为前两部你觉得还不错想买的，先看一下评论

1：我在游戏序章的时候初体验就是，动作并没有1代和2代流畅，游戏优化很差，有时候突然就掉帧，比如玩的时候60帧到特定场景或者开车连20都没有了，还有就是画面真的很离谱，我是在看门狗2高画质看起来是很舒适的，但是看门狗军团就不行，你要拉满才能感受到画面的提升，但是帧数断崖式下跌，我不太理解这种几乎自毁IP的行为，在我这我只能形容他一个单机游戏做的却像个网游，育碧啊，我不求你的剧情能达到1的高度，你起码游戏性越做越好吧，跑酷动作也没2花哨，但是又没1流畅，那艾登的跑步动作是啥啊？你用脚做的吗跑起来要不是看帧数我还以为我掉帧了呢，一卡一卡的，艾登老了，腿脚不利索了是吧，这都是游戏设定！原来我误会你了！咱还得谢谢育碧呢，这么尊重设定，呕，玩起来就是两个字，廉价！（换DX11可以改善帧数不稳的情况，但是光追也没了。）

2：衣服的物理摆动效果简直不堪入目，我在玩看门狗1的时候就走路闲逛也不会觉得无聊，因为风衣的物理效果是真的舒服，这代开车的时候，衣服直接固定住像个钢板一样，很离谱，还有追逐战，如果是1，2颗星其实还好，但是再往上就真的离谱，敌人的车跟打了鸡血一样，想跑有无人机，有检查点，一直在通缉，这代也不像1代2代能随时找个车库躲一下，或者像2代可以在车上使用大范围信号干扰躲避追击，如果你用的不是逃亡车辆的探员，那你的躲避通缉的方式一定相当狼狈。

3：鼓励正面作战的潜入游戏，一些任务强制触发警报，让你和警察正面作战，但是在高难度下，敌人的伤害很高，再加上隐形霰弹枪兵种，照着你面门来两枪就躺下了，还有一大堆收集品在高出，离谱的跑酷系统+抽象的物理碰撞系统，会出现十分离谱的BUG，比如你上货运机器人，你跑酷动作都出来了，但是你并没上去，而弹飞十万八千里远摔死，你要做的就是不要慌，ESC然后保存，然后重新读档，这样你就不用等干员复活1小时了。

4：剧情方面每个人有不同的看法，我先说说我的，在我看来就是白开水，加上看门狗吧主：风城漫游者的爆料，删掉了90%内容的剧情，再加上那坨跟屎一样的断句方式，在看门狗3看剧情简直就是一种折磨，一句话说不全，下一句接前句，这断句是真的但凡带点脑子都想不出这种设计，字幕，说话说一半字幕都没显示全，举个游戏内的例子，“你们想要带给人们信心吗？攻击那里，让他”        “无法运作”就4个字，说完有那么难嘛，然后字幕读的又快，我前面几个小时都没看懂剧情，因为看不清字幕。

5：这游戏和赛博朋克2077是在同一年发售的，要不是因为2077的宣发过度+首发BUG，那看门狗军团也绝对应该在那年被钉在耻辱柱上，现在他应该被钉在育碧的耻辱柱上，而且他那个B机票跳票了半年，也就是预购玩家要在21年7月你才能玩到艾登的扳手，可是这个游戏是在2020年10月发售的啊？

6：育碧我就想问问你，3D打印机有删的必要吗？打车有删的必要吗？你删除他们的原因是什么？是给你那个招募系统让步吗？那你当初为什么要做呢？做了一半又扔了？手机界面从1代就有的东西，连个UI都删，还有贝格利的视频放右上角，我眼睛长在脑门上？明明E3是放在中间的，越改越反人类是吧，刚发售1个月就被真黑客把560G的代码扒了个精光，确实扒了精光，不过是把育碧的遮羞布扒了个精光，剧情一大堆删改内容，城市删了（多伦多市，英属维京群岛），随你点车删了，3D打印机删了，地图图标筛选删了，电梯升降删了（不是现在的读条），删了这么多东西，那职业系统一定非常完整吧，哈哈，育碧连职业也删了两个，无人机杀手和门卫被改成路人，道尔顿的关键剧情删了，最终BOSS的关键刻画剧情也删了，还有那个伦敦地铁站爆头事件（游戏内地铁门把人夹死）与其删的精光改的一塌糊涂，要不你当初干脆就放个E3别出了，至少还能留点幻想时间，还有经典单机塞氪金的传统异能，你也不是第一次干了，我也懒得说了。

如果1代是因为阉割的画面+删掉的玩法+对标GTA5被诟病，2代是因为碎片化的叙事被诟病，但是1代有塑造十分成功的角色艾登-皮尔斯和流畅的战斗动作和联动处决，打出帅气的一套连招是十分帅气的，2代也有明亮的色调和更多黑入内容花哨的跑路动作有着优秀的可玩性，那狗3就是拥有廉价的UI+删掉的玩法+阉割的剧情+碎片化的叙事+坚硬的动作，比2代更少的可玩性，可见育碧想要缝合1代和2代的有点，结果是取其糟粕去其精华，就是九转大肠，用了看门狗的名字，结果游戏做的一塌糊涂还带点屎味。 然后steam版这个甚至是至尊阉割版，没有成就系统（只有育碧平台才能看）我想说的就是这些，这是一款严重阉割的游戏，所以我真心建议大家酌情购买。

review:
After playing Watch Dogs 2 on PS4 I though this new version would be nice. Well, it is nice visually even though HDR won't turn on (works fine with Shaddow of the Tomb Raider). It took me about an hour to start the game the first time after it was installed. Ubisoft account creation mandatory. What for? Then email verification, then it tried to make me use two-factor verification too. After that some anty-cheat software, which is probably more useful for Ubisoft to ensure people pay the extortionate amout of money for game credits to spend on upgrades in game. Because of this I will try to stay away from future Ubisoft games.

If the rought start wasn't enough, the game has a good number of issues too. Some issues with pointing you to what you are supposed to do, wasting you time to figure out what are you missing when you clearly have done what has been asked from you. Game saves are a joke. I save in the middle of a restricted area during a mission and next time I start the game it didn't continue from there, but from an area nearby and all the guards, which I neutralized were back. Cars disappear in front of me every now and then. I saw a car half embedded into the road (vertically rotated too). I've seen someone fight a ghost apparently. I got a game crash in the first couple of hours of playing the game. 

EDIT: Now I can barely play 20 minutes before the game crashes. No exceptions. Every time I start it, it crashes within 20 minutes, sometimes after only a few.

Not to forget "jumping" controls. The way you are supposed to jump while running/walking (not really a jump, but don't get me started on the lack of jump capability in Watch Dogs) is ridiculous. Why would I hold the "jump" button while walking/running if I want to make a jump at a later point? Have the develpers ever jumped while moving in real life before? Don't they know how that works? I wasted half an hour trying to jump between some platforms in the tomb mission before I went searching for clues online just to find comments from countless other frustrated people just like me.

All in all nice graphics, good story progression, acceptable vehicle behaviour (I know this is not a racing simulator), but bad user experience with the bloatware around the game and with the bugs. At least it is not as terrible as Cyberpunk was when it was first released. For the reasons above I wouldn't recommend this game to anyone unless you get it at a large discount like I did for just 12EUR. Don't even think about the in-game purchases of game money and upgrades as those can easily send you back hundreds of EUR, while you don't really get anything very useful other than saving some time progressing.

And that's it. I am done wasting my time with a game that crashes more often than WIndows Millenium. Uninstalling...

Well, it is nice visually even though HDR won't turn on (works fine with Shaddow of the Tomb Raider). It took me about an hour to start the game the first time after it was installed. Ubisoft account creation mandatory. What for? Then email verification, then it tried to make me use two-factor verification too. After that some anty-cheat software, which is probably more useful for Ubisoft to ensure people pay the extortionate amout of money for game credits to spend on upgrades in game. Because of this I will try to stay away from future Ubisoft games.

If the rought start wasn't enough, the game has a good number of issues too. Some issues with pointing you to what you are supposed to do, wasting you time to figure out what are you missing when you clearly have done what has been asked from you. Game saves are a joke. I save in the middle of a restricted area during a mission and next time I start the game it didn't continue from there, but from an area nearby and all the guards, which I neutralized were back. Cars disappear in front of me every now and then. I saw a car half embedded into the road (vertically rotated too). I've seen someone fight a ghost apparently. I got a game crash in the first couple of hours of playing the game. 

EDIT: Now I can barely play 20 minutes before the game crashes. No exceptions. Every time I start it, it crashes within 20 minutes, sometimes after only a few.

review:
Если вы играли Watch Dogs 2, которая была хорошей игрой и думаете что, легион по крайней мере не хуже, то вы глубоко заблуждаетесь... 
- Оптимизация: Фризы каждые 30 секунд, при том что фпс не падает ниже 70 ???!
- Графика: Не далеко ушла от второй, с dlss становится полным мылом
- Управление транспортом: Просто нет слов, как будто на утюге едешь, и нельзя менять камеру?!
- Механика: Как во второй части, наверное единственный плюс
- Интерфейс: Раньше было очень удобное меню с телефоном, где можно было ставить приложения, слушать музыку и тд. его тут нет
- История: Вроде как бы есть свежие идеи но, все эти минусы просто отбивают желание играть.
Казалось бы рабочая формула, у вас есть хорошая серия игр, с хорошей репутацией, просто сделай её не хуже чем она была, но даже тут Ubisoft не справилась.

review:
Ubisoft, I gave you one last chance when I bought this game, and now I realise I went way too easy on you.

Ubisoft have hardly received a warm welcome on their return to Steam, and looking at this game it's hard not to see why. Which is a shame because it's not a terrible game, I am having fun playing it and probably will keep playing it for a bit when I'm bored. Not to mention the only god awful glitch I saw was NPC's suddenly teleporting which can ruin attempts to be stealthy. 

But I cannot excuse the way Ubisoft have monetised the game.

The gameplay works alright. It's the familiar gameplay of the Watch Dogs franchise. In this game, you can recruit and play as any of the random NPC's with terrible attempts at London accents you come across. Even enemy guards if you find a way to earn their trust.

Each character has different perks. Some are great for stealth, others have unique weapons and characters affiliated with enemy factions, can slip into areas under those factions protection provided the guards don't realise they're not supposed to be there. If you're lucky, you might get a spy on the team, equipped with a car that fires missiles and turns invisible.

I often scout out an area, then look through my list of team members to find the right person for the job.

However, all this is not worth the insane pricing for this game. £100 for the Ultimate Edition are you serious?! I only bought it because it had an 80% sale once it finally got its Steam release.
It was the best way for me to get the DLC with the extra storyline and the more interesting playable characters, including two familiar faces from previous games, a psychic who can mind control NPCs and a crossover with Assassin's Creed. No it's not Desmond, he was unceremoniously killed off remember?

Okay that's frustrating but it's normal for DLC, at least they don't have microtransa... They have microtransations!
And no they are not purely cosmetic, you pay real world money for weapons, team members etc! Need I remind you that this is a AAA priced game! We already bought it and Ubisoft are squeezing more money out of it. What, was Epic Games' money not enough?!

This is just inexcusable. I feel like Dedsec should be fighting against Ubisoft themselves. If you really want to play a good Watch Dogs game, go play Watch Dogs 2 instead. It's not all that different to this game and it doesn't have any of this monetary BS attached to it.

*sigh* I remember when Ubisoft were better than this. I remember when they made an incredible Zelda clone with a great story, challenging puzzles, boss battles ranging from a sumo monk, to a three headed dragon, to a cyborg wizard and a well thought out time travel mechanic where you felt you were journeying through a kingdom's entire history.
And the incredible part? It was a playmobil game, you know, that kids toy you likely forgot about until I mentioned it just now.

That game was inevitably going to fall into obscurity and they went above and beyond making it the best forgotten game of my childhood! Whatever happened to THAT Ubisoft? I want them back!

review:
Если учесть, что вторые собаки были последней нормальной игрой Юбисофтов на новую часть были робкие надежды, которые, в прочем, сразу разъе*ались в начале показа первых материалов по игре. Просто возьмите из первой части нуар и серьезный сюжет, а из второй геймплей, проработку мира и заданий, получится лучшая часть серии. С*ка, в Легионе даже собирательство умудрились сделать ох*енно унылым, я уж молчу про всю остальную игру. Разрабы вы*рали просто несусветное хрючево, которое по ощущению наполовину сделано нейросетями. Основная фишка со сбором разноцветных клоунов-активистов, борцунов с угнетателями - ни*уя не работает, собирать этот цирк уродов вообще не интересно и геймплейно не имеет смысла. Если вы по какой-то причине хотите по полной навернуть западноевропейской актуальной повестки, тогда это поделие для вас, в противном случае я х*й знает кому это может понравиться.
[u]Пройдено[/u]
Оценка 2/10
raw_json: {"recommendationid": "132202150", "author": {"steamid": "76561198082171487", "num_games_owned": 0, "num_reviews": 371, "playtime_forever": 1586, "playtime_last_two_weeks": 0, "playtime_at_review": 1584, "last_played": 1738862494}, "language": "russian", "review": "Если учесть, что вторые собаки были последней нормальной игрой Юбисофтов на новую часть были робкие надежды, которые, в прочем, сразу разъе*ались в начале показа первых материалов по игре. Просто возьмите из первой части нуар и серьезный сюжет, а из второй геймплей, проработку мира и заданий, получится лучшая часть серии. С*ка, в Легионе даже собирательство умудрились сделать ох*енно унылым, я уж молчу про всю остальную игру. Разрабы вы*рали просто несусветное хрючево, которое по ощущению наполовину сделано нейросетями. Основная фишка со сбором разноцветных клоунов-активистов, борцунов с угнетателями - ни*уя не работает, собирать этот цирк уродов вообще не интересно и геймплейно не имеет смысла. Если вы по какой-то причине хотите по полной навернуть западноевропейской актуальной повестки, тогда это поделие для вас, в противном случае я х*й знает кому это может понравиться.\n[u]Пройдено[/u]\nОценка 2/10", "timestamp_created": 1675531255, "timestamp_updated": 1675644731, "voted_up": false, "votes_up": 5, "votes_funny": 0, "weighted_vote_score": "0.500630795955657959", "comment_count": 0, "steam_purchase": true, "received_for_free": false, "written_during_early_access": false, "primarily_steam_deck": false}

review:
Все крайне плохо с 3 частью Watch Dogs, если конечно сравнивать с предыдущими самородками серии. Сюжетка не удивила ни разу, слишком банально и монотонно становится со временем. Выбор игрока не влияет на дальнейшее изменение сюжета. 
 "Каждый NPC уникальный" говорили они, но в итоге каждый войслайн при вербовке агента повторяется чуть ли не всегда. По графону ничего поразительного, лишь никому не нужные ртх лучи, мыльцо местами и конечно же - оптимизация кусок отборного кала.
 Управление такое себе, особенно супер не удобное управление в транспорте, каждая машина в этой игре не едет, а скользит. На мото транспорте вообще не возможно передвигаться, мотик едет тупо прямо, даже если попытаться повернуть.
 Крайне не рекомендовал бы игрокам, не являющимися фанатами серии Watch Dogs Хотя и фанатам игра далеко не зашла. В общем, вот такую хрень вы сотворили, Ubisoft, впрочем как всегда. Лучше б не пердели ничего и не публиковали эту игру в стим.

review:
Wir sehr möchte Ubisoft einem auf den Sack gehen und ihren Spielern das Geld aus der Tasche ziehen... Ubisoft: JA!!!

120€ Variante gekauft und trotzdem sind nicht alle Spielinhalte dabei... Was ich absolut Frech finde...

Vom Spiel selbst brauchen wir gar nicht zu reden... Ich möchte eine BAUARBEITERIN!!!!!! rekrutieren... "Dringe in einen Hochsicherheitshafen ein und lade Daten von einem Boot runter und danach infiltirere noch eine Hochsicherheitsfestung, finde den Typen in der Mitte um seine Zugangscode zu bekommen (Was, wer hätte es auch gedacht, nicht ging), um an einen Biochemiecontainer zu gelangen um diesen zu Zerstören.... Um eine Bauarbeiterin zu rekrutieren, die absolut nichts kann außer eine Frachtdrohne zu rufen... Nice... Muss sein... Natürlich kosten Charaktäre wie Wrench natürlich auch direkt mehr als die üblichen, weil Ubisoft.

Es hat eine super Story in meinen Augen, diese wird aber schwer getrübt von etlichen Bugs und diversen FPS Einbrüchen.
Es kommt mir vor als ob man am Anfang in dessen Entwicklung wirklich Lust hatte und dann einfach nur noch hingeklatscht hat!! Sehr schade. Daher Rate ich aber auch eher vom Spiel ab anstatt es zu kaufen, war mir nicht einmal die 24€ (-80%) Wert. Dafür bekommt man wirklich gute Titel die auch anständiger laufen und kaum Bugs enthalten..

review:
Pretty neat how every single NPC has their own little story and relationships. Also really like how every interaction/altercation you have with an NPC is remembered. Saw an NPC being beat up by an officer & was gonna help him, but then saw the note on his profile saying he previously assaulted one of my other characters so I was like nah pal I'm not helpin' you. 

Graphics are sub-par and buggy though, wouldn't pay full price for this game. Currently racked up 24 hours of playtime after only having the game for 5 days so I'm clearly enjoying it a fair amount; definitely recommended on sale.

review:
[h2]Watch Dogs: Legion - A Mixed Bag with Potential (DLC Included)[/h2]

[hr][/hr]

I took a deep dive into Watch Dogs: Legion, Ubisoft's ambitious open-world experiment where you can play as any NPC. Here's my take on the experience, including the DLC:

The Good:

[b]Play as anyone, unleash chaos:[/b] This core mechanic remains incredibly fun. Whether you're a construction worker commandeering a forklift or a beekeeper unleashing swarms, the possibilities for creative mayhem are endless.

[i]Neon-drenched, dystopian London:[/i] The city is a visual feast, dripping with cyberpunk vibes and packed with secrets to uncover. Every corner invites exploration.

[u]DLC adds spice to the DedSec recipe:[/u] "Bloodline" brings back beloved characters like Aiden Pearce and Wrench, injecting a grittier narrative and fresh missions. Plus, iconic figures like Mina Sky keep things engaging beyond the base game.

The Not-So-Good:

Mission monotony can set in: Repetitive fetch quests can sometimes bog down the campaign, making certain sections feel like a chore.

Story doesn't always hit the mark: The main plot lacks consistent excitement, and certain character motivations feel underdeveloped.

Technical hiccups break immersion: Occasional glitches and odd character models can pull you out of the experience.

DLC Impressions:

"Bloodline" offers a welcome narrative boost, with Aiden's darker perspective contrasting DedSec's idealism. The new missions are more focused and engaging, while Wrench's signature brand of chaos adds a much-needed dose of fun. However, the extra content doesn't fully resolve the repetitive mission design that plagues the core gameplay.

Overall:

Watch Dogs: Legion brims with potential, but it stumbles into familiar open-world pitfalls. If the "play as anyone" sandbox and the DLC's intriguing additions appeal to you, you'll find plenty to enjoy. But be prepared for some repetitive tasks and a narrative that occasionally misses the mark.

Recommendation:

Worth a cautious look for those intrigued by the unique premise and the DLC's fresh narrative threads. But those seeking a consistently polished and captivating open-world experience might want to approach with caution.
[hr][/hr]

review: Awful.  It's like it's supposed to be bait, the intro is cool, then it only gets worse. It's poor controls and frustrating jumping puzzles.  That's it. I keep playing it, hoping its just a tough part, but it just keeps getting worse.    Bought it on sale for 80% off and still feel like I got scammed.   On top, Ubisoft has its own bulky login thing "Ubisoft Connect" that it insists you go through, which never remembers logins/passwords, which is frustrating for a game I bought and downloaded to my own computer to play single player.

review:
完全是依托答辩，操作手感（包括开车以及人物操作）极差，枪械系统直接嘎了（没玩完，好像是），捡不了枪，开局只能用一把nt电击枪，伤害很低，同时，近战系统让人难以描述。优化也很差，12代i5+1060难以保持60帧，部分场景甚至掉到30帧。最让我 蚌埠住 的是操纵损坏的蜘蛛机器人那个任务，操作很困难，而任务还让你各种跳跃……
完全是凭借前代情怀买的，唉……
总之不推荐购买。

review:
As a fan of Watch Dogs franchise I have to say this is a pretty good release as far as the story goes. I still would say I enjoyed the original much more as Aiden's story was pretty deep, that being said, Legion didn't disapppoint me.
Plenty of content to do and items to collect.

Is the game worth it's 60€ price? I'd say no, wait for sale and get it for 20-30€, that's a pretty fair price for what you're getting.

All and all, if you want to experience the franchise I'd recommend playing the original Watch Dogs first, you might skip WD2, the story isn't really that interesting compared to WD:Legion.

PS: Screw Ubisoft for not including the achievements for Steam release, you're literally Albion...

review:
I was lucky to get it at 10 bucks. I won't complain too much as its nit worth more than that. But it's cash grab for sure. It has great ideas but the soul of the game is lost. The machanics are good until you get into a fistfight and it turns clunky.  Driving is very good believe it or not and makes it fun at times. But player physics make the driving mediocre over all.

Every area is over saturated with the same environment and with the same concept where you can choose to be sneaky or aggro. Its just not a game, its old and boring.. Graphics are good, but dont mean anything without a soul or a reason to play.

review:
我真是很久没有玩过这么烂的游戏了，除了建模还行，其他的地方全方位地烂。1代2代的键位没有继承，反而改得更加难受。游戏的UI又土又丑。我心里面不愿意承认这是三代。
现在我只希望《看门狗》这个系列好死，办个喜丧，皆大欢喜。
这个游戏真的不是育碧高管用来洗钱的项目吗？

I'm sorry to hear that the game isn't loading properly for you, and that you're having this issue with even getting out of it. There are a couple of things I can recommend that you try in order to get these issues resolved, the first of which is to run through the steps here in our [url=https://ubi.li/4mnuS]Basic PC Troubleshooting[/url] guide. I also suggest [url=https://ubi.li/k3cYq]verifying your game files[/url], just to ensure that these issues aren't being caused by a corrupted game file. One last thing to try is to ensure that your game is installed on the same drive as Ubisoft Connect and Steam. \n\nShould these issues persist after you've given all of those steps a try, go ahead and grab a copy each of your [url=https://ubi.li/NAnxo] MSINFO and DxDiag[/url] files. Once you have those, open a ticket with us on our [url=https://ubi.li/46uzK]Support Website[/url] and get those files uploaded. This will allow our agents to get a better idea of what could be causing these issues. Thank you."}

review:
Идея хорошая, реализация как всегда. 

Постоянные баги: 
- едешь на машине или бежишь по городу и мимо тебя обязательно пронесется какой-нибудь непись в Т-позе, 
- на машине ездить абсолютно противопоказано, это просто какой то неуправляемый советский утюг, причем любая машина управляется одинаково плохо. Разрабы пытались прикрыть это убожество тем, что в машине есть автоуправление, но вышло тоже плохо. Ладно что есть фаст тревел через метро
- вода это просто какие то сопли со странной физикой. Один раз я подлетел на дроне к Темзе, чтобы посмотреть как кораблики плывут. Больше к воде я не летал.
- неписи то и дело застревают в текстурах или забагованно идут в стену

Вроде бы и хотели разрабы сделать круто, типа вот берешь рандомную бабку с улицы, вербуешь и вот она уже кулхацкер с автоматом бегает убивает ЧВК, но получилось тоже убого. Смысла в этой хрени нет абсолютно, всю игру прошел одним персом - хакером, которого давали за восстание одного из районов. Даже если ты играешь на перманентной смерти, в этом тоже нет никакого смысла, потому что ничто не мешает тебе снова взять рандомную бабку и играть ей дальше. Всю игру прошел тупо пауком по стелсу, короме конечно тех моментов, когда игра вынуждала вступать в перестрелку, так что навыки отдельно взятого перса тоже абсолютно бессмысленны.

После предыдущих частей весь мир какой то мыльный, хЗ как объяснить, но картинка выглядит реально убого, оптимизация тоже максимально отвратительная, на 3070 без лучей и с дллс выдает 60-70 кадров с постоянными просадками кадров, это просто ужасно.

Если бы я расположил части серии по "рейтингу", то выглядело бы это так: 1 часть - шедевр 10/10, 2 часть - ололо 8/10, 3 часть - 1/10, единицу даю чисто за то, что это поделие жирных красноглазых ленивых разрабов отдавали в стиме за 3 бакса, за цену более этой покупать эту "игру" противопоказано

review: 在ubisoft上有狗1，以及狗2的黄金版，听说steam上架了狗3就从steam里入手了，比不上狗1的剧情，比不上狗2的互动，但优点还是有的，就是伦敦做的还不错，没有评论里说的那么不堪，当个旅游模拟器还是不错的，我很喜欢育碧的游戏，但育碧就是作，现在都作到了求收购的境界，这是我能为用烂土豆的育碧做的一点贡献了，希望育碧以后少做点吧，致敬狗哥，勉为其难给你这个旅游模拟器留个赞吧。

review:
Le jeu est plutôt bien mais c'est UbiChiott, une pompe a fric > DLC payant > Bugs de m2 jamais corrigés (jeu à l'abandon depuis quelques mois, car plus assez rentable). Il porterais mieux le nom de WatchBug Légion.

La seul chose qui est bien codé est la boutique: pour vendre des agents, des bonus, des crédits... vous n'aurais pas de souci, pour le reste :
Le jeu est bourré de bugs, sur une partie solo, ça passe encore.

Le pire est le multijoueur:
[b]* [/b]Il y a souvent des bugs.
[b]* [/b]Parfois votre jeu va planter sans raison, quand c'est dans une suite de mission bien longue, il faudra [u]tout[/u] recommencer à 0. Car c'est trop demander au jeu de sauvegarder votre progression.
[b]* [/b][u]TOUT[/u] est fait pour vous forcer a acheter des boosts au début: vous commencez directemment avec des agents (de m2) qui vont difficilement remplir une mission solo.
[b]* [/b]Points tech distribués au compte goutte au début, difficile d'aller aux points d'intérêts avec les premiers agents.
[b]* [/b]La courbe de difficulté des missions n'est pas du tout respecter (elle est la même sur la plupart des missions).
[b]* [/b]Le début est trop dur et une fois les point tech obtennu c'est simple (particulièrement simple dès que vous avez les moyens de recruter un(e) tueuse a gages).
[b]* [/b]Il y a des partis complètement bugés:
[b]** [/b]Aller sur un évent, vous le verrez se déclencher et il ne se passera rien.
[b]** [/b]Certaines missions vous impose de resté à coté de votre partenaire, mais quand celui ci bouge, vous le voyer rester immobile, et hop tout le monde est mort.
[b]** [/b]Dans d'autres missions vous verrez les joueurs se téléporter des gardes se téléporter, des voitures disparaitres ou apparaitres les uen dans les autres...
[b]** [/b]Le multi réagit comme si vous avez 100'000 de ping (j'ai tester ce bug avec une connexion fibre à 2Gb/s branché en RJ45 cat7, 5ms de ping, c'est pareil), ils ne doivent pas donner assez à manger aux hamsters qui alimentent les serveurs.

[b]Autres soucis :[/b]
[b]* [/b]J'ai un SSD haut de gamme (5Gb/s en lecture), les temps de chargement sont très looooooong !!! (40sec pour arriver au menu principal, 90sec pour charger le menu multijoueur (qui contient 5 cadres, un fond et une musique)), une fois passé ce menu il va charger le monde et vous avez le temps d'aller boire un café il faut plusieurs minutes pour charger. Je précise bien que mon jeu est installé sur un [u]SSD à 5Gb/s[/u].
[b]* [/b]Si je met le jeu en directX 12, il ne le supporte pas, soit vous aurez un affichage moche avec des artéfacts partout, soit votre jeu plantera.
[b]* [/b]Leur lanceur de me--2 fait des mise a jour trop souvent avec des téléchargement régulier qui n'apportent rien au jeu.

La société reste toujours à son image que j'ai UbiDaube!

review:
Upside: The gameplay itself feels like the old school game with a team twist to it. You can build your own team. If you get arrested, injured, killed (depending on your difficulty settings) will make you lose a member of your team. Aside from that, nothing much feels different aside from some of the controls being more fluid than previous titles. 

Downside: Having and building a Dedsec team is a pretty cool feature. But it clearly hinders the story. Having so many different characters all interacting with their own dialogue inside of cut scenes feels like watching a reality TV show with GTA NPCs as actors. The context is there, it kinda fits, but conversations just don't feel natural. They could have pulled this off a lot better if they made everyone mute. 

I'm 50/50 with this game. Can't tell if I like it or hate it. But the lack of a natural story is really making it hard for me to play this and not just start over the first two games.

Do not buy this game. Massive cpu bottlenecks that cannot be fixed. Game crashes every other mission. No good story or gameplay. Very boring gameplay aswell. Nothing gets you excited to actually login to play except for the price you paid for it

review: It's boring, I read the reviews before purchasing and many had similar thoughts on the game play but it was 80% off so I took a chance.  I'm only 3 hours in so maybe it will get better but so far I'm having a hard time finding any enjoyment in this game.  Every mission you get is across town, spend more time going back and forth between missions than actually doing them, this is such and old mission model and I don't understand why games are still forcing us to do all this running around, I'm sick of it.  I'm playing a hacker that is never at a terminal, it's bizarre.

review:
Самая грустная из трех частей в плане сюжета и погружения в игру.
Оптимизация отличная, графика чудесная.
Лондон ужасен, сер и скучен, однотипен и не подталкивает к исследованию.Однотипные миссии по привлечению игроков в dedsec, ужасный третьесортный сюжет, который монотонно заставляет тебя проходить эту игру без единой эмоции.Во второй части гораздо интереснее было взаимодействие с взломом и более интересные и богатые на наполненность сюжетные миссии.
Для фанатов серии - пройти можно, для начала ознакомления с миром watch dogs, лучше покатайте в 1 или 2 часть.
5/10

review:
전작과 다르게 몹과 트랩의 배치가 정말 촘촘하고 체계적으로 분배되어 있어서

풀이 과정과 잠입 루트가 다양해 거점을 공략하는 즐거움은 매우 상승했다

하지만 수려한 그래픽과 다양한 처형모션의 장점을 전혀 느낄수없는 정적인 카메라 워킹

자유분방하게 생긴거와는 다르게 전혀 특별할것이 없는 요원들의 재미없는 능력

정말 이보다 더 끔찍할 수 있을까 싶은 내러티브와 구색만 갖춘 월드 상호작용 등등

호불호 타지 않는 평작이라고 하기엔 치명적인 단점들이 너무 많다

review: Очень обидно когда твоя любимая серия игр превращается в Legion, в игру без нормального сюжета, с убитыми механиками. Хотя казалось бы стоило всего лишь переработать стрельбу, транспорт и чуточку подтянуть сюжет, но нет, зачем если WD2 получила рецензии лучше чем WD1, значит схема рабочая, юзаем, пацаны. А ещё меня убила куча обзоров из серии "Интересный геймплей", этот "интересный геймплей" заключается в возьми дрона чтобы взять дрона, а после этого возьми дрона чтобы наконец взять ещё одного дрона.  Единственное за что можно похвалить это чудо, так это за треки Gorilaz на одной из радиостанций.

review:
As a fan of WatchDogs 1&2, Legion was something I looked forward to releasing on Steam. I chose not to buy it on Ubisoft, wishlisted it 3 years later, and bought it when it was on sale for $12. After completing the story and playing the multiplayer for awhile, I can honestly say:

It's really only worth $12.

Instead of giving you an essay on how I think of the game, I'll just give you this list:
Pros:
+ Story is better than WD2
+ Bloodlines DLC prologue story is also worth trying
+ Active multiplayer servers (quit shutting down multiplayer Ubi :( )
+ Game runs good on high settings (without ray tracing, rip AMD)
Cons:
- Multiplayer is (mostly) dead with slow seasonal progression
- Driving is plain with no differences between vehicles aside from SFX (also really floaty)
--- Set in London

Overall: I got $12 worth of game for $12. Wait for a sale before buying. I recommend finding a community where plenty of WDL players are since their official Discord is (mostly) dead.

review:
There are good and bad parts of this game but unfortunately the bads overpower the goods. I liked Watch Dogs 1 and 2, but Legions sadly doesn’t have a solid singleplayer story due to its novel structure. If you are into character collection then I think you should give it a go, but not having a “main protagonist” makes it hard to care about the individuals in an organization that fights for personal freedom.

I think the character collection structure could work for a semi-persistent online format. In fact, the gun fight combat of this game seems to be optimized for multiplayer cooperation rather than singleplayer, and causes problems with being alone in the story mode, defending a hacking area while enemies have endless spawns and will coordinate to flank you from all sides.

To this end, Watch Dogs Legion is a failed experiment that doubled down not being released on Steam only until recently. I got it with a 80% discount, and seeing it went back to full $60 price so quickly, it would be a resounding “not recommended” rating unless it’s on sale again.
All time Best hacking game 👌

review:
"Drone Simulator 6000 - The New 3rd Person Drone Flying Shooter, now with mild hacker theme!"

I think I'd vote neutral if that was option. 

The Cons:
- Hacking is getting less and less important, everything is automated and even those tacky "rotate pipes to make data flow" were missing. There were probably like 10 of those? 
- Puzzle difficulty is suitable for +3yo
- Mechanics horrible for stealth game, and then it tries to be stealth game. 
- You basically solve all missions by flying Cargo Drone above the place, drop spider there, use it to neutralize all enemies one by one, then if spider is not able to pull lever you run there by your self.
- All other gadgets except spider are useless
- Driving is horrible
- There were very limited number of different recruitment missions. I felt I got same 2 over and over. 
- I understand what they were aiming with "no main character" thing, but I still didn't like it
- The AI companion is annoying and [spoiler] I was happy I was able to kill it, but for some reason they brought it back alive [/spoiler]
- [spoiler] OH NO THEY ARE ABOUT TO BRING AUTONOMOUS DRONES and lets ignore the fact that they had autonomous turrets already deployed at every freaking street in the city [/spoiler]
- [spoiler] Whole shit was possible because of Blume, but no one thought about doing anything about them  [/spoiler]

The Eh's:
~ Story is basically just mildly colored current day situation from certain very large country and their minority group [spoiler] (harvesting organs, life score, etc.),[/spoiler] and no, I'm not talking about USA. 

The Pros:
+ City looks alive! There are tons of civilians, tons of cars, tons of drones flying constantly almost everywhere. Not like in Skyrim where massive city had like 13 citizens. 
+ Aiden and Wrench!
+ Dialogue works surprisingly well (minus certain weird moments) considering you can be using whatever character at whatever point. 
+ Drones work well and brought some challenge to combat
+ It's Watch Dogs, even though its worse than 1 and 2, it was playable.
+ Worked surprisingly well with older +6 year old hardware
+ Lots of side quests and some are good, and even the bad ones are okay. I didn't feel like grinding at any point.
+ More than 3 voice actors 
+ Musics were better than in most games

All in all: If you liked WD1 and WD2, get this from sale (Gold pack max, no point getting the most expensive one) for max 20eur. I assume I still have about 10 hours worth of fun in this game left, so around 40 hours total.

review:
本作延续了我对黑客的幻想，潜行难度相对之前几部有所降低，但在主大道上开车就不能像以前那样狂了。
要说缺点，我觉着开车时的视角有点运，然后就是觉得应该给每个角色设计两个武器栏，一个专属，一个可以替换（实在想把武器店整回来），其他的就正常发挥。

review:
7/10
Більше за все в грі сподобалось доповнення Bloodlines. Якщо грати зе агентів нецікаво, зіграйте соло за Ейдена та Ренча.
Купував гру зі знижкою в 80%, і не пожалкував. Хоча, будемо чесними - вона не варта повної ціни. Але разом с тим я в захваті від Ubisoft. Треба мати сталеві яйця щоб піти на ризик і експерементувати з франшизою, зробивши гру без головного героя. По грі видно що з неї відрізали дуже багато всяких штук, включно зі спеціалізаціями, перками і прокачкою агентів DedSec.
Дякую за сміливість і цілком цікаву гру. Ви круті.

review:
Watch Dogs Legion é divertido e inovador de certa forma com esse elemento de não ter protagonista e tu poder saindo por ai recrutando até os aposentado da vida,so acho que a UBisoft podia ter inovado mais fazendo mais coisas como: personalizar o esconderijo , ter compra e personalização de veículos , colocar um Parkoour ala Assassins Creed botendo escalar determinadas estruturas etc, 

o combate do jogo ta delicinha as vezes pego um NPC que manja de luta e fico atoa socando todo mundo só pra ver os golpes, o jogo é bom e divertido apesar de tudo da pra ficar horas jogando vale a pena mas pegue numa Promo da vida

review:
Игра в принципе понравилась(я не играл в прошлые части).
Под конец начала жестко вылетать на предфинальной кац-сцене, после еще и отказывается запускаться. НЕ ПОКУПАЙТЕ ЭТО! Вынужден на ютубе досматривать...Мда

review:
Watch Dogs: Legion hat echtes Potenzial! 

Man kann so viele verschiedene Leute spielen und in so viele Leben theoretisch eintauchen. Zusätzlich hat während der Produktion des Spiels der Brexit die Entwickler selbst überrascht. Das Spiel hat den Widerstand gegen eine korrupte und faschistoide Regierung und zwielichtige Organisationen tief in sich als Kern ausgemacht. In den 2020ern umso spannender. Wann begehrt ein Mensch auf? Was ist für jeden Einzelnen der Wendepunkt in Richtung Widerstand? Das Spiel bietet eine ganze Open World um einen das erleben zu lassen.
Tja. Es könnte.
ABER:
Tut es nur so hart an der Oberfläche, wie es mit generische Phrasen möglich ist. Die Entwickler haben Revolution zum Selbstzweck erklärt! Begründungen für einen Aufstand werden hier nur generisch und wiederholend  geboten!

Die handelnden Personen:
Es ist nichts erkennbar von tieferen inneren Gefühlen der erlebten Charaktere. Warum radikalisieren sich Menschen wirklich? Welche Motivation haben die Personen wirklich? Das was uns angeboten wird sind leere Phrasen wie in jedem Ubisoft Standardtitel. Bei Far Cry kann ich das ja vielleicht noch irgendwo nachvollziehen. Aber überzogene und unüberzeugende Coolness nehme ich verzweifelten Menschen nur schwer ab. Von den sich seltsam bewegenden NPCs fange ich lieber gar nicht erst an. Die Darstellung der Handelnden Charaktere bekommt von mir eine 1/10. Grauenhaft!

Die Open World:
Die offene Welt ist richtig gut gelungen. London sieht herrlich aus. Ich hab es genossen mich durch die lebendig wirkende Stadt zu bewegen. Einzig viele Autos sehen mit der Zeit nur noch generisch aus. Gefühlt begegnete von jedem Fahrzeugtyp nur ein Model in gleicher Farbe. Dennoch für die Gestaltung Londons gebe ich eine 8/10. Ein wahrer Hingucker.

Die Handlung:
Die Story des Spiels wirkt generisch und wenig unterhaltsam. Einzig der Geheimagent im Tutorial konnte Emotionen vermitteln die mich in die Story etwas haben eintauchen lassen. Aber als ich bspw. im laufe einer Mission durch ein Flüchtlingscamp geschickt wurde, hat es mich im Nachhinein sehr erschrocken wie wenig auf die menschen darin eingegangen wurde. Man bleibt in Watch Dogs: Legion ständig auf Distanz zu dem was man erzählen möchte. Es wird maximal nach technischen Lösungen gesucht in Umgebungen die klare moralische Dilemmata aufzeigen. In den ersten 3 Stunden gefiel mir der lockere Zugang zum Spiel. Ich war genug beschäftigt um in die Welt einzutauchen. Doch als ein storylastige Unterfütterung der Rebellion ausblieb und man nur einer rebellischen KI zu folgen hat wurde es mir sehr sehr langweilig. In den folgenden Stunden habe ich versucht irgendwo noch kleine Fetzen von Substanz zu finden. Rebellion ist kein Selbstzweck für Menschen und wenn Menschen sich radikalisieren hat es erlebbare Gründe. Diese Gründe werden meist nur vage erzählt und nicht erlebt. Letzlich kam ich mir wie in einem storyarmen Assassins Creed/Far Cry mit Autos, Drohnen, Hacking und einem KI Commander vor. 2/10 punkte aus meiner Sicht.

Fazit:
Für mich ist Watch Dogs: Legion eine 4/10. Einzig das wunderschöne London hat mich überzeugt. Der Rest ist austauschbarer Ramsch nach langweiligster Ubisoftformel. Das Spiel werde ich nach fast 15 Stunden nicht mehr anfassen. Einzig die Tatsache das Spiel im Sale für 12€ erworben zu haben rechtfertigt für mich im Nachhinein den Erwerb. Die verlangten 60€ ist es nicht wert. Leider.

review:
The ability to recruit anyone into your resistance was one of the biggest selling points of the game, until you realized that it has no depth whatsoever, which at this point is pretty typical for a Ubisoft game.

You'd think being able to recruit NPCs like Albion (the generic bad PMC) or Clan Kelly (generic bad gang) would have perks like being able to RP as one of them as cover but nope. They would treat you as any other character, even if you have the uniform on and done nothing suspicious. (I don't get it, Hitman had a great disguise system similar to this. How is it that hard???)

The open world is dead as hell. Remember in WD2 you could pit the police against gang members and just watch chaos ensues? Remember when civilians can call 911 when you did something stupid and you can intervene before they finish? Remember when you can pick up dropped guns? Remember when you can choose to let the NPC factions to clear an area for you? Well **** you for wanting an immersive game!

Story is bland and cringe. Which honestly has been a staple since the last game, but at least WD2 was fun and San Fran felt alive. London feels so dead. 

Thank God I only spent 10 bucks on this and didn't fork out for the other editions.

review:
之前写的：这个统计时间有问题，因为我是离线玩的，一是为了搞修改器，（技能全加生命无限真的玩着没压力）二是在线登录不进去，其实目前为止我已经玩了18个小时应该是有了。看门狗三部曲我都有，也一直很喜欢这个系列，玩法到后期都千篇一律会腻，但是育碧的美工是百看不厌。很多人都觉得军团不好，我觉得还不错，以前玩过，现在再玩一遍纯粹是支持正版，每个人都可以招募是本作最大的亮点，其实我觉得只要做完行政区解放任务，然后用送你的探员就足够了。本作的伦敦全然是未来高科技的景象，用着我喜欢的人物做任务，逛地图，这样玩着游戏才有意思。
之后补充：已通关，玩吐了，看来一个游戏连续玩太久真的会厌烦。

review:
垃圾中的垃圾……很久没有品过这么垃圾的答辩了。

看门狗这样的IP是怎么被育碧做成一个全方面都像5年前的游戏一样的？比狗2差太远了……

完完全全就是一个半成品。育碧现在每天都在干嘛？

I found this game while watching one of GMTK's videos about its unique mechanics and from then on I was intrigued by it. I've always avoided buying it while it's on EPIC until it finally releases on steam. 

One could agree that the game can be repetitive the more you play it. 40 hours in, and I already feel like I've seen every location in the game. I still recommend it though. Why? Because I wanted more players to at least experience the unique mechanics that it has mainly on the part where you can recruit just about any one you see. I hope that more game developers will try this game at least and implement its unique mechanics in their very own game.

To every one interested though, do yourself a favor and buy this ONLY while it is on sale. It's just not worth its current price. Also I recommend buying at least the Gold edition on Sale only because the bloodline DLC is awesome! 

PS: Do yourself one more favor and only play it on Resistance mode so it doesn't get too dull.

review:
I waited 2 years after release so i could play this game on steam.

there is so much bugs. driving is bad. guns feel lika plastic. everytime i re open the game, game options are reset to original, its so annoying to everytime go to options and change everything again +you can change graphics higher or lower but when you do the game restarts and the settings are reset again so you cant actually change any graphic options.

this was the last watch dogs game that ill ever buy. -.-

"why there is so much stupid jumping in a game that dont have jump button? edited:(26.07.2023)"

review:
推荐只是因为给地图面子，就当去伦敦旅游了，这部槽点太多了，故事没意思（其实也就1的故事会比较让人记得住，2也是拉垮，dlc天天艾登皮尔斯炒冷饭也是这个原因），枪械模块化，只有找到特定干员才能用好枪，黑入骚扰长cd等等。新增的东西也没特别有用，基本潜行流一个蜘蛛升满也就够用了，无双更不用说。
还是希望能用心做故事一点，真的，这剧情他娘一开始就猜到boss是谁也太老套了点，更别说夹杂一些让人反感的zzzq元素，育碧你们也是出过1这种优秀剧情的啊，感觉dedsec这种团队化设计就是败笔。
哦对了，还有宝可梦干员这个抽象模式，大街上随便招个人都能当黑客，编程岂是如此简单之物哈哈哈

review:
TLDR; Watch Dogs: Legion, a game with great, unique, and probally genre defining ideas but only at the surface level. The game is decent, but the concept has much more potential and i wish they would improve upon it. You should buy only when it is on sale and probally gold edition with the dlc is enough since you can play content from its DLC. When you play higher difficulty is recommended to fully experience the concept. but i still recommend this game because well it is still a decent game.

WARNING this game is more on the CPU side of things and this means if you experience any lag, it could be your CPU.

The gameplay of this game is decent, i think its a unique version of a previous watchdogs albeit contents/ability/features are missing from the previous game, such as buying a vehicle or using certain abilities. This is quite a shame really as this combine with the unique character system can create something more. Such as the concept of buying unique or cheaper vehicle just because you are an escape driver or have certain traits and connection or maybe accessing a much more powerful hacking abilities because you are an elite hacker or someshit. This will create a unique sense of each and every character thus increasing their usefulness. Because in the game most likely you'll rotate only a few character because they have powerful traits such as access of disguise. I think system/mechanics/features from games such as Darkest Dungeon really benefit this game, where there is a risk of losing each and every character rather than the a handful just because inherently have just better traits. 

There is also a feature where you can get information of relatives from these characters, where you can for instance help their aunt/cousin/spouse in order to boost their allegiance to dedsec. This concept however is surface level implementation. When you look at games such Shadow of War, they have nemesis system where certain NPC can interact one and another vastly changing the gameplay and each playthrough of mission. Like getting jumped by an NPC that has a vendetta over one of your allies. The only feature that come close to this is basically your agent getting kidnap and thats it or maybe you cant recruit certain people. That being said it is still fun to see these people go through their daily lives and you can access their schedule and see whats up.

The city of london, world building, and level design of this game is very good. I think one of ubisoft games strong point is to create an somehowhat accurate and immersive world. With certain variety over territories to keep each "run" into these territories feels quite interesting. The game is really beautiful and if you have good GPU you will have a treat. It feels like you are in london.

Audio is mediocore all over, theres nothing really to comment. Because well it serves its purpose but thats about it. Other than inconsistent i see from vehicles where vehicles passing by vs you driving it sometimes is vastly different.

Story is below average unfortunately, its your typical story cringe where the execution is terrible and absolutely cringe. Dont get me wrong it has potential but its being held back, probally decision made by the higher ups. The impact and progression of each character in the story makes no sense and is just bad. there are concepts that you could pursue certain horrors but it feels like these concepts just like the game are surface level not being explored enough and are there just for shock factor.

The gameplay of this game is decent, i think its a unique version of a previous watchdogs albeit contents/ability/features are missing from the previous game, such as buying a vehicle or using certain abilities. This is quite a shame really as this combine with the unique character system can create something more. Such as the concept of buying unique or cheaper vehicle just because you are an escape driver or have certain traits and connection or maybe accessing a much more powerful hacking abilities because you are an elite hacker or someshit. This will create a unique sense of each and every character thus increasing their usefulness. Because in the game most likely you'll rotate only a few character because they have powerful traits such as access of disguise. I think system/mechanics/features from games such as Darkest Dungeon really benefit this game, where there is a risk of losing each and every character rather than the a handful just because inherently have just better traits. 

There is also a feature where you can get information of relatives from these characters, where you can for instance help their aunt/cousin/spouse in order to boost their allegiance to dedsec. This concept however is surface level implementation. When you look at games such Shadow of War, they have nemesis system where certain NPC can interact one and another vastly changing the gameplay and each playthrough of mission. Like getting jumped by an NPC that has a vendetta over one of your allies. The only feature that come close to this is basically your agent getting kidnap and thats it or maybe you cant recruit certain people. That being said it is still fun to see these people go through their daily lives and you can access their schedule and see whats up.

The city of london, world building, and level design of this game is very good. I think one of ubisoft games strong point is to create an somehowhat accurate and immersive world. With certain variety over territories to keep each "run" into these territories feels quite interesting. The game is really beautiful and if you have good GPU you will have a treat. It feels like you are in london.

Audio is mediocore all over, theres nothing really to comment. Because well it serves its purpose but thats about it. Other than inconsistent i see from vehicles where vehicles passing by vs you driving it sometimes is vastly different.

Story is below average unfortunately, its your typical story cringe where the execution is terrible and absolutely cringe. Dont get me wrong it has potential but its being held back, probally decision made by the higher ups. The impact and progression of each character in the story makes no sense and is just bad. there are concepts that you could pursue certain horrors but it feels like these concepts just like the game are surface level not being explored enough and are there just for shock factor.", "timestamp_created": 1675904646, "timestamp_updated": 1675904646, "voted_up": true, "votes_up": 1, "votes_funny": 0, "weighted_vote_score": "0.52173912525177002", "comment_count": 0, "steam_purchase": true, "received_for_free": false, "written_during_early_access": false, "primarily_steam_deck": false}

review: NM这僵尸模式什么垃圾玩意做的跟屎一样！！肉鸽元素是有了nm没成长性？？？？30分钟操作一个人搜集八个箱子逃跑把把都这样你不觉得无聊吗？还有在线任务也跟傻逼一样不是摧毁十辆车就是把十辆车开河里。明明可以做的更好的东西偏偏做了个及格，想做网游就是不会做，不会做你他妈单机能不能做好一点？？？还有nm卖的角色就几个好用的这点属性还好意思拿出来卖？就单纯想让玩家去抓宝可梦是吧？还有你们设计的那两个逼战术行动设计师恶意直接拉满！有多恶意呢？最后一个boss都是伤害检测器，四次要是打不死他就直接死，狼群还行最后操作无人机进去电芯片就完事了，但是nmdOMNI计划是哪个小天才想出来的？？？？最近就给两光盾让你躲？被炸一下就掉？最后一关就那两光盾nm掉了就死。真的傻逼育碧不会做网游就tm别做！！！做的一坨屎！nm做成这样在线他妈的想匹配一个人都难！

review: Лично мне Легион зашёл, играть приятно и интересно, новая часть Watch Dogs, казалось бы, но... Фишка игры - хакерство, взлом и т.д. и т.п. не продвинулась, всё осталось как во 2-й части, а что-то такое чувство и вовсе урезано. Вообщем Ubisoft умеет поганить свои игры, выпуская их словно на скорую руку с минимальными изменениями в лучшую сторону. Брал по большой скидке, без неё покупать игру не советую, не стоит она своей полной цены.

review:
7/10
I liked the recruit anyone thing it was ambitious and added a lot to the world, but you barely ever need to swap characters and there's no depth to the tech/hack skills to make the characters feel unique. Instead of finding people with special skills I just picked whoever had a voice that matched their appearance. It's odd that Aiden/Wrench from the DLC were more interesting with their dialog than any of the randoms I found. The missions are all very samey. Dialog way too edgy. I enjoyed it as much as the other games but it's the weakest of the 3.

review: Душная хуйня. Если у вас есть работа, то не устраиваетесь еще на одну купив дрочильню юбисофт. Фича с персонажами прикольная, но это возведено в абсолют, поскольку на каждого нового агента необходимо тратить от 10 до 20 минут. Но самая главная проблема в этой игре, это поиск красивого женского персонажа. До чего дошло, чтобы найти бабу с ебалом не как у муравья или косорылого ебалорога нужно потратить пять часов жизни, и то вам придется замарафетить ее, потому что она по лору старая манда с соответствующим голосом. 12 старух 10. Наслаждайтесь

review:
Ultimateエディションを購入しましたがレギオンだけ楽しむならGoldで十分
先に前日譚ブラッドラインをやってた方がストーリーが分かりやすい
レジスタンスモードでゲームをクリアしましたが面白かったです
レンチ君の高高度からのスパイダー潜入とエイデンおじさんのドンパチ＆ハックとドローンエキスパートおばあちゃんにお世話になりました
せっかくいろんなモブを操作するゲームなのだからGTAVみたいにいくつかのキャラを同時展開するミッションがもっと欲しいと思いました
何もない道路からパトカーが出現して追突即手配はビビる

あとUBIsoft Connect Launcherがひどい

review:
herkes bu oyunu yerden yere vurdu. oynamayanlar izlediği youtuber ne eleştiri yaptıysa aynılarını söyleyerek oyuna laf attı falan. iade edecektim aldıktan sonra tüm eleştirileri görünce. bi deneyeyim dedim. girdim gördüm. oyun gayet iyi. kaliteli, neredeyse sıkıntısız bir oyun. evet, olmasa da olurdu veya olmalıydı dedirten şeyler var mı? var. ama bunlar oyunun ortalamanın oldukça üstünde olan kalitesini değiştirmiyor. 

sanki piyasada ki tüm oyunlar rdr 2 (allah) seviyesindeymişte, watch dogs legion bu ortalama üstü kalitede çıkmış gibi yorumlar var. açık dünya olan ve kaliteli olan bir oyun oynamak istiyorsanız oynayabileceğiniz en iyi oyunlardan birisi budur. evet, bi rdr 2 değil, gta 5 değil ama gayet iyi bir oyun.

oyun 700 TL etmez. bu bir gerçek. ama ben oyun yanlışlıkla 60 lira satışa koyulduğunda satın aldım ve iyi ki de almışım. 250-300 liralık oyun kalitesine sahip. 

- Eksileri -

Optimizasyonu iyi değil.

Şehirdeki NPC'lerin çirkin olması için uğraşılmış gibi. Güzel, yakışıklı insan yok, herkes absürt tiplere sahip ve oldukça çirkin. Londra şehrinde beyaz ingilizden çok arap, asyalı, zenci var. oyun burada sjw ve eşitlikçi tavrını gösteriyor. oynarken en çok yakındığım şey bu oldu. tüm şehri kontrol edebiliyoruz, ama şehirde güzel insan yok amk. Asasins Creed karaktakteri eklemişler. kadın ve zenci. madem şehri ucube çirkinlerle dolduracaksınız bari karakter yaratma veya olan karakterin yüzünü değiştirme olsaydı. 

silahlar airsoft silahları gibi hissettiriyor, pıt pıt. gerçek harbici ağır güçlü bir silah kullanıyormuş gibi hissetmek istiyorum. RDR'de öyle mesela.

araba sürüşü çok iyi değil, ama göze çok batmıyor da.

The story is captivating enough to keep you coming back until you've finished it, though I must say I'm a little disappointed that it only took around ~12 hours to finish the story just playing the main missions back-to-back.

review:
와치독스 시리즈 입문작이고 골드에디션으로 구매했습니다
혹평이 너무 많아 걱정했는데 취향 저격했는지 저는 존나 재밌네요
분명 똑같은 유비식 오픈월드 하는일 폐지줍기랑 뺑뺑이가 플탐70%는 차지하는데
그냥 해킹+드론으로 여기저기 들쑤시며 찾는것도 재밌어서 폐지를 계속 줍게됩니다
지역해방 미션도 잘 만들어놔서 좀 감탄했음 배경 보는맛도 있고 드론활용도 재밌네요
무엇보다 요원들 커마까지 가능해서 입맛대로 꾸며놓고 아지트에서 단체 사진 찍으면
메인주인공 부재로 인한 스토리 몰입? 이런건 더이상 상관없을 정도로 뽕맛이 오집니다
라딸때문에 유플에서 계속 안사고 존버했는데 존버할만한 가치가 있는 게임이였고
살까말까 고민하지 말고 한번만 맛보세요 츄라이 츄라이

review:
(I've written an update to this review at the bottom)

A great game with tons of potential for many hours of entertainment.  But, it's not without its flaws, at least, in its current state, that is.  For starters, it's very poorly optimised and no matter how beefed up your computer, the game just doesn't render well or even correctly a lot of times.  My computer is on the very high-end side of abilities and even I am having troubles with this games bugginess.  

Secondly, NPCs are way too aggressive towards you.  There are factions and a reputation system in effect within the in-game world.  But even when you are in good standing with a civilian NPC, just standing next to them will instigate a physical fight.  It is pretty annoying when you're trying to figure something out about a mission or something other than what's right in front of you, that you get nagged by someone shoving and swearing at your character.  For instance, there was an NPC that I thought might be a suitable recruit, so I stood there reading his bio and what things he can bring to the team.  But because the game has been written the way it has, I ended up in a punch-up with the guy instead of recruiting him.  And all I had done was stand there, in his general proximity.  But that was enough.  I even walked away a few steps to try and see if the guy would settle down, but nope.  Apparently it was on and I had offended his mother with my presence (or at least it would seem --  there was no mother involved, LOL!).  

It runs, but there are infrequent crashes.  It can be very inconvenient, especially when you get the one I had right after a huge mission, but before I was able to save.  I'm still going to recommend this game, since it isn't so frustrating that I'm going to stop playing it.  

Another source of gripe, and this might just be me, but I get very tired of all the forced diversity and woke grandstanding that's crammed into all the dialogue.  It's like the developers beliefs and ideologies are being broadcast through the game, which is being used as a mechanism to virtue signal and say what should and shouldn't be a good person's beliefs and politics.  Again, not everyone will agree with my assessment and even further, some might agree with the messages touted.  But my point being, is that its purpose as a game is for entertainment, not recruiting followers ideologically.  Perhaps they did their best to avoid saturating it with political aspects, and maybe it's just not possible to get around entirely.  And so, that's why I'll give it a pass, since it's genuinely a great game, gameplay wise.

Update:  
I ran across a faction within the game called the English Patriotic Action Front (EPAF).  In a data stick labelled Kennington Park #1, I read their "three pillars of the EPAF" statement and I've gotta say, it seems pretty reasonable.  It states that English people have the right to live in a society free of fear and not to have any individual, group, or ideology to force their values upon them.  And that's apparently the enemy in this game.  

Seriously?! How can a game about London possibly make English people out to be the badguys? What kind of mental gymnastics do you have to maneuver to arrive at that conclusion? I know that politics have gone through a great many changes in the past few years, but to see a major title come down so hard on the good people of the United Kingdom as they are within this franchise, it is simply malicious and deviant in my humble opinion.  

In an ideal world, shouldn't every person throughout the globe have a right to reside in peace and free of invasion from outside forces? Then why should England be any different? Why must they, and only they, sacrifice their homeland for the world? Are they the only nation that doesn't have rights and freedoms? Are the British uniquely undeserving of compassion and empathy? I think not.  

For this simple, yet astonishing fact, I am changing my review from positive to negative.  I can't in good conscience recommend this game after this realisation.  I appreciate that this was a small piece of meta data, which is not necessary to complete the game, but how can I support something so reprehensible? If those are the true thoughts, feelings, and politics of the developers, I am disgusted!

review: Watch Dogs: Legion is an amazing addition to the series. the game mechanics are more intuitive than the mechanics on the previous entries to the series and the story line is very compelling, along with the ability to play any character on the streets of London. the game takes place in a futuristic London that has fell to chaos filled with endless things to do. the only complaint i have is the lack of the ability to purchase vehicles for characters that do not already have vehicles. the ability to purchase/customize vehicles should be a given on any open world game that involves having to drive to your next mission. all in all, i would give Watch Dogs: Legion 4.5/5 stars

review:
I understand the Ubisoft mockery and hate. However, for 80% off the game is decent. It's no Watch Dogs 2 (WD2), but it's good in its own way.
Since it's a major piece of advice I'll leave it here: Play on perma-death mode. it actually adds an element of risk to the game, and consequences for failure. Otherwise you just keep blindly throwing people at a problem until it's fixed.

The Good:
Drones take centre stage as a novel innovation here. Where WD2 focussed mainly on water and land vehicles, drones take centre stage here. There's many kinds and they add a lot of dynamics to the game, especailly when you start hacking them as well.
The whole legion aspect's pretty well done, with a few issues (see below). There's a respectable number of voices for the typical number of recruits, and a lot of features they can have. Customisation is varied as well.
A lot of the missions are well made and fun, although you've seen most of them in WD2.
The map is well populated with activity and feels alive, without being bloated with collectable crap and other pointless stuff.
The story's plotlines are pretty good, although I personally preferred WD2's.

The Bad
London city centre, whilst varied in its urban environments, still lacks a lot of the variety one wants from an open world. WD2 had large green spaces, swampy lakeland, mountainous regions, etc. London map is mostly flat and with only one major water area.
London lacks a lot of the tech company focus that made WD2's world interesting. The majority of the locations are random famous landmarks with a factional presence.
The legion system does have a few drawbacks. Firstly, since it's not uncommon to have recruits who share a voice, you can end up in situations where it sounds like you're chatting to yourself. Secondly, despite the fact you're encouraged to recruit a lot of people, there's only about 10 unique recruitment missions, so you'll be doing the same job a lot. Finally, the clothing customisation is an arse to navigate as there's around 15 clothing shops and no real way to identify where you might find specific clothing types. WD2 had a half dozen clothing stores that made it clear what they sold (sportswear, formalwear, etc.)
The last third of the game increasingly becomes a shooting gallery, as you frequently are either told "stand in this area as waves of enemies attack", or "escape from this area through the one exit that's filled with enemies" become common objectives. This goes heavily against the "play how you want" feel the rest of the game provides, and typically forces you to use more combat-centric characters.

Overall, it's worth a playthrough. Took me around 28 hours to do all the main missions and most of the side missions, so it's not super long, but it's a decent game for the 80% off price.

review:
Anfangs war ich ganz angetan von dem Spiel und die ersten 5 Stunden vergingen wie im Flug, doch nach diesen 5 Stunden wurde mir immer mehr klar, dass ich bereits alles gesehen habe. 

Obwohl die Ubisoft Formel durchaus zu kritisieren ist, hatte ich in den vergangenen Far Crys und Assassins Creeds meistens sehr viel Spaß. Doch Watch Dogs Legion ist so ziemlich das Langweiligste und uninspirierteste Spiel, welches ich seit langem gespielt habe. Dabei hat das Spiel mit dem virtuellen London eine durchaus interessante weil unverbrauchte Spielwelt, doch das Gameplay fühlt sich schon nach kurzer Zeit nach Arbeit an.

Leider erscheinen dieser Tage nur noch selten Spiele in diesem Stil (früher hätte man GTA Klon gesagt) und wenn sie erscheinen sind sie Schrott, siehe Saints Row (2022) und eben Watch Dogs Legion.

เกมนี้สำหรับผมแล้ว

ภาพสวยครับ แต่ระบบ combat ยังไม่ค่อยสนุกเท่าไหร่ มันเท่ก็จริงแต่น่าเบื่อ 
ส่วนเรื่อง hack ในเกมก็ยังทำได้ยังไม่สุด เหมือนเอาของเดิมๆมายำ แค่เพิ่มระยะทาง (hack หมุนท่อนั้นอะ ถ้าใช้โดรนบิน ก็วนรอบตึก หมุนนิดหน่อย แค่นั้น) ควรน่าจะมีลูกเล่นเยอะกว่านี้ ส่วนใหญ่ที่เห็นก็หมุนท่อกับลอบเข้าไป hack ข้อมูลในฐานศัตรู 

และพวกอุปกรณ์ skill ต่างๆก็น้อย สไปเดอร์บอทที่แทบจะเป็นตัวละครหลักของเกมนี้ ก็ทำอะไรได้ไม่มาก เงินในเกมก็ซื้อได้แค่ของแต่งตัว กิจกรรมอื่นๆภายในเกมก็ไม่สนุก

เอาเป็นว่า ถ้าเกมจะออกมาสภาพนี้ ถ้าคิดเรื่องวิธี hack ไม่ออก ก็น่าจะใส่ระบบต่อสู้ให้แบบเข้มข้นไปเลย ท่า takedown เยอะๆ อาวุธเยอะๆ ไม่ก็เพิ่มระบบ แต่งโดรน แต่งสไปเดอร์บอทหน่อย ไม่ใช่มีแต่สีสกิน เอาจริงสีก็น้อยเกิ้น เพิ่มระบบศัลยกรรมหรืออะไรก็ได้ ไม่ใช่แค่เดาะบอลกับปาเป้า 

ส่วนเนื้อเรื่องก็จั๊กจี้ดีสำหรับผม ที่ดีคือ ภาพสวย แต่แสงในเกมนี้ บางมุมก็มีแปลกๆไงไม่รู้ เหมือนแสงบัคๆ แต่พอเปิด ray tracing สะท้อนแสงดูดีขึ้น ภาพสวยขึ้นแต่กินเครื่องจัด เปิดที fps drop ห้วบๆ ต้องเปิด DLSS เพื่อดัน fps พอเปิดภาพก็เบลอ ไม่คมตาอีก 

ภาค 2 สนุกสุด แถม free running ได้ด้วย

สรุปแล้ว
เกมนี้ภาพสวย photo mode รัวๆ เกมเพลย์ไม่สมกับเป็นภาคที่ 3 ของ watch dogs แต่ก็เล่นได้จนจบ

{"recommendationid": "132493688", "author": {"steamid": "76561198086788175", "num_games_owned": 292, "num_reviews": 33, "playtime_forever": 5549, "playtime_last_two_weeks": 0, "playtime_at_review": 3443, "last_played": 1712498890}, "language": "thai", "review": "เกมนี้สำหรับผมแล้ว

ภาพสวยครับ แต่ระบบ combat ยังไม่ค่อยสนุกเท่าไหร่ มันเท่ก็จริงแต่น่าเบื่อ 
ส่วนเรื่อง hack ในเกมก็ยังทำได้ยังไม่สุด เหมือนเอาของเดิมๆมายำ แค่เพิ่มระยะทาง (hack หมุนท่อนั้นอะ ถ้าใช้โดรนบิน ก็วนรอบตึก หมุนนิดหน่อย แค่นั้น) ควรน่าจะมีลูกเล่นเยอะกว่านี้ ส่วนใหญ่ที่เห็นก็หมุนท่อกับลอบเข้าไป hack ข้อมูลในฐานศัตรู 

และพวกอุปกรณ์ skill ต่างๆก็น้อย สไปเดอร์บอทที่แทบจะเป็นตัวละครหลักของเกมนี้ ก็ทำอะไรได้ไม่มาก เงินในเกมก็ซื้อได้แค่ของแต่งตัว กิจกรรมอื่นๆภายในเกมก็ไม่สนุก

เอาเป็นว่า ถ้าเกมจะออกมาสภาพนี้ ถ้าคิดเรื่องวิธี hack ไม่ออก ก็น่าจะใส่ระบบต่อสู้ให้แบบเข้มข้นไปเลย ท่า takedown เยอะๆ อาวุธเยอะๆ ไม่ก็เพิ่มระบบ แต่งโดรน แต่งสไปเดอร์บอทหน่อย ไม่ใช่มีแต่สีสกิน เอาจริงสีก็น้อยเกิ้น เพิ่มระบบศัลยกรรมหรืออะไรก็ได้ ไม่ใช่แค่เดาะบอลกับปาเป้า 

ส่วนเนื้อเรื่องก็จั๊กจี้ดีสำหรับผม ที่ดีคือ ภาพสวย แต่แสงในเกมนี้ บางมุมก็มีแปลกๆไงไม่รู้ เหมือนแสงบัคๆ แต่พอเปิด ray tracing สะท้อนแสงดูดีขึ้น ภาพสวยขึ้นแต่กินเครื่องจัด เปิดที fps drop ห้วบๆ ต้องเปิด DLSS เพื่อดัน fps พอเปิดภาพก็เบลอ ไม่คมตาอีก 

ภาค 2 สนุกสุด แถม free running ได้ด้วย

review:
Comme vous pouvez le voir je ne recommande pas ce jeu, même si je prend en compte ses qualités, ses défauts font que je ne vous recommande pas ce jeu.
Commençant par ses qualités:
Le jeu est beau et la ville de Londre ( à part que tout le monde roule à contre-sens, ils savent pas que c'est par la voie de droite qu'il faut rouler ) est belle, de plus d'avoir une variété de publicité en 3d et tagues des révoltes.
On a un système de recrutement amusant pendant 5 heures.
On une variété de qualités et de défauts avec leurs propres équipements des personnages que l'on recrutes entre les drones, ceux avec problèmes d'achat d'habits, de gaz, de joueur compulsives, et ceux qui résistes plus que la moyenne, ou qui portent un costumes qui les rends incognitos, ou des armes lourdes.
On a aussi l'IA qui est le seul personnage qui est sympathique et bien écrit ( et parfois il fait des blagues qui font rire ).
On est en face d'un bon GTA pour toutes ses variété de mécanismes de jeu de ville.
Il y a une quantité énormes de vêtements que l'on peut acheter, il y a plus de 20 boutiques chacune entre dizaines et une cinquantaines de vêtements.
Durant les soldes steam je l'ai acheté à 12 € ( ne l'achetez pas 60€ c'est du vol à ce prix là ).

Maintenant parlons de ses défauts:
Les ennemis principaux sont stupidement méchant, cliché, mal écris.
On a des méchants de bonne qualité dans de nombreux jeux et que ceux-la sont de qualité d'une série C, même le méchant final ne sauve pas le jeu et le jeu nous spoil son existence avant la fin du jeu.
On a des bugs en tel quantités que je risque d'oublier dont citer certains, il y a la traversé d'éléments du décor, passer entraver les structures du jeu, des piétons qui se téléportent, des crash de jeu.....
L'histoire principal est stupide on joue à Londres comme si Londres est séparé de l'Angleterre, surtout que l'on sait qu'il y n'a plus de pouvoir législative et que l'on ne voit pas les conséquences hors Londres et certains comportement des méchant pour faire méchant qui ont l'air tellement stupide.
Le système de recrutement après 10 heures devient ennuyeux.
La quête principal sont souvent au niveau de celle de recrutement et donc peu intéressante dans certains moments.
Presque ( sauf IA ) aucun de nos allié ne sont intéressant.
Il y a une boutique en ligne méga chère pour les arnaques qu'ils nous vendent, 20 € un personnages et sans parler de nouveaux habits pour nos personnages.
La quête d'assassin creed est mauvaise, au début j'étais content de l'avoir mais à la fin je conclus qu'elle était nulle et ennuyeuse.
On ne peut pas faire évoluer nos personnages que l'on joue 3 heures ou que l'on commence, les seuls caractéristiques qui comptes c'est celles qu'ils ont au début de jeu.
Et maintenant la raison principal et même si il n'avait pas ce problème j'aurais même recommander ce jeu, c'est ce virus qu'est ubisoft connect, sérieux ça ralenti le démarrage du jeu, je passe plus de 3 minutes à chaque fois plus pour ce système viral que à cause du jeu.
Ce virus espion ralenti le jeu plus que le jeu en lui même.

review:
Hikayesi ve hikayeyi anlatışı tamamen çöp. Diyaloglar, seslendirmeler bir indie oyunundan daha kötü. Ubisoft ne ara bu kadar ucuz oldu? Açık dünyası ölü, grafikler fena değil ama tükettiği performansı hak etmiyor. Rtx 2060 ile yüksek kalitede 60fps alamıyorum. İlk çıkışında çok ucuz görünce dayanamayıp aldım yoksa para verilecek oyun değil. 

Oyunu kurtaran tek şey fena olmayan bir oynanışı, ama oynanış sadece premium operative'lerle eğlenceli. Allahsız ubisoft bir de bunları parayla satıyor. Oyunun Ultimate sürümünü alıyorum ama hala mağazada bir dünya alınmayı bekleyen içerik var. Lan zaten oyunun en yüksek sürümünü almışım, daha ne kadar para verebilirim sana?

Neyseki ücretsiz bir modla kolayca tüm premium operative'lere ulaşabiliyorsunuz. Nexusmods'dan "Prestige Operatives" indirin.

came here for another aiden experience and i fully enjoyed it even tho the missions quite repetitive sometimes. but still, i enjoyed played this game because aiden & wrench are playable in deluxe ed and some bare knuckle recruits got some nice combat whenever they took down an enemy. lovely jubbly.

how i can say about the story, uh.... it's good. resistance, took down some london villains, human trafficking, AI stuffs, yea the story is good enough tho.

 i dunno it's like i feel like there is a combination of watch_dogs and watch_dogs 2 here. i mean, watch_dogs got a cool dark story and watch_dogs 2 is good at its gameplay mechs. So, watch dogs legion is definitely a combination of them.

oh, don't ask me about the bugs, well you know, ubisoft lmao.

review:
作为育婊的忠实粉丝，身在水深火热的土豆服务器疯狂挣扎的死忠粉，从看门狗一代到现在玩了军团，我实在是不得不好好评价这坨答辩，真的简直是依托答辩，从剧情上讲，搭前不搭后，地图设计的简直是反人类，重重复复的游戏任务让人厌烦，各种科技设计让人眼前一黑，我一开始觉得可能是我有点更不上次时代潮流，心里想着和育碧处了这么些年了，全境封锁2都玩下来了，这算什么？
但是！
tnnd！和一代二代联动，才是真正游戏本体，和刺客信条枭雄联动，还恶心玩家的时候，我真的整个人都无语住了，这种辣鸡游戏，拿什么要这高价的？！从头到尾，就没有一个能夸的，科技科技拉闸，跑酷跑酷还删了，打斗强行加进去了一些所谓的功夫元素？！只能说，简直依托答辩！
不过仁者见仁，智者见智吧，萝卜青菜，各有所爱，身为资深老玩家，已经没有任何语言能洗地了，就这样吧
——来自小黑盒用户恶灵先生的评价

review: yarrak gibi bir oyun olduğunu bilmeme rağmen fiyatının tavuk dönerden ucuz olmasından mütevellit almak istedim. çünkü açık dünya fetişim var. oyun masmaalesef sıkıntılarla dolu. hikayesi oldukça bayat. vuruş hissiyatı berbat, boncuk sıkmaktan farkı yok. araba sürüş mekanikleri rezil. optimizasyon çok kötü ve biraz da buglu bir oyun. ana ve yan görevler birbirinin aynısı. sadece son 2-3 görev farklıydı. bomboş içeriklerle doldurulmuş klasik bir Ubisoft açık dünya oyunu. halbuki 2. oyunu severek oynamıştım. başarımlar olsaydı, biraz daha zaman geçirirdim. çok bile oynamışım amına koyim.

review:
Einfach nur HAMMER das game (Watch Dogs Legion) macht so Spaß zur Zocken. Als ich das spiel jetzt paar stunden angezockt hab, war ich sowas von begeistert und konnte einfach nicht aufhören weiter zu Zocken xD Man muss einfach dafür die Entwicklern [UBISOFT] respektieren, dass die so ein tolles spiel raus gebracht haben bzw eine gute Arbeit geleistet haben. Vielen Vielen dank an die Entwicklern [UBISOFT] !!! Ich bin mir auch ziemlich sicher, dass ihr alle auch so Spaß haben werdet, wie ich :D Gönnt euch einfach und genießt es selber !!! ^^ Natürlich Zocke ich dat Spiel wieder auf Maximale Auflösung 3840 X 2160 und die Grafik Qualität auf ULTRA bis es nicht mehr geht, wie immer halt xDDDD

Gameplay und Grafik Top, da kann man wirklich nicht meckern :)

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2239550/Watch_Dogs_Legion/

Forget all the half-arsed reviews along the lines of "Wah wah wah, Ubisoft are big and nasty and they stole my lunch money..."  Watch Dogs: Legion is an amazingly polished game.  As a Londoner, it's a treat to actually stand in places I've been in real life, and the London of WD:L is a chillingly realistic future possibility.  The five major villains (count 'em) are various degrees of monstrous,  and the plot is clever and well realised.   Bagley, DedSec's friendly AI, is sardonic, sarcastic and caustic but always lovable, and each recruit you add to the roster (and yes, you can recruit literally anyone) soon acquires their own personality, helped by some spot-on voice acting which really helps reflect the wonderful multi-culturalism of London.  I've just finished my first play-through and I immediately want to go again - it's that good.  I do recommend you go with perma-death on though; the stakes are so much higher when your operatives can die on missions.  

Wait for WD:L on sale if you like (and there's probably no reason not to), but do buy it.  You won't regret it.

Oh and yes, there are micro-transactions if you want to go there - this is Ubisoft - but they are tucked away in a corner of the team menu and can safely be ignored.  Nothing you can buy there is in any way essential to the game.

review:
Хуже второй, но лучше первой. Каким-то образом они умудрились сделать процесс зачистки карты интереснее основных квестов. Жаль что не добавили фич из второй части, типа стычек банд и отсутствие загрузочного экрана.
Главный минус: Слишком мало лгбт персон и флагов, не возникает желания резни.

review:
Me lo pillé con la oferta de 12€ porque me olía que ubisoft lo volvería hacer, y no me equivocaba. El mundo de watch dogs está guay, pero el juego es una basura. Vas tranquilamente caminando por la acera, y de repente empiezan a dispararte. Mecánicas muy toscas. Me molaba la idea esa de tener varios agentes, y que tengan muerte permanente, pero cuando el juego está tan mal hecho que tus agentes se mueren sólo por respirar, pues eso. Una basura. Intentaré avanzar un poco más, pero vamos no me lo terminaré ni de coña, sigo con la misión del obrero viendo cómo caen mis agentes ante NPCs que sacan el arma porque les zumba una mosca en la oreja. En fin, Bugisoft.

Update: Crasheo constante.

review:
Игра НУ ОЧЕНЬ СИЛЬНО отличается от предыдущих. Словно вся серьезность была высосана и уничтожена. 
К тому же непонятно, в этой вселенной есть Тамплиеры и Асасины из одноименной игры. Значит ли что нам спойлернули, что их война продолжается спустя десятилетия после нашего времени и ничего толком и не поменялось?...

Сама игра вышла банально детской. Не смотря на все, играть прикольно
Хз что с игрой, у меня она вечно вылетает!

review:
[h1][b] - Продуктивність [/b][/h1]

Купа багів, глюків(персонажі, предмети літаю крізь текстури). Впродовж усіє гри було більше 10 крешів. Персонажі реагують незрозуміло (рандомно) на дії гравця. Фреймрейт непоганий.

[h1][b] - Геймплей [/b][/h1]

Паркуру з попередніх ігор практично немає. Кожен оператор відчувається занадто простим, без будь якого прогресу. У кожного оператора 2 слота зброї і 1 слот на гаджет (+1 у деяких особливих персонажів). Оператори хоча і працюють разом, ви ні разу не побачите їх разом у роботі (тільки на останній місії). Не кожен оператор має доступ до машин..., персонажі не діляться машинами або іншими засобами і ти не можеш купити спільну для використання кожним оператором "Дедсек машину"... Водіння просто погане.  Після 20 годин гри я зустрів усіх можливих персонажів, тобто приблизно 30 більш-менш унікальних і можливо 5 з них справді будуть корисними під час гри. Персонажі не мають нічого спільного між собою, вони не навчають один одного битись, зламувати, водити і т.п. Ніяких принципово нових опцій для гакінгу не добавлено. Три типи літаючих дронів, одна турель і один павук. Ворожі персонажі без будь якого інтелекту - б'ються рукопашною якщо ти почав їх бити(навіть коли програють) і не повідомляють по радіо своїх колег, які буквально в 20 метрах від них стоять і ніяк не реагують; припиняють пошуки після буквально хвилини; ніяким чином не вичисляють гравця у системі, хоча в них є доступ до усіх технологій Дедсек і т.д. Система рукопашного бою дуже проста і повторювана (три кнопки дій).

[h1][b] - Озвучка  [/b][/h1]

Оператори часто говорять голосами які їм явно не підходять (молоді персонажі розмовляють з голосом старої людини). Акценти інколи не мають ніякого сенсу (явно людина з світлою шкірою має сильний індійський акцент і таких прикладів просто безліч -  загалом це виглядає дивно і неприродно). Деяким голосам взагалі просто додали вищий тон і вони звучать як роботи (сфабрикований, неприродній голос). 

[h1][b] - Сюжет [/b][/h1]

Двома словами посередній сюжет. Через відсутність головного персонажа, оператори не ростуть, не змінюються, не стають кращими чи гіршими. Будь яка дія гравця немає ніякого впливу на гру в цілому. Так звані боси нічим не відрізняються від простих персонажів (вони це роблять бо можуть та й все). [spoiler] Кожна смерть боса відчується посередньою без будь якого впливу на гравця або світу навколо.[/spoiler] [spoiler] Кінцівка була низькоякісною після "смерті" Беглі, через буквально 20 секунд після титрів, його знаходять і він оживає (казка з "добрим кінцем"). [/spoiler]
