review:
tl;dr: mid af. buy on 75% discount or higher otherwise maybe try the previous Watch Dogs.

Pretty mediocre after the first 10 hours of so. The ability to recruit anyone is cool and unique, but it gets pretty boring and I found myself using at most 3 operators at a time. Since there's so many characters with different voice actors and such, dialogue between your operators and NPCs can feel a bit awkward. I feel like there could have been more potential with the operator system, but otherwise the only reason you recruit people is to unlock uniformed access to restricted locations and a few decent perks they come with. You can customize their look but don't expect to somehow improve your operators in any way, or have operators help each other out. On the map you'll have operators "scout out" a mission area if you have available missions, but all that means is you can swap to that operator so you don't have to drive there yourself. They're not spotting enemies for you or giving you cover fire or drone support. Operators act exactly like any other NPC when you're not playing as them, which sucks as you'd hope operators would at least acknowledge each other's existence.

Speaking of which the city is pretty boring. It's lively enough with foot traffic and cars (most of which are self driving) but the only randomness in the city is an occasional bad guy harassing a civilian. I think there's maybe 3 distinct versions of this action at most. There's no cop vs. gang action unless one of them mysteriously spawns in a restricted location. The worst part example of this dead city is when you liberate a district and it becomes defiant. There's a quick 5 second cutscene of some major building having corporate propoganda replaced with DeadSec messages, and after that the whole borough looks exactly the same as far as I can tell. The only difference is that on occasion (I've only witnessed this once in my 77hr playthrough) when cops do random checks on civilians, other civilians may come in and fight the cops. Otherwise there's no actual change to how the police/gangs/civilians behave, but hey at least it makes it easier to recruit people.

Gameplay is alright. Stealth seems pretty easy and simple. Just distract guards, either direct hacking or making nearby cams/traps/drones make noise) and then do a takedown while they're distracted. If you want super easy gameplay, use a spiderbot to completely clear an area without risking your operator's life since it can do takedowns and hack into almost anything. If you get spotted with a spiderbot, all the guards get alerted for a minute and then go back to normal. Gunplay is fine enough, definitely no depth to it. Playing on the hardest difficulty is rough when you're forced into gunfights since healing is super delayed and, unless you're in constant cover, you will be getting hit. Some missions will force you to fight even if you were stealthing perfectly and nobody was alerted. Side missions will pretty much play out like main missions.  A few of them brought something new to the table but otherwise it's doing the exact same thing as main missions. Outside of missions the only side activities are darts, football, and being a delivery driver. You can also collect a billion collectibles in the world, classic Ubisoft. During my playthough, there were a few visual glitches here and there, with teleporting NPCs and the car radio not working. There was one instance of a recruiting bug but otherwise nothing game-breaking.

Story was interesting in the first hour then I kinda stopped caring. They forced an emotional part of the story when I couldn't care less. The villains in the story are pretty basic, the main characters that help you seem irrelevant after a while. Definitely forgettable but I don't think having a good story was a priority when making this game, nor did I come in expecting one.

Side note you need to install the Ubisoft client to play this game, and it's a buggy mess every time you boot up this game via Steam, at least for me.

review:
I think WD 2 is the best when it comes with the main story compare to WD Legion, this game has so much potential but I can't forgive the clunky movement, lack of parkour, weapon arsenal is a big joke, no more feeling of satisfying after beating the boss, NO STEAM ACHIEVEMENT (completely massive joke), and Fck off Ubisoft Launcher.

Update: Atleast now there are steam achievement that you can unlock, but still meh for this game

review: Одни негативные эмоции во время прохождения. Игра говорит тебе мол проходи как хакер, используй скрытность и нелетальное оружие. Тем временем игра намеренно посылает на тебя целую колонну солдат уже заранее знающих твое место расположение, при этом сменить хотя бы гаджет для агента для данной ситуации игра не разрешает. Сама игра таким методом вынуждает проходить почти всю игру за штурмовика с тяжелым вооружением, при этом сама стрельба отвратительна, хитбоксы поломаны, что у людей что и у дронов, бывало что выстрел в упор пролетал сквозь противника. Единственный плюс это сюжет про агента MI6 Малика, он получился не таким хреновым на фоне остального основного сюжета.

review:
I really can't find a reason to finish this game. Due to the "play as anyone" system every character in the game is a dull generic nobody who all share voice and lines with each other. The missions aren't fun either, they all feel like radiant Skyrim quests, once you start seeing repeat locations with not even a change in guard patrol routes whatever fun you could have with the gameplay vanishes.

I've heard that London is very accurately rendered in the game, I can't speak for that but if it's the case then London must be one of the worst places to live, the entire city looks and feels absolutely unappealing.

Buy or replay Watch Dogs 2 instead, it's a better game by miles.
i love this game i will admit it does have its falls but adlest its not a cyberpunk 2077 situation

review:
個人是系列玩家，全破後的感想
非常讚 個人評分(9/10)
遊戲性、耐玩性、故事性、難度設定皆很出色，唯一音樂可能比較還好，看門狗系列賣點就不是音樂。

(1)單人主線任務故事蠻有張力的，也很特別，玩法、解謎也有變化，做的很用心。

(2)線上模式雖然就是像RDO等多人模式一樣，解每日、合作任務外，最經典的入侵模式也是我最愛玩的，也是耐完又有趣，入侵鬥智耍其他玩家真的很刺激、這代被識破身分後還可以切換到路人身上繼續躲藏，增加了入侵成功的簡單度與刺激度。一些小技巧：躲樹叢、召無人機製造混亂、召飛機撞被入侵的人，都是玩到一直笑。

(3)線上獎勵很棒還有會員證與點數可拿(會員證可提高聲望與錢的增加30%)。

(4)有多種無人機各有不同性能可供駭入使用，搭乘飛機到處飛、瀏覽倫敦美景，另外值得一提這代的畫面真的很美，各種景點也是做得很到位，一樣是育碧標準的觀光遊戲。

(5)以經典模式+鐵血破關，特務死了不能復活真的會很哭，但就是在考驗操作盡量不要死。

review:
买下来之后一直放在库里吃灰，下载下来玩，很失望。
答辩，依托答辩
地图、玩法有点类似黑道圣徒和GTA
没有车库是最蛋疼的
条子们居然北保安公司控制了
英国引以为傲的铁路系统也被不能动的模型代替
火车站成了保安公司的大本营
请不要在各种古遗迹上乱涂乱画
开车门放歌实在太烦，一遍又一遍的关掉电台
灵活度太差，任务太无趣，获得的开锁密钥还需要重新获取，敌人地方势力刷新太快，开车没太多手感和兴奋点。。。
能吐槽的地方太多了
罪不可忍的是，经常会卡顿，一卡就是十几秒。
辣鸡，辣鸡

review:
I like how unique the whole concept of this game is, being able to recruit anyone you see doesn't matter how ridiculous it may seem. You wanna play as grandma? go ahead. I like how the games makes you think which recruit to use for the next mission based on their background, skills, equipment, etc. The problem is that the game's story suffers because of that. The dialog and VA of the recruits can be extremely cringy to listen to and can make the story very forgettable. But, If you play the game as Wrench or Aiden Pearce the whole way through, the story feels much better and interesting. Speaking of Aiden, the Bloodlines DLC is actually really good the best DLC in the series giving Aiden closure for what he want through in WD1. I don't think this game is worth full price but if you can get it with the bloodline DLC for 15 to 20 dollars go for it you'll not be disappointed. 

And as a quick note the Assassin's Creed Crossover was a really nice surprise it's kinda weird and sad that Watch Dogs feels more like Assassin's Creed than Assassin's Creed does nowadays.

review: Игра на самом деле вовсе не так плоха, как кажется, но на харде её проходить просто-напросто больно. Ты можешь без проблем пройти кучу миссий, зачистить всю карту одним агентом, но вдруг, проходя сюжетку, тебя ставят по середине комнаты, вокруг бесконечно спавняться враги, а тебя убивают с двух тычек. И у тебя тупо нет возможности заныкаться. Точнее есть, то тогда сюжетный таймер перестаёт идти, вот так беда))

review:
как всегда, унылое самокопирование из игры в игру, красивый мир как обычно, но унылая до ужаса игра, с абсолютно идиотской системой группировки, набирай всяких бомжей в дед сек, или купи премиальных персов, а если ты ещё купишь улучшенное издание, так вообще получишь, сразу Рэнча и Эйдена.
Теперь согласитесь, что гораздо интереснее играть за бабку с пассивками пердёж и рандомная смерть, чем Рэнч и Эйден, ну реально лохи, кому вообще интересно будет развивать дед сек, если тупо купил имбо оперов и гоняешь, весь смысл игры убит.

review: Не скажу что она плохая но и не хорошая это точно. Сюжет высосан из пальца. Чисто на хайпе первой и второй части решили ребята бабки срубить своими вип аккаунтами. Не смотря на такую большую карту все миссии будут в 4-5 локациях все время проходить. по стелсу играть тоже нет смысла берите агентов которые выносливые и шмалять умеют так как иначе трудно будет пройти. Зарабатывание деньги только на шмот который ни нач то не влияет тоже не понятно зачем. Вобщем ХАЛТУРА лучше первые две части перепройти

review:
Absolutely disgusting game. Poorly optimized, buggy as hell and no satisfying feature. I got it for 12 $ and still I feel like I got ripped off. Ubi has become unable to provide an outstanding product. The company is exclusively living on past successes (ex. Rainbow Six). No one cares about anything but a decent product that can provide some fun which apparently is just too hard to get. 

P.S. 110GB for this game it's just crazy considering you can play RDR2 for the same amount of disk space.

raw_json: {"recommendationid": "135083693", "author": {"steamid": "76561198115257611", "num_games_owned": 258, "num_reviews": 20, "playtime_forever": 2178, "playtime_last_two_weeks": 0, "playtime_at_review": 624, "last_played": 1748449036}, "language": "english", "review": "crashing every five minutes, it's like I'm being hacked by DeadSec themselves.", "timestamp_created": 1679387295, "timestamp_updated": 1679387352, "voted_up": false, "votes_up": 2, "votes_funny": 3, "weighted_vote_score": "0.522865891456604004", "comment_count": 0, "steam_purchase": true, "received_for_free": false, "written_during_early_access": false, "primarily_steam_deck": false, "timestamp_dev_responded": 1679414637, "developer_response": "Hey there. I'm sorry to see that you're experiencing these crashes in Watch Dogs Legion! To help with easing these crashes, there are a few things I suggest giving a try. First, I recommend ensuring that your system does meet the [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-us/help/watch-dogs-legion/article/system-requirements-for-watch-dogs-legion/000079857]minimum requirements[/url] for the game. If it does, I instead suggest running through our [url=https://ubi.li/4mnuS]Basic PC Troubleshooting[/url] guide. [url=https://ubi.li/k3cYq]Verifying your game files[/url], along with [url=https://ubi.li/096ki]disabling your background applications[/url], are also good steps to try to resolve these crashes, as they may be caused by a corrupted game file or one of those applications. \n\nOne last thing I suggest is ensuring that the game is installed on the same drive that Ubisoft Connect and Steam is installed on, if it isn't already. Should these crashes persist, please reach out to us by opening a ticket on our [url=https://ubi.li/46uzK]Support Website[/url]. When opening that ticket, be sure to include copies of your [url=https://ubi.li/NAnxo]MSINFO and DxDiag[/url] files, as well as details on what you've tried so far in order to resolve these crashes. Thank you so much."}

review:
The simplest way of describing this is "Everything bad about the previous games squished together." Strange controls, simple-looking animations, bad voice acting, stolen art and they couldn't even bother to implement a proper Tube system.

Mind you, I only played Bloodline, which people consider to be better than the main game itself and even that was garbage.

review:
i think the game itself is fine, i will rant about the downs I had during the gameplays so skip it or read the summary at the bottom if u lazy.

So there are the ocassionaly random teleporting NPCs.

Then the ultra slow moving auto drive thats slower than the walking speed and still somehow manages to crash into another car on auto drive, wow (sarcastic clap SFX*) if i had a dollar every time it did that i get 3 dollars its not allot but happens 3 times out of the 10+ rides i had.

Another thing is that the streets are darn narrow i know Europe's streets are narrow since they were built during the horse carrage days, which makes driving really annoying especially when you crash into that albion patrol car( for those mofos who don't know its basically a millitary contractor who's in charge of Britain's security from millitary to policing, yes horrible descicion there from the gov) and then the next thing you know its a chase scene with multiple other cars crashing and attacking you wow fun. its also hard to navigate without the GPS its like a maze in there.

then the final and most infuriating problem the random mofos u can recruit, its fine and all but when u lets say got some albion officers or SIRS(the albion's version of MI6 or something), 
then happens to need said NPC for stealth infiltration to a very secure facility
(Context; uniformed access is a passive skill that reduce awareness from other NPCs when in the right place will do the trick, you usually can get them from people who works in the place like for EG, an albion officer have access to albion controled areas or construction worker have access to construction sites),
then said operative is currently working at another highly guarded area, ok so you will think its fine right  WRONG! the co worker who was beside said operative decides to get sus of the operative who's standing there. LIKE WTH why only when i take over this happens i didnt even move /фдф/ very infuriating and then i get hunted down like i wasn't supposed to be there than why am I(the operative) even working there in the first place and i got attacked on all sides cause I happend to be in the middle of many armed guards yay and then i died FUN!

Summary? try playing at your own risk also read the last point it helps alot

will i buy it? 
nah, unless its on sale .

was it worth it? 
well i read an article where this game will be no longer getting updates or anything after a year it was released so its kinda abandoned by ubisoft? IDK not enough info to confirm anything
so it depends i guess

also side note if u find recruiting a pain just get season pass they have good operatives like wrench from watchdogs 2, aden pierce from watchdogs 1, an assasin from assasins creed franchise(the worlds connected btw) and some mofo i didn't know about oh there also a free grandma in the store u can get

review: Blyat как я же душная игра,никак не кончаются задания!Сюжет высосан из дик,транспорт говно,графика говно,лица персонажей говно!Видимов юблясофт думает что Лондон состоит на 99% из азиатов,арабов и черныхАгенты умирают как нехер делать,3 моих персонажа встретили смерть КОГДА ТУРЕЛЬ ВЫЛЕЗЛА ПРЯМО НА НИХ,ИЗ ПОД НОГ ВЫРОСЛА,НА 2ИХ ДРОН УПАЛ,СУКА 4 ЧЕЛИКА УМЕРЛИ ОТ ИНФАРКТА,ВАЖНЫЕ НПС СЮЖЕТНЫЕ ТОЖЕ УМИРАЛИ ВНЕЗАПНО,ОСТАЛЬНЫЕ ЗАСТРЯЛИ В ТЕКСТУРАХ ГДЕ ИХ ЗАМОЧИЛИ,МАСТЕРА БОЕВЫХ ИССКУСТВ ОТПИЗДИЛИ В БОЮ,АССАСИНША УМЕРЛА УПАВ С ВЫСОТЫ 2 ЭТАЖА,РУ озвучка просто ужасная,такое ощущение что какая-то гопота озвучивала ага,в анг озвучке голоса женщин как у трансов,пришлось играть на японской озвучке)А помните в прошлых частях что бы попасть в закрытые места надо было узлы переключать и других альтернатив не было ?Тут тоже есть переключатели,но кому они нужны когда сзади есть уже окрытаядверь?или охранник откроет если в него выстрелишь или можно тупо забор перелезть.Единственные плюсы игры это Gorillaz в саундтреке и ассасины(тут ассасинов и лора ассасинов больше чем в последних 3 играх про ассасинов,серьезно тут даже скрытый клинок есть).ах да в игре есть сука  НЕЛЕТАЛЬНЫЙ ГРАНАТОМЕТ который взрывает полздания)

review:
Hola, hoy vengo a decir de que este juego es entretenido, yo personalmemte lo recomiendo, ya que, lo compre en oferta para probarlo debido a su mala reputación y no me parecio que es como decian, en lo personal le doy un 9/10.
Para apoyar mi reseña, lo jugue con una gt 1030 a menos de 30 fps todo bajo haciendo asi una molestia que podria afectar, en cambio no fue asi.
Saludos BlueBirdOK

review:
三代都玩過 這代人物太多有點無法培養感情 但是玩法是還蠻創新的 
DLC比本篇好玩 在板手家看到馬可仕的留言時超感動 趁特價時入手還是OK的

If you are still experiencing any difficulties with launching Watch Dogs Legion, I would recommend checking out the troubleshooting steps once you have a moment to see if this may help: 

- Install Ubisoft Connect and the game on the same drive as your OS
- [url=https://ubi.li/CrAsJ]Verify the game files[/url] 
- End unnecessary background processes via Task Manager
- Unplug non-essential peripherals (additional monitors, controllers, VR equipment, etc.)
- Complete the steps in our [url=https://ubi.li/4mnuS] PC Troubleshooting[/url] guide to rule out any further interferences
- [url=https://ubi.li/TMoYl]Clear Steam cache[/url]
- [url=https://ubi.li/plsfw]Clear Ubisoft Connect cache[/url]

After you have exhausted these steps, please keep us posted if you continue to run into this problem by contacting our [url= https://ubi.li/c0aBB]support page here[/url] with your [url=https://ubi.li/NAnxo]MsInfo and DxDiag files[/url] included so we can take a more in-depth investigation into this with you and provide more accurate solutions moving forward. Thank you!"}

review:
Un laburazo de Ubi con mecánicas interesantes pero que se queda corto a nivel jugabilidad e historia y como producto final deviene en un juego olvidable. Otro juego de los franceses con una apuesta al online que no existe.
Ojalá la próxima entrega (si es que hay) le pongan más entusiasmo a la narrativa y no tanto al apartado de cosméticos y skins.

review: Watch Dogs Legion é um jogo que definitivamente não vale a pena jogar. Todas as críticas negativas sobre ele fazem total sentido, já que este título é um exemplo de como um jogo pode falhar em todos os aspectos.Primeiro de tudo, a história é desinteressante e sem graça. O jogo apresenta um futuro próximo em que Londres é controlada por um regime autoritário, mas isso não é algo que faça você se sentir imerso na história. Na verdade, as missões são repetitivas e entediantes, sem nenhum tipo de inovação que justifique a compra do jogo. Além disso, a mecânica de recrutar novos personagens não é bem implementada e não oferece muita variedade em termos de habilidades ou personalidades.Só vale a pena comprar o jogo em uma super promoção (comprei por 50 conto), se você realmente quiser jogá-lo. Caso contrário, não é um jogo que valha a pena comprar em hipótese alguma no valor original.

review: The game in general is OK...but its EVERY buggy. i get a lot of crashes when changing clothes. it seems to the longer you play the more buggy it gets. its kinda disappointing. lastly all the characters are ugly no one is pleasant to look at. this game seems to almost take a step back from Watch Dogs 2. but if you cant get past its many flaws its not a bad game to waste time with...

review:
"主人公がいない"というのは特徴ではあれどそれは本作の最大のものではない。


[h1] [b] ドローンの操作性の良さがシリーズ屈指 [/b] [/h1]
これが最大の特徴だ。
ハッキングもテイクダウンもスパイダードローンならできる。
そして貨物ドローンでどこでも行ける。
何しろ、ハッキング可能な敵対するドローンでさえも
街中をこれでもかというほど巡回しているのだからこのUXは計り知れない。

そして
[h1] ロンドン [/h1]
PS4でやり尽くしてなお、PC版でもプレイしたい。
このゲーム体験の中、あの名所もこの名所も散策できる。
ビッグベンもバッキンガム宮殿もだ。
それをサイバーパンク調にしているのだからたまらない。
ディストピア近未来グレートブリテンロンドン。
街ごと乗っ取られたのだから。
これはロンドン市民が自身の街を取り戻す物語である。

しかしそれ故に
主人公の登場を前提としたストーリーは犠牲になったといっても過言ではない。
これ程の完成度のためには致し方なし。
人生そこまで甘くはない。

最後に
[i] [u] [b] UBISOFT Connectなるいつもの不要なアプリケーションのせいで [/b] [/u]  [/i]
[i] [u] [b] ゲーム起動に二の足を踏むことになる [/b] [/u]  [/i]
それだけはクソだ。

review: 作为看门狗系列的第三部，虽然说不是很惊艳，但及格是有的；本作加入了宝可梦模式，随机在路上抓捕一名路人加入组织还是挺有意思的（但是里面黑黑也太多了把，知道的我是在伦敦，不知道的以为在瓦坎达呢）剧情是你利用各种人的技能，更好更快的完成任务（潜行是不存在的，职业杀手直接清图）；里面有关AI的设计还是非常不错的，最后的任务补全了他的剧情，还是很令人感动的；但是也有育碧的老毛病，重复性过高，往往一个点需要去7-8次；驾驶手感稀烂，第一次在游戏里开车开的头晕；打折卖的，还是很划算的，主线+支线任务全清差不多60H，也是值回票价的，2部的主角回归也是有够情怀分的；DLC的故事线也是很不错，补全了老年人的生活，同时也有马库斯和扳手的约定戏码（dlc里面的警察也太敏感了把，有的时候路过啥也不做也能被通缉，有的时候一辆警车就刷你脸上，不知道是不是bug）期待新的作品

review: 給好評的原因是,遊戲內容有創意,可以拉路人加入陣營,還有便宜價格入手...接下來要說缺點,遊戲的存檔,存檔,存檔,說三次!!!遊戲bug多,沒關係.遊戲閃退,沒關係.遊戲愛怎麼卡,通通沒關係~DLC 嶄新教條,卡bug,( 不玩dlc總可以吧~ )放棄dlc任務,不行..回朔到dlc 之前,不行..遊戲就只有一個選項,刪除存檔.. 那就是說,浪費快20小時的遊戲時間.PS:感覺這遊戲是個半成品!!!

review:
Люблю 1 та 2 частини Watch Dogs дуже хотів пограти і 3 але мені вона не сподобалась.
Загалом гра непогана але графіка невідповідає вимогам, оптимізація загалом ок.
Сюжет ніякий багато води і ще великий мінус що немає головного героя, я всю гру(окрім деяких сюжетний місій) грав за Ейдена Пірса [spoiler](головний герой 1 Watch Dogs).[/spoiler]
Нудні та однотипні місії по типу іди хакни те іди вбий того.
Доповнення Bloodline краще та цікавіше за основну гру.
Ще є згадки про асасинів та навіть декілька місій про них [spoiler](навіть дають грати за асасина)[/spoiler]
Тому грати заради сюжету або якщо ви фанат Watch Dogs не варто.

review:
I don't usually write reviews but I wanted to warn others before they get scammed by this game like I did. When I saw reviews for this game, all the negative ones were about denuovo and complaining about the ubisoft launcher so I ignored them, but hidden in those negative reviews are the ones like this one which complain about how busted the game is. 
 I wanted to start this review by saying that I really like watchdogs 2, it wasn't a great game per se and it had many problems but I still really enjoyed playing it despite everything. You would think the next in the series would expand what is great about watchdog 2 and fix what was broken with it. Watchdog legion somehow manages to not fix any of the annoying parts of watchdog 2 and also breaks things that were great about the sequel...and also be busted on PC.
My major gameplay complaint is that a lot of the freedom of the second game is removed in this one. In watchdog2 you didn't need to fight anyone, you could sneak every mission and never go into combat if you wanted to. Sometimes in legion, hacking an object will randomly alert all the enemies and neverending security guards will terminator 2 out of walls or out of thin air to come kill you. You have no choice but to fight, even if you use a drone to hack the object the enemies beeline towards your main character no matter where they are. In watchdog2. even when you had to fight people, you could always go non-lethal and the game would even highlight different kinds of enemies for you (innocent security guards/police , gang members and private militia) so you could choose when you wanted to be non-lethal or not. Legion removes all of this, all enemies are red no matter what they are. The weapons are tied to the npc you are playing, so when a mission that seems like a stealth mission is happening but turns into a wave shooter you have no choice but to use whatever weapon your character has. You just have so little freedom in this game.

The worse thing about this game is that it is horribly broken. I faced not one but THREE game breaking bugs, the last of which corrupted my save and led to me not finishing the game. In the Kelly manner mission, at the end of the mission the fps will drop to 1 and will be stuck like that until the mission clears. You can reload and whatever but it will still do it. Definite memory leak and completely unacceptable for a game that has been out for so long. The second glitch was a save glitch. Legion uses an autosave and one save file only. When the autosaver breaks, you won't realise until you reload the following play session and find out hours of progress is lost. I had to buy some clothes to fix the bug. The third bug was in the honey-trap mission, where again I would just hit 1fps randomly. This time though I couldn't fix it. At reload, my save was corrupted. Please be warned, do not purchase this busted game.

review: I don't get the hate; I've played all the Watch Dog games and I like this one just as much as the others if not more. I like the neighborhood resistance building aspect of the game; London feels spot on like the real city too--a more cyber dystopian version of it, of course. And personally I love that every NPC is playable; it makes you resist slaughtering everyone GTA style because every character is just that--a character. In this way it does feel more alive to me than GTA, and the world/space puzzle aspect of the game is for me the funnest playable aspect--just tryna figure out how to get from point to point is super rewarding. The big gripe I get is with the facial and nonverbal animation of the NPCs you play, which really undermines their perfectly fine writing and acting, giving a sometimes awkward stilt to things they do. But the other main story characters in the cutscenes are animated well. I think people just hate Ubisoft and project their hate onto an otherwise good game? (Same thing happened to Valhalla and Far Cry Primal IMHO, which I  maintain are the bests of those series). I mean, sure Legion not the best game ever, but it's a ton of fun, and definitely worth picking up.

review:
A game full of potential, but falling just short. 

The lack of main protagonist leaves the story feeling distant. 
If you can ignore some of the poor voice acting and heavy usage of a thick irish accent, and can live in your own world, making back stories and stuff up, it's an amazing game. Something like the inclusion of the Nemesis system from the Shadow of Mordor series would have made some insanely cool interactions around the city. 

Overall i enjoyed the immersion of the game, the city felt busy and from what i can see a really great recreation of the actual city. 

Bonus points for some of the absurd creative character classes you can play.  
Worth a play if you can get it for £15. 
Peace.

{"recommendationid": "135533369", "author": {"steamid": "76561198011288698", "num_games_owned": 0, "num_reviews": 22, "playtime_forever": 3489, "playtime_last_two_weeks": 0, "playtime_at_review": 3489, "last_played": 1679481806}, "language": "english", "review": "A game full of potential, but falling just short. 

The lack of main protagonist leaves the story feeling distant. 
If you can ignore some of the poor voice acting and heavy usage of a thick irish accent, and can live in your own world, making back stories and stuff up, it's an amazing game. Something like the inclusion of the Nemesis system from the Shadow of Mordor series would have made some insanely cool interactions around the city. 

Overall i enjoyed the immersion of the game, the city felt busy and from what i can see a really great recreation of the actual city. 

Bonus points for some of the absurd creative character classes you can play.  
Worth a play if you can get it for £15. 
Peace.", "timestamp_created": 1679907455, "timestamp_updated": 1679907455, "voted_up": true, "votes_up": 0, "votes_funny": 0, "weighted_vote_score": 0.5, "comment_count": 0, "steam_purchase": true, "received_for_free": false, "written_during_early_access": false, "primarily_steam_deck": false}

review:
la game manque d'optimisation le jeux plantes souvent quand un combat commence j'ai du relancer 15 fois c'est chient a la longue.
autrement beaux jeux bonne jouabilité quand sa veux bien bien sur.
beaux graphique avec raytracing +DLSS

de plus quand les drone d'attaque te cible sa fait planté le jeux a chaque fois c'est méga lourd.

bref jeux de merde au final. beaux a regarder mais sans plus.

La quête mission zéro day  SIRS est bugé chez moi je ne peut pas me connecté sur la caméra pour écouter le groupe de personnes. j’espère que c'est pas la quête principale car je pourrais pas finir le jeux qui ma si bien prit la tête.

zéro vraiment Ubisoft

review:
The weakest entry in the series so far.

The open world is still relatively engaging, and the powers enjoyable to use.  But they watered down the player's experience compared to prior games.  

The gimmick here is that you must build Dedsec out of randos on the street.  Literally everyone you see in the open world is potentially recruitable.  Being an unrealistically elite and effective hacker, gunfighter, and general badass is no longer a requirement; any bum or construction worker can tap into Dedsec's infrastructure and go head to head with the evil mercs the plot has contrived to put in control of London.  I'm not entirely sure if this is more or less silly than previous games, but it is less fun.  

Now, as I enjoyed the faction building aspects of some past ubigames, thought this might not be too bad.  But I can't find much of a benefit, unless you enjoy playing dressup with up to 45 protagonists.

Each has only a few powers, rather than the full suite like solo protagonists had.  Some puzzles and missions require unique powers only a certain type of rando will have, necessitating switching them out.  Which I found to make the game more tedious, not more interesting.

The story itself is less believable than previous two games, which is an achievement.  Compounding this is the fact that as each story mission must be able to accommodate any of the voicesets your randos can spawn with, meaning that its less engaging as well.  The dialogue must be able to fit any mission, from the story ones to the procedurally generated recruitment mission, so the characters you control tends to speak very generally and generically.  Most of the story dialogue is between unplayable characters that I've little investment or interest in.

There's still some fun to be had, but overall I wouldn't recommend it.  Much better open world games out there.

review: Vicces, hogy miután az Assassin's Creed-ből "RPG" címszóval akciójátékot csináltak, gyakorlatilag a Watch Dogs vette át a helyét. Ugyan a Legion végképp nem éri meg a teljes árát, viszont egy jó leértékelést kifogva mindenképp érdemes megvennie mindenkinek, akik szeretik a történet vezérelt, lopakodós, összetett játékokat, ahol van értelme kicsit agyalni, átgondolni a következő lépéseket. Nem túl bonyolult, nem túl összetett, és nem túl kihagyható darab, ha a Third Person, assassinate típusok kedvelője vagy, és inkább vinnél végig egy játékot ölés nélkül. A végére kicsit unalmas

review:
Пытались сделать игру, попытка очевидно неудачная.
Игра как будто сделана для всяких меньшинств, думаю ни один гендер не был оскорблён этой "игрой"
Сюжет не зацепил, всё было ясно с самого начала. Главные злодеи как будто из бэтмена, "Я хочу получить всю власть над Лондоном бугага... Я убью каждого кто мне помешает, а ещё у меня есть армия ухахатбл... Вам меня не одолеть хихихиха" и всё в таком роде.
Персонажи максимально постные, не интересные. Что бы найти более менее привлекательного персонажа, придётся постараться. 
Озвучка русская вроде и есть, но делали её как будто на отъе*ись, местами только дыхание персонажа может перебивает музыку и всё остальное, голоса некоторых персонажей к ним совсем не подходят. С виду, например, красивый молодой человек, который почему разговаривает как после недельного запоя. У сюжетных персонажей хотя бы с озвучкой всё отлично.
GPS в этой игре что-то с чем-то, заставит тебя навернуть 100500 кругов вместо того что бы заехать в переулок и проехать нормально.
Чем дальше ты проходишь по сюжету, тем меньше разнообразия становится в миссиях, иногда тебя могут по сюжету заставлять по 2-3 раза возвращаться к локациям где ты и так уже был когда например собирал очки навыков для прокачки перков или чего то ещё.

Плюсы: 
Можно завербовать деда и разъе*ать за него штаб МИ6
Неплохая графика
2 интересных миссии, "404" и после завершения основного сюжета, необязательная но очень интересная информация вскрывается про Бэгли, супердуперкруперпуперкрутого голосового помощника
Есть фаст тревел, что спасает от монотонной, тупорылой езды
Лондон прекрасен

review:
[h2] Juego abandonado [/h2]

Watch Dogs: Legion podría ser recomendado únicamente por su dlc Bloodlines que lejos de ser perfecto es muy bueno y lo más cercano a un Watch dogs 3 que podemos tener por ahora. La verdad que volver a la acción con Aiden Pearce es genial, además la historia dura lo justo y no es una obra maestra pero esta bien. 

Al ser una precuela recomiendo totalmente empezar por este dlc y luego jugar la campaña.

Y hablando del plato principal, esta campaña apenas supera el aceptable. Si bien la historia empieza de forma muy interesante con una trama que parece de espías y hackers, enseguida se desinfla terminando en el cliché de siempre y con una diversidad forzada que le sienta mal. 

Esta idea de "recluta a quien quieras" esta buena al principio pero eventualmente se vuelve repetitiva. Sin contar con que todo esta super desaprovechado, los personajes son como plantillas y jamás tienen consciencia de si mismos, no se reconocen, no se coordinan, no los afectan los acontecimientos del juego ni tienen ningún progreso excepto por alguna cinemática. Además es ridícula la diversidad que meten, vas a una construcción y el 80% de los trabajadores son mujeres, lo mismo con los enemigos de élite de Albion y el clan Kelley, nunca me imagine que fuera tan difícil encontrar a un Inglés blanco en Londres. 

Otra cosa lamentable es que los mejores trajes y máscaras aún son de pago, estoy seguro que nadie los compra ya pero ahí siguen, costando 30 USD cada uno. Un disparate.

Y para agregar a todo esto están los bugs de todo tipo que entorpecen el juego de forma impresionante. Cosas como aparecer dentro de un edificio y quedarse trabado o infiltrarse con sumo cuidado en una instalación para que un evento random desencadene una alarma generalizada que te haga perder la misión o al personaje son habituales. También los bugs gráficos te sacan de quicio. NPCs que spawnean en medio de la calle cuando vas en coche a altas velocidades. Crasheos cuando se abre una tienda de ropa. Y otras cosas que nunca las van a arreglar porque ya nadie trabaja en este juego. 

Por último y por decir algo bueno creo que la idea las infiltraciones funciona y es divertida pero el problema es que al final el propio juego se liquida a si mismo ya que todas las misiones pueden hacerse solo con los gadgets generales por lo que no importa si vas con el propio Aiden o con una abuelita que no puede correr, todos son super hackers así que te da la sensación de que nadie lo es. 

Por otra parte el modo resistencia que se vende por una experiencia nueva es básicamente el mismo juego solo que el nivel de alarma salta por absolutamente cualquier cosa y el único efecto que genera es que los personajes se vuelven más desechables. 

En definitiva comprar si, en hiper ofertas, para pasar el rato. Nada serio. Es un juego de Ubisoft, que más se puede esperar?

review: I truly hoped to enjoy this game, but sadly, Watch Dogs Legion falls short compared to its predecessor, Watch Dogs 2. The relatable protagonist is gone, replaced by random NPCs that lack depth. Both the city and gameplay feel uninspired, and the story is lackluster. Without any compelling characters to draw you in, it's tough to find motivation to progress in the narrative.

review: самая бездарная игра от которой идёт кровь из глаз, на сюжет нет смысла что-то говорить его тут нет, я столкнулся с сотней вылетов сотни багов , это просто не играбельный кусок дерьма, я на силу пытался пройти её но видемо не судьба, ведь ЭТА ПАРАША НЕ СОХРАНИЛА 4 ЧАСА КОТОРЫЕ Я ПРОЕБАЛ ПРОХОДЯ ЕЁ,  меня это просто добило морально , юбисофт знатно обосрались , когда управляешь дроном и его уничтожает в 90 проц случаев крашится игра, не покупайте этот кусок дерьма , хвала богам что купил по скидке и то жалею о потраченом времени и деньгах, 2 вотч догс был лучшим , а это помойная яма с донатиком , скинчиками , одень своего героя по моднее , забей на то что должен быть сюжет , ничего тут хорошего кроме анимаций дрона паука я не увидел.

review:
Game is not good at all. I've played Watch Dogs 1&2 and those games were great, so i had high hopes for this one but i was wrong. The whole multiple protagonists thing does not work at all, it's somewhat of a cool concept but it just doesn't work having all these random characters in a story most of them just don't fit or have annoying cringe dialogue. The world of London is a fresh air from the normal US world but still Ubisoft manages to make it not worthy to drive around in or explore. Driving is good, gunplay is good, hacking system is great. Crazy thing is the intriguing or "Fun" part of the whole game to me was the Assassin's Creed DLC and if a hour long DLC is the proudest part of playing your game than its not a good game

review: Nesrozumitelné miste není jasné co dělat každé 2 misi hraje celkem dost dobře graficky provedená ale rozhodně bych jí nikomu nedoporučil zahrát ani ve slevě ani bez slevy nemyslím si že ta hra stojí váš čas za to si ji zahrát doporučoval bych vám rozhodně dívat dál tam jsem na ní strávil nějaký ten čas a při každé misi ke které jsem přišel to bylo zabugované když jsem k ní přišel automaticky se mi nic nespustilo když jsem splnil to co po mně mise chtěla tak se mi to nezaznamenalo tudíž jsem tam vlastně hledal způsob jak a musel jsem resetovat celý checkpoint dost mě hra zklamala a nesplnila moje očekávání. peníze vracet nebudu kdybych si ji v multiplayeru chtěl s někým zahrát že bys jí někdo nějaký vášnivec z mých přátel koupil protože s kamarády je sranda jakákoliv hra i tato.

review: “我有些新的想法，人工智能死后会到哪里去呢，或许等你垂垂老矣的时候，我会成为你电动轮椅上的一个组件，与你再次相见。我很抱歉，我们有过最棒的经历，我想…[i][错误21-255：语言处理器][/i]…我想我应该了解你，你喜欢草莓增量的草莓奶油蛋糕，在泰晤士河上划船，还有亚瑟——the one that got away。你爱过别人，你也曾被别人爱，你经历了一个我永远无法体会的人生，谢谢你，我很高兴终于见到你了，如果再也不能见到你了，那我祝你早上好，中午好，晚上好，晚安，再见。”

review:
7/10
จากประสบการณ์เกมที่ออกได้ปีกว่า ต้องบอกว่าไม่ได้แย่เหมือนที่หลายคนคิด

Story + Setting
ค่อนข้างจืด พล็อตและทิศทางการเดินเรื่องเราเดาได้ตลอด และการที่ภาคนี้มีระบบเกณฑ์คน ทำให้ความ Personal ของตัวละครไม่ได้ลึกเหมือน Aiden, Marcus เป็นเพียงแค่คนกลุ่มนึงพยายามโค่นล้มรัฐบาล ทำให้ความน่าสนใจของตัวเอกเราไม่มีเลย ส่วน Setting ในภาคนี้เป็นเมืองซึ่งก็ทำได้โอเคอยู่ แต่ถ้าไปเทียบกับ Watch Dogs 2 ภาคก่อนทำฉากหลากหลายกว่า ภาค Legion จะเหมือนมีแค่อย่างเดียวเลยคือ โซนเมือง ซึ่งทำให้บรรยากาศไม่ค่อยหลากหลายเท่าไหร่ แต่มันก็ยังสวย และคน NPC ในเกมนี้ก็ยังเป็นธรรมชาติเหมือนเดิม

Design
ระบบการเกณฑ์คนในภาคนี้ดูแปลกใหม่ และเพิ่มสีสันการเข้าภารกิจ ส่วน Mission จริง ๆ ก็ดูซ้ำซากไม่มีไอเดียอะไร เสียดายที่มันไม่มีอะไรที่ Personal มากกว่านี้ในแง่ของเนื้อเรื่องแต่ละตัวที่เราไปช่วยมา ถ้ามีขั้นตอนภารกิจในการเกณฑ์คนเยอะกว่านี้ ทำให้เราผูกพันธ์กับตัวที่เรากว่าจะสร้างมามากกว่านี้ อาจจะเป็นเกมที่มี Value มากขึ้น ส่วนของตอบแทนจาก Mission ก็ได้มาแค่เงินเปล่าๆ ที่ไม่ได้มีประโยชน์มาก นอกจากซื้อของ Cosmetic (แต่ถ้าใครชอบแต่งตัวก็มองข้ามสบายมาก) 

Gameplay 
เทียบกับ Watch Dogs 2 ภาคนี้เป็นภาคที่ยากกว่าและแปลกใหม่กว่า ในด้าน Gameplay ตัวละครที่เราเกณฑ์มา ลึกๆ มันก็คือความสามารถของตัวละครภาค 2 ทีทั้งหมดนะ ยกตัวอย่างเช่น คนนึงเก่งขับรถ, คนนึงเก่งเตะต่อย, อีกคนเก่งรอบเร้น ถ้าเอาสามคนนี้มารวมกัน มันก็คือความสามารถของตัวละครภาคก่อนๆ ที่ถูกเอามาแยกส่วนเฉยๆ แต่มันก็ทำให้เราไม่ได้มี Gadget เต็มตัวแบบเมื่อก่อน ต้องคิดให้เยอะขึ้นก่อนอาใครเข้าไปในฐานศัตรู ด้วยระบบเกณฑ์คนแบบนี้ ที่ทุกคนมี Skill ทำให้แต่ละคน Unique แต่มันเสียตรงที่ตัวละครที่เราเกณฑ์มา ไม่สามารถอัพความสามารถให้เก่งขึ้นได้ ทำให้เราไม่รู้สึกเสียดายเวลามันตาย เพราะยังไงก็หาได้ใหม่ ไม่เหมือน State Of Decay ที่กว่าเราจะทำให้ตัวละครเก่งได้ เราต้องพามันออกไปลุย

Performance 
คอมระดับกลาง ๆ ก็สามารถเล่นได้โอเคอยู่ มีกระตุกบ้าง แนะนำลงเกมนี้บน SSD แต่ถ้าใครเสียดายงานภาพสวย ๆ แนะนำล็อค 30 fps แต่ปรับทุกอย่างสุดก็จะเป็นประสบการณ์ที่โครตดี ส่วนเรื่องบัคมีบ้าง เช่น NPC เดินข้ามถนนด้วยความเร็วแสง แสงเงาตกกระทบแปลก ๆ ในบางพื้นที่ แต่รวม ๆ เจอน้อยนะ 

+ ภาพสวย และสมจริงกว่าภาคก่อน
+ ลูกเล่นเยอะกว่าเดิมเพราะ Setting อยู่ในโลกอนาคต
+/- ระบบเกณฑ์คนทำให้ตัวละครไม่เก่งรอบด้านเหมือนภาคก่อน
+/- Cosmetic เยอะดีมาก แต่รางวัลที่ได้ก็มีแค่เอามาซื้อ Cosmetic จริงๆ
+/- เมืองสวยมาก แตก็มีแค่โซนเมืองอย่างเดียว
- ไม่มีระบบ Progression ตัวละคร
- Mission ซ้ำซากจำเจ

จากประสบการณ์เกมที่ออกได้ปีกว่า ต้องบอกว่าไม่ได้แย่เหมือนที่หลายคนคิด

Story + Setting
ค่อนข้างจืด พล็อตและทิศทางการเดินเรื่องเราเดาได้ตลอด และการที่ภาคนี้มีระบบเกณฑ์คน ทำให้ความ Personal ของตัวละครไม่ได้ลึกเหมือน Aiden, Marcus เป็นเพียงแค่คนกลุ่มนึงพยายามโค่นล้มรัฐบาล ทำให้ความน่าสนใจของตัวเอกเราไม่มีเลย ส่วน Setting ในภาคนี้เป็นเมืองซึ่งก็ทำได้โอเคอยู่ แต่ถ้าไปเทียบกับ Watch Dogs 2 ภาคก่อนทำฉากหลากหลายกว่า ภาค Legion จะเหมือนมีแค่อย่างเดียวเลยคือ โซนเมือง ซึ่งทำให้บรรยากาศไม่ค่อยหลากหลายเท่าไหร่ แต่มันก็ยังสวย และคน NPC ในเกมนี้ก็ยังเป็นธรรมชาติเหมือนเดิม

review:
Only bought on sale so I could play Bloodline, the rest of the game and its original campaign is garbage.
I wouldn't spend a hundred dollars and my left leg just to play this game with a bunch of micro-transactions tagged onto it. Only thing these "editions" would give anybody is clothes, masks, operatives with zero character development, and even still the voice acting and animation is robotic and boring so no change there regardless.
Driving is still trash, don't know why the screen chooses to follow the direction of your car and why you can't have the option to turn that off, whoever at Ubisoft thought that was a genius idea needs a slap upside the head, Watch Dogs 2's driving was perfect and then Legion came along and they decided to ruin it for some odd reason.
This game desperately needed a protagonist and it has no chance at meeting that requirement, the same attachment we get for Aiden and Marcus are completely null here, because you're just forced and thrown into playing as some random schmuck who has absolutely no experience in hacking and zero interesting backstory at all. And don't tell me the "character description exists" because I don't care that my guy "sells drones on the deep dark web", when you flaunt around that a version of the dark web exists in this game but literally everyone has access, it becomes a lot less interesting and more of a boring fact if anything.
As for the stuff you removed that made the game great in the first place, the radio, the speed boost, the pro parkour moves, the mini-games, the phone apps (Hell you could've at least given us some insight on the interface for the Optik but of course Ubisoft won't do that, too much effort), I could go on. All stuff that made Watch Dogs what it pretty much was known for.
Nigel Cass, Mary Kelley, Skye Larson and Sabine herself will NEVER live up to the mysterious and evil expectations of Lucky Quinn or Iraq, especially when they're so easy to kill / their death scenes are THIS boring. Lmao.
If you actually desperately want to play this and consider yourself a fan of the franchise, don't waste your money, get it on sale. Best way to describe this game: "State of Decay 2 except you don't really care if your characters die"

review:
I do not recommend this for anyone who played a Watch Dogs game or is looking to jump into a Watch Dogs game. This game makes Watch Dogs 1 base campaign look good.

This game was a major departure from the standard formula of one protagonist gameplay that it is just not fun because it adds nothing. I played through most of the game as 3 characters: Wrench, Aiden Pearce, and Darcy Clarkson (Both Wrench and Aiden are unlocked immeditaly at the beginning of the game via the Bloodlines DLC and Darcy is a season pass character you unlock via the Enter the Assassins DLC from the season pass). I only went out of my way to recruit characters when I forced to. While I enjoyed all three of these characters I feel it is cheap to make them all available incredibly early. The story also feels half baked going from the first act to last act with you starting off with a semi detective like arc taking down Mary Kelly and Clan Kelly to suddenly [spoiler]fighting the wet noodle known as Nigel Cass and his ceiling mounted turret mech tank thing. the wet noodle part isn't a joke by the way, I killed him with a single shotgun blast cause they place you literally in front of his spawn when the mech tank is destroyed.[/spoiler]

Overall, the game feels very unrewarding and you don't have to work for anything.

Screw this game, I'm going back to playing Watch Dogs 2

I played through most of the game as 3 characters: Wrench, Aiden Pearce, and Darcy Clarkson (Both Wrench and Aiden are unlocked immeditaly at the beginning of the game via the Bloodlines DLC and Darcy is a season pass character you unlock via the Enter the Assassins DLC from the season pass). I only went out of my way to recruit characters when I forced to. While I enjoyed all three of these characters I feel it is cheap to make them all available incredibly early. The story also feels half baked going from the first act to last act with you starting off with a semi detective like arc taking down Mary Kelly and Clan Kelly to suddenly [spoiler]fighting the wet noodle known as Nigel Cass and his ceiling mounted turret mech tank thing. the wet noodle part isn't a joke by the way, I killed him with a single shotgun blast cause they place you literally in front of his spawn when the mech tank is destroyed.[/spoiler]

Overall, the game feels very unrewarding and you don't have to work for anything.

Screw this game, I'm going back to playing Watch Dogs 2", "timestamp_created": 1680497685, "timestamp_updated": 1680497780, "voted_up": false, "votes_up": 1, "votes_funny": 0, "weighted_vote_score": 0.5, "comment_count": 0, "steam_purchase": true, "received_for_free": false, "written_during_early_access": false, "primarily_steam_deck": false}

review:
Just kinda sad. If Watch Dogs 2 didn't exist, I'd thumbs up, but because it does, just go play WD2. 
Overall, the game suffers massively from not having any real characters. With play as anyone, that means everyone is just you with a different accent. Sure, assembling a gay girl death squad that hunts down the cops is neat, but not having any character writing besides bagley makes it drag.

review:
Is this London or Portland?

Practically every feature has been downgraded from WD2, and the big new feature (recruiting any NPC as a playable character) amounts to borderline irrelevant sidegrades.  

Then, to top it all off, bypassing the entirety of gameplay, by flying around on a cargo drone, while tossing infinite spider drones, seems to be the intended way to play...

wast of money even on sale. missions is rinse and repeat hack something kill someone, once finding out the diversity of operatives you can have, it gets boring. You can look for specific skill sekt operatives like a deal damage to enemies spy operative.

review:
[h1] [u]Про химерність сюжету -  встрата гра за 915 гривень [/u][/h1]

Вже з самого початку гри стає очевидним, що сюжет має багато недоліків і не відповідає високим очікуванням гравців.

Антагоністи мають виразниу схожість з персонажами зі "Світу Бетмена", зі своїми шаблонними висловлюваннями та попередженнями про нездоланність, віддаючи їм недостатню оригінальність.

Персонажі в грі не приваблюють та не цікавлять. Пошук захоплюючих персонажів вимагає значних зусиль з боку гравця.

Озвучка гри виконана російською мовою, але здається, що вона була зроблена на поспіх. Дихання деяких персонажів може заглушувати музику та інші звуки, голоси не всіх персонажів відповідають їх зовнішньому вигляду. Наприклад, зовні виглядає як красивий молодий чоловік, але його мовлення схоже на мовлення людини після тривалого перебування в стані алкогольного сп'яніння. Що стосується озвучення персонажів у сюжетних моментах, то воно взагалі в порядку.

Система навігації GPS в грі викликає деякі застереження, оскільки вона може примушувати гравця зайти в кілька зайвих кілометрів шляхом, замість того, щоб запропонувати більш ефективний маршрут через провулки або скорочення.

Заходячи глибше в сюжет гри, місії стають менш різноманітні, і можуть змушувати гравця згідно сюжету повертатися до раніше відвіданих локацій 2-3 рази, наприклад, для збору навичок для вдосконалення перків чи інших цілей.

[hr][/hr]

[h1] [u] ВЕРДИКТ[/u][/h1]
Гра має свої плюси, такі як можливість використання різноманітних персонажів, цікаві місії та функції швидкого переміщення. Однак, є деякі недоліки, такі як непривабливість та непереконливість головних злодіїв, проблеми з озвучкою, монотонність деяких місій та неохайність GPS системи.
[code] Оцінка гри залежатиме від особистих вподобань кожного гравця. Для деяких вона може бути цікавою та захоплюючою, а для інших - менш привабливою через вказані недоліки. Важливо враховувати, що смаки щодо сюжету, персонажів, озвучки та геймплею можуть варіюватися від особи до особи. Бажано взяти до уваги різні відгуки та оцінки гри перед придбанням, щоб упевнитися, що вона відповідає власним очікуванням та вподобанням. Пам'ятайте, що власні враження від гри можуть бути різними, і цінність гри полягає в особистому досвіді та задоволенні, яке вона надає вам як гравцеві. Аналізуйте різноманітні аспекти гри та приймайте відповідні рішення відповідно до своїх вподобань. Щасливої гри![/code]

[code] Оцінка гри залежатиме від особистих вподобань кожного гравця. Для деяких вона може бути цікавою та захоплюючою, а для інших - менш привабливою через вказані недоліки. Важливо враховувати, що смаки щодо сюжету, персонажів, озвучки та геймплею можуть варіюватися від особи до особи. Бажано взяти до уваги різні відгуки та оцінки гри перед придбанням, щоб упевнитися, що вона відповідає власним очікуванням та вподобанням. Пам'ятайте, що власні враження від гри можуть бути різними, і цінність гри полягає в особистому досвіді та задоволенні, яке вона надає вам як гравцеві. Аналізуйте різноманітні аспекти гри та приймайте відповідні рішення відповідно до своїх вподобань. Щасливої гри![/code]", "timestamp_created": 1680658081, "timestamp_updated": 1680690169, "voted_up": false, "votes_up": 3, "votes_funny": 0, "weighted_vote_score": "0.538550019264221191", "comment_count": 0, "steam_purchase": true, "received_for_free": false, "written_during_early_access": false, "primarily_steam_deck": false}

review:
Alright, had to change my review. 
FORCED COMBAT MISSIONS SUCK SO MUCH.
Seriously. I have to 'stay in range' and hack the object while infinite enemies spawn and rush me from every which directions while my guy in full armor takes two shots and he's dead, lose more agents because of these forced missions than anything else. Stealth? hack? Sure. I'm happy with these. Forced grinders? Screw this game. Loved, now hate.

review:
I normally have fun doing these repetetive Ubisoft open world games but this is bad in every way.
Voice acting is not lipsynched because every character can be playable they all only have generic voicelines that sound terrible and sometimes two people with the same voice actor talk to eachother so you cant even tell who is who.
Bullets of pistols feel like they are flying in slow motion and the graphics are generally underwhelming.

All in all I did not expect much because of the bad reviews and was still disappointed.
Even if it is on sale like it was for me don't buy it

review: В целом хорошая игра от ubisoft. Присутствует разнообразный открытый мир, много персонажей, одежда, машины и т. д. В целом всё, что было в watch dogs 2, даже движок игры тот же. Отличается только сюжет, и кстати это одна из сильнейших сторон игры, ведь сюжет довольно интересный и следить за ним, играть очень даже интересно. Ещё присутствует внутриигровой донат, ну это уже не в какие ворота не лезет. Донат в покупной одиночной игре. Чего? Игра итак по нашей валюте стоит дорого дак ещё и донат.  Может быть кому-то игра понравится, но на фоне wd2 игра не особо.

review: The watchdogs franchise is a very good one. It's unique because you need to think in another way, to comeplete the puzzle. However, this frachise started out good, and game after game it got worse. This game felt very flat and boring. You can recrute anyone to your team, which i dont think make any sense. The main game was okay, but way more boring than the other ones. It's a 5/10. The bloodline DLC is 6/10 just because you can play as Aiden and Wrench.

review:

review:
Oyun 2020 yılında çıktı , 15 dili destekliyor ama Türkçe buna dahil değil. Bu yüzden bir eksiyle başladım incelemeye. Oyunda drone kontrol ederken yakın çatışmaya girersem veya düşman drone ile yakın çatışmaya girersem oyun çöküyor. Çözüm bulamadım. Bu bile olumsuz inceleme için yeterli bir sebep.

[b]Grafik[/b] ( 5 / 10 )
Oyun çıkalı 3 sene olmuş. Yeni yani anlayacağınız. Grafikler fena değil ama 12 GB VRAM gerektiren bir kalitede değil. Doğru duydunuz. 1080p de , en yüksek ayarda oynamak için 12 GB VRAM istiyor. Optimizasyon hak getire. Zaten oyun İngiltere'nin bir bölümünde geçiyor. Ne varda bu kadar bellek istiyor anlamış değilim.

[b]Hikaye[/b] ( 4 / 10 )
En büyük korkum önceki oyundan daha kötü olmasıydı ama toparlamışlar biraz. Yine de daha iyi olabilirdi.

[b]Oynanış[/b] ( 4 / 10 )
Burada ciddi olumsuzluklardan bahsetmek istiyorum. Alıştıra alıştıra gideceğim. İlk olarak araç kontrolleri genel olarak serinin en iyisi fakat yeterli değil. Daha iyi olmalıydı. Kovalamaca bekledim ilk oyundaki gibi ama hiç yok. İkinci olarak operatör sistemi yapmışlar. Operatörlerin özel yetenekleri var. Olabilir , sıkıntı yok buraya kadar. Sıkıntı , birçok operatörde çoğu silahı kullanamıyorsunuz. Oyunda para birimi ile sadece [u]Kozmetik[/u] ürünler alabiliyoruz. Silah alınmıyor , özelleştirme hiç yok zaten. Gerçi oyunun mantığı , ağır silahlarla donanmış düşmanları şok silahlarıyla etkisiz hale getirmeye çalışmakla geçiyor. Yetenek ağacı gibi bir şey beklerdim ama Ubisoft'un son oyunlarında yetenek işi kalkmış. İyi halt etmişler.

Oyunu tavsiye etmiyorum ama illa alacaksanız Ultimate sürümünü alın. Hem daha ucuz hem daha avantajlı.

Sonuç : ( 4 / 10 ).

review:
Short review: Get it when it's on sale. It is to Watchdogs what Assassin's Creed Unity was to the AC franchise.

Long review:
- Playing this after Watch Dogs 2 probably made this seem worse than it is. WD Legion feels like WD2 but with too little time to do what WD2 did well, but enough budget to add a whole lot of half-baked ideas
- The whole idea of playing as randos from different jobs and backgrounds sounds like a great idea on paper. There's a lot they can do with the concept but it's just badly executed
-- You can play as a bunch of Dedsec agents you've either recruited off the streets, purchased online, or got as a district reward. Sounds good so far. But then the motivation to play as other characters just isn't there. I got an Albion agent with a silenced pistol and for pretty much my entire playthrough, I played as that character with no problem.

Spiderbot lets you cheese puzzles and guards if you can find sneaky places you can throw them into. Need a cargo drone? You don't even need a construction guy cos there's always a drone pod nearby.  Never needed any other guy to get through a mission except when I get arrested/hospitalized. But even then, if you recruit a doctor and a high up policeman, you don't even need to wait 5 minutes to get your main guy back.

I have 20 agents. I rarely use them except for the 1 or 2 times that the mission required a specific background.
-- The whole mechanic would have made so much more sense if you needed a squad that you can switch around to do heists with. Like have an Albion agent infiltrate to unlock doors or turn off security so the Spy can get inside to steal the thing while a Getaway driver waits outside. That would have made much more sense.

- Hacking in this game is very much a copy of what was in WD2, give or take a few additional minigames with drones. Kinda boring considering this is supposed to be a more technologically advanced future.

- London as a backdrop is just dreary. Everywhere looks the same and feels the same except Chinatown. Is that a London problem? Cos other open world games have made their cities look interesting and alive.

- Story was boring compared to WD2. WD2 was a social commentary. The corpos' crimes were realistic and relatable and you end up asking yourself if the convenience of tech is worth the loss of freedom. But the villains in Legion are cartoonish villains from cheap action movies.

- The main characters are forgettable. Nigel Cass is just a James Bond villain. Mary Kelley is just a Karen. Skye Larsen is basically just Tilda Swinton. Even the plot twist villain was meh, felt forced.

What even is Clan Kelley? The faction as a whole doesn't really fit thematically into the game aside from being a generic criminal organization. They had no depth or ambition.

- The voice acting is OK but distracting. Since you're getting randos for agents, chances are one of your best guys ends up being an old Chinese guy who speaks only in roadman slang. Or someone with the most annoying posh accent. There were so many times that I found someone good, talked to them, heard them speak then offed them on the spot cos it was just atrocious.

- Almost everyone is ugly. They have so many models and variations, but almost none of them look good. Just look at the screenshots here on steam. I get that they're going for everyday people, but there are characters here that are supposed to be celebrities and models. Also why does everyone look old? Nobody looked below 30 in my playthrough.

- Non-lethal vs lethal is meaningless, aside from possibly running into someone you knocked out later on. But even then, you can't recruit them anymore cos they hate Dedsec.

Overall, it seems kinda obvious that there were good ideas planned for the game which got thrown out to prioritize in-game purchases. I think Watch Dogs Legion should have been a more heist and teamwork focused game. The story shouldn't have been so shallow.

review:
第一次玩育碧。别的废话不多说，就整个玩法而言有很大的缺陷，不知道是不是删减还是缩水，整个“宝可梦”玩法没有一点点的养成提升空间，整个最多只有3，4个特质栏就是个败笔，有用的能有几个啊？？狗屁废物被动先占一半。把它分成多方面分类或分支的小范围技能树不是更好吗，（听说一开始是有可使用的类似看门狗2的打印机系统的就在基地里，现在还能看到那个模型）总之，重点来了：不管是不是那个原因导致现在武器和载具方面变成了单独的人物特性，我只能说提出并执行这种操作的人吃了几斤shit想出来的啊？？另外严重掉帧，过场动画穿模，天上无人机抽搐移动，路人生成时路两侧左右横飞...还有其他bug问题也层出不穷...还有我个人而言不太喜欢无限体力+逆天的呼吸回血的系统
  再说'军团'这个主题，弄个类似腐烂国度2一样选两名队友跟随系统+gta5可随意切换操纵配合的玩法啊(这点腐烂国度2同样能做到）。招个人，就俩B废物技能一直打，打半天任务结束了，打下一个看地图上有个离得近的才换别人，况且还不能保证那人是不是同样废物，平均一个人物过一个任务算个屁'军团‘，你把无主角，随意操纵成员的玩法掏出来能不能学习一下别人啊，同样，反过来用个各方面都有用的人是不是能一直用到结局啊，招人有tm什么意义呢，无非就是看综合+人物的颜值长相。不如平衡下，这游戏如果有我所说的小范围技能树养成，武器能花钱打印+载具上网购买，用做Dedsec成员通用（这点没有也行），同时加上跟随两名队友期间能切换操控，这样的军团至于成现在这副德行吗？
  UI:看门狗2的ui设计比军团强tm一万倍，军团这什么垃圾ui风格啊，一股巨他妈冷门氪金手游或页游的风格。2代炫酷的街头涂鸦与黑客骇入融合的艺术风格全丢了。
  后来TM居然停更了，是不是觉得军团做得超级成功？嗯？自我感觉良好是吧，怎么有脸停更的。官方支持过的编辑器现在也不能用了，(我可真tm想让这游戏上类似创意工坊的地方啊...)游戏一大堆问题，mod这么少，停更了代码也开放不了一点。护着军团就好像护着你亲妈一样，真是把军团当成宝了是吧，操。
  还有那个僵尸模式真tmSB啊做一半就放出来了是吧，狗屁内容没有，僵尸直接抱你，抱两次就死，恶心人是吧！！  

最后想说我是最近才买的狗2，回来发一波牢骚，军团葬送看门狗ip真的惋惜。无所谓，反正没人看得到，就当自言自语了。唉

review: Good game, apart from the fact that the only weapons you can unlock on the tech tree are "non-lethal stun guns", instead of actual guns. but the base campaign isn't coop, which really makes the experience worse because you can't play with your friends. I don't know why they haven't added coop to the campaign seeing as they did so in the Ghost Recon, Division and Far Cry franchises. A real shame.

review:
oh man oh god ubisoft game again
if you like watch dogs 1 and 2 don't buy Watch Dogs Legion

where do i start there is a lot to talk about in this pile of sh*it 
1- optimization classic watch dogs thing but this is getting out of hand in this game literally drop fps sim.
2- none of any watch dogs 1 or 2 features are in this sh*it like the phone, you don't have a PHONE i always liked this idea because you can do any mission while listening to music or gathering all the collectibles while you listen to music in game.
3- repetitive as fu*k Mafia 3 style even more repetitive then Mafia 3 , also the recruiting missions are godd*mn trash
4-London = boring as hell
5- The police is a joke in this game and there is no quick time events hacks that you can pull of while they chasing you, also no traffic light hacks.
6- Skill tree = not existing more like trash or anything bad you wanna say
7- Story, thank god i can play as Wrench or Aiden Pearce, because all the characters in this game villains / friends / allys  are trash i couldn't engage in the story one time imagine how bad it is,
the voice acting is trash again.
8- music i was hyped to listen to the songs in this game because watch dogs 1 & 2 there was great songs in them but you've  guessed it! even the music is not that great in watch dogs legion,
thank god there is one song from [b]MUSE[/b].
9- im tired 
10- i hate this game with passion

ironic that the dlc is 5 hrs long is better then the game in everything.

Overall pile of sh*it 3/10

review:
So basically if you like WD1 and you want to have something like that, don't get this game.
This does not feel even a bit similar to WD1 or WD2.
This game has me feeling 50/50 about it.
there are some cool aspects about it, like:
You can almost be anyone else as long as you recruit them, however this creates a lack of characters being unique and they almost feel the same with basic and general personality.
Also this game is full of bugs which just makes your experience a bit bland since it takes you out of your immersion with the game.
the missions are almost the same kinda boring but there are some cool story lines.
I personally like the driving experience more in this game compared to WD2 but almost all cars are the same and there isn't much variety.
so lets end it with this ain't Watch dogs anymore but a good game by it self if you want to spend some time playing a game.

review: Gra nie przebije Watch Dogs 2, jednak pomysł na dowolnych bohaterów i mechaniki z tym związane są ciekawe i unikatowe. Gameplay całkiem niezły, jednak kwestia broni palnej jest tu bardziej ograniczona, brakuje mi możliwości tworzenia broni w drukarce 3D jak w WD2 albo chociaż zwykłego zakupu. Bronie ograniczają się wyłącznie do postaci (nieśmiercionośne bronie są tak upośledzone, że nawet ich nie liczę). Po przejściu gry odnoszę wrażenie, że fabuła mogłaby być bardziej rozbudowana i zawierać więcej misji. Bardzo podobała mi się misja ze Stormzy'm, moim zdaniem ciekawszy sposób na marketing niż ciągłe reklamowanie celebryty jak w Cyberpunku (Keanu Reeves). Możliwość permamentnej śmierci jest również ciekawa. Gra 7/10 polecam

review:
Pretty weak offering.
I'll start off with the good things: 
This game looks stunning and runs great even on my decidedly outdated system. The Lighting is beautiful and London looks realistic at all times. This ties into the exploration, since this is a Ubisoft game the world is packed with collectibles, these range from very boring and borderline useless to upgrade points which give your agents new toys to play with. Driving is also a strong point, while there aren't that many cars they all handle differently and none are slow or actively unfun to drive. I just wish there were more supercars, I only know of one. These aspects combined make it hard to get from point A to point B without getting distracted by 274 different things on your map.
This leads me to the things I didn't like as much:
The story starts off interesting but quickly devolves into a mess of side plots and very expected turns that gets boring very quickly. This isn't helped by the incredibly linear mission design that ranges from mildly interesting to downright annoying, the worst example being [spoiler] a mission which involves destroying yet another random datacenter that constantly spawns drones, leading to you running around a big warehouse for entirely too long [/spoiler]. 
The mission design is also easily bypassed, either via use of the blatantly OP construction drones or the spider bot. The construction drones let you fly directly to your destination while ignoring all enemies, the spiderbot being a better version of the player character. The spiderbot allows you to takedown enemies, activate almost all types of security doodads, download access keys and even go invisible to bypass cameras and lased scanners. 
I also have to mention the character system, the lack of a protagonist really doesn't help this game as it makes the plot seem less impactful, Watch Dogs 1 is infinitely better in this regard. The fact that the gunplay generally feels cheap and almost all characters have the exact same weapons doesn't help. At this point I have to mention Bagley, the omnipotent/incompetent AI whose sense of humor gets annoying far too quickly, same as all the other "main" characters.

All these points have led to me pretty much abandoning the game without beating the story, I don't know how much there is to go but it feels like it could be either 3 or 30 hours, which is not a good thing.

Unless you are a diehard fan of the franchise, which is most likely dead after this flop, you should only buy this if you really like London, Ubisoft games or it is heavily discounted.

review: Extremely mediocre game. Very short campaign, took 11hrs to beat it, wasn't really that interesting, missions were ok but they get a bit repetitive and side missions are basically the same so no point playing those. The visuals are ok, voice acting is alright. Has quite a lot of issues though, firstly the framerate is terrible, going around the open world its almost impossible to maintain 60fps at 1080p even if you turn the settings down. There's tons of bugs aswell, npcs will randomly spawn in and out, slide across the map and teleport around, the AI is trash as well, most enemies just sit around doing nothing or just charge at you. The concept of being able to play as any npc in the game is ok but makes it all kind of boring, luckily in the dlcs they added aiden and wrench so those guys are fun to play as atleast. Overall though its a pretty meh game, maybe get on a steep discount if you want to check it out. The only real reason to play this is to experience a modern version of the sһit hole that is London, visually its got that down pretty well, other than that I don't particularly recommend the game. 5/10

review: This game feels AI generated. The combat and shooting is generic and uninteresting. The driving feels bad. The voice-acting for most characters are delayed and unnatural on top of the already generic and mediocre writing. Performance isn't that great either, even on a 4090. To top it all off they want you to use a 3rd party launcher to play this after paying $60. Just play literally anything else.

review:
Sorry aber ich kann das Spiel wirklich nur sehr beschränkt empfehlen
- Bugs: Bei mir springen die "Gegner" hin und her. Sehr mühsam wenn man sich unentdeckt in ein Objekt reingeschlichen hat.
- Missionen: Es ist mir einfach zuviel Jump and Run. Mir hätte es gefallen, wenn man sich mal etwas mehr am Ursprung, mit Aiden Pearce und seiner Rache-Story orientiert hätte. Ab und zu ein Jump and Run ist ja ganz witzig... aber warum z.B. suche ich eine Ewigkeit einen Tempel ab?! Das bringt mir ja - in einer NEBENMISSION!! - nichts!
- Warum haben meine Charaktere schon wieder diese Mist-Waffen, welche "nicht tödlich" sein sollen? Aber den Gegner mit Genickbruch ausschalten, das ist dann in Ordnung?!

Gefallen tut mir die Grundidee der Hauptmission sowie z.B. das mit den zu kapernden Drohnen auf denen man teilweise mitfliegen kann. Nur würde ich mir halt wünschen, dass man Spiele nicht mit endlos-Jump-an-Run in die länge zieht. Kurz, knackig und ab und zu mal ein witziger Spruch dieses Roboters. Hätte kein Problem damit wenn die Kampagne 1-2 Stunden kürzer und nur die (gute) Hälfte der Nebenmissionen verfügbar wären.

review: 說實話沒有1代2代的好玩,先不說近乎是任務的都要跨區跑,要是不換角色光跑是會難受死的,說實話這代變成了蜘蛛無雙,甚麼都得用蜘蛛,代入感太差了,又要不停換角色,體驗上更差,劇情沒得快播,要不就直接飛,要不就是硬看,真是有趣,115GB的內容,地圖大而無當,建築都是皮,感覺上能玩的只有20~30小時,這合理?說實話,你叫我忍著玩到通關還是可以的,遊戲內容還是可以接受,可是現在為什麼不是通關才留言,還要一定是不建議的,因為一切都是ubi的錯,沒事就狂更新connect,順帶把垃圾battleyes也更了,一更新後window defender就報錯,那是保defender還是battleye?一定是defender,我防毒都被你更新更壞了,垃圾ubi插件,好好想玩個單機,你非要當我連機

review: It's quite fun. I enjoy the environments. The story is decent. If you liked WD1 or 2 then perhaps you won't like this one since there are some things that are different. Some people complain that the characters in Legion aren't likable such as those in 1 or 2. I don't know what they played. I thought both 1 and 2 had awful characters. Legion isn't necessarily any better in that regard but it certainly isn't worse. The only serious complaints I can level at this game are the awful Ubisoft launcher that requires incessant admin prompts and the game itself crashing to desktop constantly. Doesn't seem to matter which nVidia driver you use this game just hates to actually run. I did eventually discover that I seem to get a more stable performance when I turn off DLSS, ray tracing and DX12. Basically if you get rid of any newer features and just run it in DX11 mode it should run without crashing. That's been my experience. An honestly all ray tracing seemed to do was make reflections look just a tad bit nicer for a big performance hit so just stick to rasterization on this game. It's not without some faults but it is actually fun. Worth getting on sale if your computer is powerful enough to run it. Even good PCs will struggle to get a high framerate. I have a 3080 and best I can do is about 75-80 fps in most places. Good thing gysnc exists.

review:
好评是因为二折入之后作品质量值这个价（倒不如说是买狗1送狗3哈哈哈），但作为看门狗系列确实是不够合格。问题大概就是大家都说的：武器和车辆被改成了所谓的人物技能点，从而让你不得不多招人，每个招人的任务还极其繁琐，地方远不说（虽然可以快速移动但还是很麻烦），大多数时候就只是打下一片红区，然后按要求骇入或者下载数据，最离谱的是一片红区可能是很多任务的任务地点，刚清完一次你可能过会就要回来再清一次，当然敌人什么的是刷新了的，因此理论上能玩无限长，但这种一眼就能看出在水时长的玩意真的会有人买账吗hhh 我一开始玩这个游戏的时候就发现货运无人机可以劫持（默认Q键行为是瘫痪，需要鼠标中键+R），然后爬上去就能飞了，各种位于屋顶的技能点全部不在话下，当时还觉得挺有意思，后来发现这怕是这游戏唯一的闪光点了，现在的这个多人物系统真的喜欢不起来，本身游戏性不如单主角+武器店+车店，又大幅降低了游戏代入感——完全能想到过剧情的话把操控角色换成其他人的话对话怕是没有任何区别，什么人都管你叫DedSec，包括大名鼎鼎的艾登 · 皮尔斯亲自上阵的时候。。。还有最搞笑的就是潜入红区被敌人发现后敌人会不慌不忙地和你打拳击决斗，这就是英伦的绅士风度吗hhhh

现在看来，多人物系统的另一个乐趣就是招点好看的妹子然后换上好看的衣服——这是活生生把这游戏玩成换装游戏了hhh 解锁服装店也更有动力了。绅士福利：[spoiler]OLD RESERVOIR的鞋子里有很多包含丝袜的，甚至还有肉丝[/spoiler]

DLC血脉相承的任务线也挺不错的，[spoiler]艾登和扳手也算不打不相识了，而且扳手竟然露脸了！还有我们可爱的Jordi和Marcus，做那个拍电影任务的时候真的笑喷了XD [/spoiler]虽然这次的支线任务没那么单调了，但是通过做支线任务才能获得技能这个设定确实有点恶心了，而且不拿这些技能的话什么炮塔啊反恐无人机你就打去吧（主游戏里我都是拿到技术点数后第一时间点背叛的）。另外就是DLC的剧情是在主游戏主线故事之前的，所以最开始我是想先玩DLC的，但又怕错过主线的核心玩法，现在看来完全不会错过，DLC要全部从零开始，所以先血脉相承后主线的体验可能略好一些吧，[spoiler]不过你会发现血脉相承里的很多NPC在主游戏中都已经挂了XD[/spoiler]

Immersive, expansive city to walk and drive around in. Polished high quality sound and visuals. I found the gameplay boring, repetitive, frustrating and buggy. Bought on sale, put thumbs up because the city atmosphere is fantastic along with immersive sound design.

Дуже сподобався режим Зомбі мультиплеєр, після проходження сюжету можу робити що хочу, хоч кататись на машинах, хоч що захочу. Те що гра з відкритим світом, і те що у ній можна робити що хочеш, це дуже круто навідь крутіше ніж GTA

review:
La historia es peor que la de Watch Dogs 1 y 2, los villanos son totalmente olvidables, la jugabilidad es peor que la de sus anteriores entregas teniendo un hackeo más limitado ya que no podremos explotar los celulares de los enemigos, volar las tuberías de la calle, cambiar el semáforo, escondernos en el vehículo, etc, etc, etc.

La dificultad es una payasada, sin importar si la dinámica del juego es Tradicional o en el modo Resistencia (aunque obviamente el modo resistencia es mejor en ciertos aspectos), la jugabilidad no cambia mucho la verdad, el combate y sigilo en la dificultad difícil sigue siendo fácil. Hay una escasez en la variedad de habilidades de los agentes, no importa si el agente es un productor de cine, abogado, hacker, lo que sea, se suelen repetir las habilidades haciendo que siempre elijas al mismo (o los mismos) agentes, los agentes prestigiosos son los que realmente marcan la diferencia pero obviamente son premium ($!). La conducción es malísima como siempre en ésta saga, YYYY el própio título está MAL OPTIMIZADO, consume más de 8 GB de VRAM si lo queremos jugar en últra, ni hablar del Ray Tracing, te cóme los FPS.

el modo muerte permanente está bueno, PERO, tiene dos problemas grandes: el primero es que solamente se puede activar y desactivar una sola vez en una partida, una vez desactivado no se puede volver a activar, el segundo problema es que si se muere un personaje prestigioso no se puede volver a recuperar, esos personajes son de DLC, entonces, si Aiden Pearce o Wrench mueren, no podremos volver a usarlos NÚNCA MÁS a no ser que volvamos a crear una nueva partida. Las armas en éste título están bastante limitadas, por lo general los agentes normales usarán armas no letales y no varían mucho éstas armas, los agentes prestigiosos podrán usar armas letales, no letales y armas propias, no existe un arbol de habilidades, por ende, los personajes no varían entre si y no se siente una gran diferencia a la hora de entrar en sigilo con un agente o con otro, no existe un agente específico que realmente marque estratégia y ventaja en una situación, son mínimamente diferenciales.

(el DLC "Bloodline" es mejor que la historia principal, pero no va más allá)

No lo recomiendo a no ser que salga en oferta con un 70-80% de descuento.

review:
Having played both the previous Watch_Dogs, this game is really not fun. Almost none of the puzzles that part 2 introduced, bland story, not interesting characters. I ended up filling up my complete roster, but only continued playing with Wrench (DLC), as he provided the best voice and interesting dialogue.
The game is buggy as well, crashes a lot. Had to switch off RT and drop from DX12 to 11 to not crash out every 30 minutes or doing some actions (like choosing clothes or hacking a drone).
As to the actual gameplay, it is also bad. AI is dumb, most missions you eventually just complete by hovering at max height and just send your spider to do all the work. There are no rewards in taking a stealth approach as enemies sometimes just spawn in and locate you, even if you did it completely undetected. Also no killing doesn't matter, as everyone is forgettable and you get grudges also from just knocking people out. At least with Marcus in part 2 you got the feeling that DeadSec was more about hacking and making the world better. Here you might as well be the terrorists the game makes you out to be.
The world is lifeless. NPC might show to have interesting lives, but they are just about all the same and the perks they have mean almost nothing. Might as well grab the best killer with an arsenal and if you expect a chase, grab a getaway driver.
The audio sucks. Something plays, but as soon as an event happens (like one of your recruits gambling or so), the audio is killed off. You want to hear it again? You have to go into the menu. But as soon as you switch back to the game, the audio stops. In other words, you have to stare blankly at the screen and wait for the boring audio to finish and don't walk/play. The limited podcasts, which would be interesting, are thus too long. All other audio (and texts) should add flavor, but are so non-descriptive, that they don't help make the world feel alive. Also music is only in vehicles, but travelling by tube and cargo drone (which only in loading screens is called a construction drone) is way more effective, but silent.
So audio bad, gameplay bad, driving sucks, puzzles almost non-existent, random crashes boring story, bland characters.
I knew from other reviewers it was going to be bad. Since I got a deal, I was hoping this would offset it. I was wrong. It is bad, even if it was free.

review:
Game could be good, but never got to play it because I would not allow 'Battleye' to be installed. Be VERY aware of this third party monitoring piece of crap software. I'm a cyber security specialist (Ethical Hacker) with well over 9 years experience in detecting and mitigating exactly these kind of threats, and even without reverse engineering this, every system I use to check 3d party 'software' started spitting out warnings about this crap.

So far it seems that EVERYTHING is being monitored, not just the necessary parts to allegedly 'prevent cheating'. Every part of your system is getting checked and most likely stored by this shady group of people, especially sensitive and identifiable information. This exceeds the purpose of 'preventing cheating' and should be banned imo. I value my privacy (and my PC's integrity) at least to a bigger extend than just a single game.

Solution: A reverse engineered version made it safe ;-)

Oh and i don't care who takes this warning serious or not, feel very free to install it, just don't start crying when your data is out in the open :)

review:
Hello friends,

Today i will review the game "WATCH DOGS LEGION". This is a open world game made by ubisoft that finally came to steam. Although the achievements are not found on steam itself, you can find the achievements linked into your ubisoft connect account. This game is based on the world of Watch Dogs. They are also many things you can do in multiplayer mode, such as co-op missions, OMNI 4 person mission, and Leader of the Pack 4 person mission. There are also some other missions like Paperless and classic invasion mode. Although this can be fun, it is very hard to find people to play the game online. It is best to play on weekends when more people are online.


PROS:

- A all new adventure in the watch dogs universe.
- You can recruit any character in the game walking around.
- Hacking to save london in the future.
- Multiplayer and other modes of playing the game with people.
- Hidden items and masks.
- Tons of side quests.
- Controller support, as it worked using a logitech F310.



CONS:

- All achievements are not found on steam but are on ubisoft connect account. Some people do not like this aspect.

- Sometimes it is hard to find people on multiplayer to play certain missions since they require 4 people to play them.

- Battle Eye issue with windows 11 OS only. You can see about it here: https://www.battleye.com/support/faq/

- Repetition is the worst thing in this game. If you get bored, try taking a break and playing a different game.

- Some minor bugs like data text bug that runs off menu of page, or t-posing npc's.

- Major bugs that some people reported is game crashes when you fight certain drones. MY game did crash 3 times playing it.

NOTE: If playing mutliplayer, in order to get into the DEDSEC hideout, only the person running the server can open it, and if they do, you can enter it too when they go into it.

Do i recommend it? Only if it works good for you. For me, it worked fine for me. Others have had issues with the game working for them. Although even my game crashed sometimes, it did not do it all the time. Also, the multiplayer is quite fun, but you need to find people to play with. I suggest if you want to buy this, either have friends that also play it since it is difficult to find ones in the game, or buy it on a very steep sale. I recommend getting the season pass as it comes with not only a couple of good characters to play in the game, and a vip pass for 28 days in the multiplayer, but also comes with dlc Bloodline...which is a decent story for what it is.
